Summary Heading: Great value, clean and inexpensive right next to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was great. The check in experience was quick and easy. The rooms are quite large (we got the suite - two queens in one room and pull out sofa in the other). I would say the rooms are older, but very clean. Plenty of towels. The pillows leave much to be desired as does the free breakfast (individual breakfast pastries, coffee, cereal, and bread - there was fruit the last two days of our stay - bananas and apples I think). Overall you can't beat the price or the distance to Disneyland. It was super easy to walk back to the room to nap/relax in the afternoon. The pool/hot tub are nothing fancy, but clean (indoors). I only give 4 stars because the beds and pillows could use some updating. This is a no frills place, but I was able to enjoy my trip to Disneyland knowing I
Manager Response: Dear Owen, We take pride in offering clean, convenient accommodations at an affordable rate, so we're glad you appreciated our efforts. Thank you for your feedback about the pillows. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay since it’s right across Disneyland. Rooms are fair. But the best part is the pool. My son super enjoyed dipping in the pool at the hottest time of the day. We will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Ellen, Being a part of your wonderful stay is the greatest compliment, and we are delighted that you and your family enjoyed our refreshing pool, prime location, and cozy rooms. It would be an honor to welcome you back, so please return soon for another five-star experience.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Was a great room! Clean and simple. The location was amazing! Every day we were at Disney we would walk back the middle of the day to get our coats and drop off anything we bought. It was so convenient! We will definitely be staying there again. Only complaint is the breakfast is very minimal and not really worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Ashlee, It was a pleasure hosting you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're glad you appreciated our clean rooms and close proximity to Disney. Thank you for your suggestion about breakfast. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we invite you to stay with us again should you be back in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed here with my grandson (13 months), his parents and my husband and I. The C2 room with two bedrooms and a connecting living room was perfect for our needs. We couldn't hear the baby cry through the bedroom walls. We did hear galloping feet above us late one night and early the next morning. Other than that the rooms were great. The breakfast was mediocre (bread, pastries, fruit, juice, oatmeal, coffee). The location, across from Disneyland, was the best part.
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing us to host you during your recent travels. We're glad you enjoyed your connecting rooms, and we trust you had a phenomenal trip to Disneyland with your grandson. Our team appreciates your reviews, and it would be our pleasure to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Right across from the front if Disneyland
Summary: They call it a 2-star hotel, but I say 3 for sure. It always clean and comfortable. I never worried about it being dirty or neglected. The staff was helpful and nice. No problems.  The only thing is the free breakfast coffee and room coffee is very weak. So bring your own. Other than that. We were very happy.
Manager Response: Dear Keith, We are delighted to know how much you enjoyed your stay with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Thank you for the lovely compliments about our staff. They will be honored to know their friendly service was so appreciated. Please come see us again the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Best location, probably why beds and furnishings are a little tired looking, beds not most comfortable, but we have been staying here for decades because of the location and the larger room sizes.  We also travel in winter and it has an indoor pool for the children, it is almost always too cold to use outdoor pools. Breakfast is just bread for toast, cold cereal and apples and oranges.
Manager Response: Dear Jstuc, We are thankful for your continued patronage of our hotel. Thank you for writing a review and pointing out our fantastic location and indoor pool. Also, we are always looking for ways to provide a better guest experience, so thank you for pointing out the areas you see that need improvement. We value you as a guest and cannot wait to see you again!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: BEWARE OF THIS PLACE. MANAGEMENT DOES NOT CARE ABOUT ITS CUSTOMERS
Summary: Beware, the cancelation policy states 48 hours, however it is really 72 hours. Misleading. This is what I have been dealing with. I need to cancel this reservation due to the weather as another storm is moving in this weekend. We are buried in snow. So let me explain. I had a reservation originally for 2/22/23-2/24/23, On 2/19/23 I tested pos for COVID. I called on Monday, the 48 hours as I had read it to cancel my reservation, and was informed the supervisor that I could only move this reservation due to not being prior day before midnight ( even though it was more than 48 hours prior to my check in time). At the time I had fever and pretty sick , so could not argue this point that your website is 48 hours, if this is not the case why would you not put 72 hours prior ? So I
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out. While we sympathize with you and regret that our cancelation policy was not in your favor, it is one that our team must uphold, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Also, it is likely that we were unable to move your reservation to another date due to being at full capacity. Once again, thank you, and we wish you well.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites had the best variety of room configurations with adjoining rooms for our family of 9 adults and 3 children I could find close to Disney with the best value. The pool and hottub were enjoyed by the children after a long day of walking and lines.  We were greeted by friendly staff and the valets helped us to register and find parking for our vehicle. Our receptionist was very friendly and helpful as well.  The continental breakfast was basic, but adequate and allowed us to hit the ground running to get at the front of lines at the start of day. The proximity to the parks was great as it is literally across the road and made it easy to take a mid day break, which with the wet weather allowed us time to dry out.  A microwave and fridge in each room
Manager Response: Dear Clarence, We want everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to have an excellent visit, so we're happy to hear that was the case with you! It's great to know that comfortable, well-appointed suites had everything your family needed and that you appreciated being so close to the parks. Our friendly staff will also be glad you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We always stay at Desert Inn and Suites. The room size (Parlor - A, proximity to park and walking distance). We do not utilize the free breakfast, as it is part of our tradition to always eat in the parks. Even though it is a small parking lot, we always end up finding a spot. Or they will valet for free if there is no parking up top. Friendly front desk staff. Cannot check in until 3pm. We got there at 2:45pm and we waited in our car for 15 minutes and then returned to the front desk to get the keys.
Room tip: Room was great for us and our teen daughter.
Manager Response: Dear Jamie, Thank you for staying with us again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, we love welcoming back our returning guests. It is fantastic to see that you found our location convenient for your needs and had pleasant interactions with our friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We always stay here sometimes the breakfast is better than other trips this time not to many options and that’s the main reason we pick this place because it’s close to the park the price is good for good Location and quick breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Veronica, Thank you for continuing to count on Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites during your travels. Two things that you can always expect here are affordable rates and a stellar location to explore. It is always a joy to have you. We will certainly discuss your breakfast comments. Nevertheless, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The rooms were good. Bed was a little bit hard for our taste, but not terrible. Neighbours were a little noisy, but not the hotels fault. Walk to Disney was perfect, but ask for a room closer to the front.
Manager Response: Our stellar location is second to none, especially if you want to visit Disney. We hope that you had an amazing time exploring the area. Thank you so much for the review. If you ever encounter a noise issue, do not hesitate to reach out. Nevertheless, come back and stay with us again anytime at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The location couldn't be beat!  The staff was really friendly and helpful, and the rooms were clean.  There was some slight noise transference from the guests above us, but other than that the room was pretty insulated from the street noise.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Kristina, We're so happy to know that everything from our clean accommodations to our wonderful team members impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Please come back and join us again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: The perfect no-frills Disney crash pad
Summary: Can’t beat the location right across the street from the park gates. Clean, spacious rooms and efficient check-in and check-out with friendly staff. Not the best water pressure but you get what you pay for :)
Manager Response: Dear Morgan,  Thank you so much for your review! We are delighted that you were able to spend some time with us and thrilled that our great location suited your travel needs so well. Receiving recognition for our dedicated team, comfortable suites, and high standards of cleanliness is always appreciated. It was truly a pleasure having you here with us, and we hope to see you again in the future for another visit!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The rooms were clean can and comfortable. You can not beat the proximity to Disneyland!  The breakfast was fine, most people were grabbing a quick bite to eat so they could head over to the parks. We appreciate them holding our luggage the day we checked out while we visited the parks for 1/2 day before we headed to the resort. D we puked definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Karen, It was a privilege to host your Disneyland trip! We trust you had a phenomenal visit to the park, and we're so glad you enjoyed our cozy accommodations and service. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Loved the closeness to Disneyland. Family suite was perfect size for our family of 4 with grandparents being right in the next connected room. Staff were friendly and super helpful. Nice little continental breakfast to get the day started. We will definitely stay here again if and when we visit Disney again.
Manager Response: Dear Nadine, A family getaway is bound to be a fantastic experience, and it only gets better when you stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. With our unbeatable location to Disneyland and cozy accommodations, you can always expect to have a wonderful time. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you just want to walk to Disneyland
Summary: Our 4th-floor room had two queen size beds and (I think...) a fold-out sofa in the outer TV/mini-frig/microwave oven room (as you enter from the door).  The bathroom had a tub/shower, but there was no drain plug, unless you make one with a hand towel..., so only a shower is possible - the water could be hot, but the shower head was VERY low on the wall and the water pressure was so-so.  Lots of towels were provided.  A countertop sink was in the room outside of the toilet and shower.  Another TV was in the bedroom.  The mini-frig was a nice size, but its freezer compartment was tiny.  We saw an indoor pool but did not have time to use it since we spent all of our days at Disneyland or CA Adventure.  The free breakfast was not fancy, but nice.  No not meals other than a toaster.
Manager Response: Dear Tim, Wow! Our location is second to none, and we are elated to see that this was a highlight of your visit. We hope you had an amazing time at Disneyland. There are plenty of reasons to enjoy a stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, and we love to see that our well-equipped rooms and amazing staff were a few of yours. Our team will be thrilled to be recognized for their hard work. Thank you so much for the review. Come back anytime.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Will stay again! So convenient to the park
Summary: Great stay. Lack of pillows and water pressure was horrible, but other than that we will definitely be staying again. It was so close to the park. We have a two year old so walking back for naps was not out of our way.
Manager Response: Dear Fran,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our convenient location close to area theme parks. It's the best compliment knowing we'll host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Best value for a separate living space close to Disneyland
Summary: Best value for a room with a separate sleeping and living space across the street for Disneyland. It was so convenient. Comfortable bed and pillows, and the room was perfectly clean. Almost adequate continental breakfast- cold cereal, coffee, and oatmeal, unripe fruit, and toast. PS please add peanut butter. I would absolutely stay again for the price and location and comfortable bed and separate space to watch tv if someone wanted to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to host your stay. It is awesome to see that you liked our clean, comfortable accommodations and found our location convenient for enjoying the local area. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I always love the view from the Parlor A suites, love the short walk to disney (right across the street literally) and the great room rates! And of course the roof top viewing for the fireworks! But if you're in a parlor A suite you can watch those outside your window too!
Manager Response: Dear Tony, We want everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to have an excellent visit, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our convenient location, amazing views, and affordable rates impressed you. The next time you're in town, we welcome you to stay with us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Good Family motel right at the park entrance!
Summary: Our family of 9 stayed at the Desert Inn and had a great week. It’s not a fancy place—this is a motel style lodging, but it’s clean and the rooms are spacious. We had 5 older teens and 4 folks in their 50’s and there was room for all by taking two suites. Waking to Disney was so quick and easy! The staff were all very nice and they kept things tidy and friendly. If you like a place with all the bells and whistles—this isn’t the place for you, but id you have a big group and just need a clean place to sleep, this is a great option.
Manager Response: It was wonderful hosting you and your group at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We're so pleased that you appreciated our clean, spacious accommodations, convenient location, and friendly service while you were here. Thank you for recommending our property to future travelers, and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Nice, reasonably priced hotel right across the street from Disneyland. Basic breakfast of toast, cereals, prepackaged danishes, apples and oranges. Nothing fancy but all that we needed. Pleasant, helpful staff. Would definitely book if we go to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: We're all smiles at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites knowing that our reasonable rates, convenient location, and helpful service would bring you back again for another perfect trip to Disneyland. We can't wait! Many thanks for the positive review.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: You can't beat the location. The staff were lovely. The rooms are not going to win any luxury awards, but they were super clean and everything worked. Breakfast was okay. The indoor pool was a great amenity. Most of all, we booked this hotel for it's location (right across the street from Disneyland's main entrance) and we weren't disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne, Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and for your delightful review. We know that when visiting Disneyland, clean accommodations, a welcoming staff, and our prime location are what our guests are looking for, so we are thrilled we hit the mark with you. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you choose us for your stay again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Close to Disney walkway.  Little parking. Great rooms with good space and comfortable bed. Only 1 small elevator so it can be very busy.  Hard to get wheelchairs and scooters in and out due to tight quarters on outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. It's terrific you appreciated our desirable location near Disneyland. We apologize if you had to wait for the elevator, but we're glad you liked our spacious and cozy accommodations. Safe travels, and we hope to welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Proximity to Disneyland cannot be beat as it’s across the street from Disneyland and between Denny’s and tony romas.  Hotel is dated and is nothing more than a 2 star. Breakfast is lacking. It has cereal, oatmeal, coffee, toast with butter or jam, packaged pastry, whole orange, whole apple. Needs to offer a protein such as eggs or sausage and perhaps yogurt, bananas, peanut butter for toast.  Room was clean except for 1 long black hair in the bed and the remote looked sticky and dirty.  Pillows are thin, sheets are thin and we were cold. Decor is dated and old.  Parking attendants and staff were fantastic. Saw them scrubbing the pool when we walked by and appeared to be clean tho we didn’t use it.  We stayed 1 night just to go to Disneyland and was good enough for that being ok
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your recent stay, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your constructive comments. We're delighted you enjoyed our excellent location so close to Disneyland and clean accommodations, as well as the attentive service our team provided. However, we're sorry to hear that we fell short of meeting all of your expectations on this occasion. Your feedback regarding breakfast and any updates needed is gratefully received and allows us to continually review and improve guest satisfaction. We hope to have the opportunity to impress you the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Disgusting Customer Service & No Hot Water!!
Summary: I was severely inconvenienced by the lack of empathy and professionalism of this establishment. We had to move rooms due to no hot water and were told by the "houseman" that the owner/manager does not allow guest to have hot water because it is too costly for him. Mind you, our stay was during the month of January!  He said we could take a "bath" with luke warm water, that is what everyone does that stays there because the showers are too cold to take. When I called to discuss this with the "night manager/supervisor" he agreed with what I was told and pretty much confirmed that their hotel does not have hot water for their guests. There was an excruciating loud noise whenever you had our shower on for more than 3 minutes and he explained that all the showers made that noise due
Manager Response: Dear Randy, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and although we are terribly sorry for the unfortunate and out-of-the-ordinary experience you had, we are a bit confused. We are known for our wonderful customer service and we do not normally have issues with water temperature. Rest assured, we will be looking into the concerns you mentioned to make sure everything is up to the high standards we are known for, and again apologize for the issues you mentioned.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Good pricing and great location to the parks.  Walls are thin so you can hear when people wake up or get back but worth dealing with for the convenience of being close to the parks in my opinion.  Would probably always choose this hotel if I want to be close to the parks and don’t want to walk a long way back home after the park.
Manager Response: Dear Nathan, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our convenient location close to area theme parks and our exceptional value. It would be our pleasure to host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The staff at the front were kind and help set us up to store our luggage as we were too early for check in. All of the staff we encountered were so nice and hard working.  We had no troubles, the beds were very comfortable, continental breakfast was enough to get you on your way to disneyland and you cannot utter a complaint about the proximity to Disneyland (basically right across the street). We had a wonderful vacation. Thank you for being apart of our trip.
Manager Response: Dear Erin, Thank you for staying with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and found our location convenient for your needs. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The room was clean.  The staff friendly.  My only issue was we were never able to get our rooms cleaned as they did not reach our rooms until the kids nap time.  Staff was very friendly and gave us clean towels and anything else we needed - just frustrating that we were out of our room by 7:30am and when we came back around 2ish for kids to nap, room still was not cleaned.
Manager Response: Dear Debra, We would like to thank you for staying with us and highlighting our clean rooms and attentive staff. That said, please know our housekeeping service is done every other day, and our team must maintain a strict schedule to ensure all our rooms are immaculate. Nevertheless, we hope you had a fantastic time in Anaheim and will come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Clean and convenient. Reasonable prices. Staff was nice, wish they had daily housekeeping and a better breakfast . I would definitely stay again . If you have kids the location is good, close distance to the parks, restaurants and pharmacy
Manager Response: Dear Heather, We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark with our convenient location to Disney, clean accommodations, and great value. It was a pleasure to host you and provide an excellent stay. Your comments about breakfast will be shared with our team, and if you have anything specific that you would like to be offered, we would be grateful for the suggestion. Come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: We are return guests who will back again!
Summary: I choose this hotel for EASE, affordability and comfort anytime we visit Disneyland and CA Adventure.  It is the first hotel beyond the crosswalk from Disney, so tired legs don't have too walk far... Rooms provide fridge, microwave, bath tub and there's  indoor pool and small hot tub, too.  The complementary continental breakfast may leave some wanting but we appreciate the fresh fruit for our day at the parks and the neighboring Denny's has online ordering 24 hours.  The clean spacious rooms open to fresh air and parking is $17/day with self-parking and valet options available. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear Aminah, We are most grateful for your detailed review. We want to ensure we are providing our guests with all they need to have a five-star stay, and it looks like we checked all the right boxes during your visit. Thank you for your excellent review, and perfect rating. You can always count on Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites for great value, comfort, and convenience anytime you are in the area in the future. We would be delighted to have you as our guest again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The proximity to Disneyland is what made this worth the money.  Breakfast was less than stellar, day two we just went to Denny's to get real food.  Watching the fireworks from the roof was pretty cool.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly, You are sure to get a good bang for your buck anytime you visit. Thank you so much for highlighting our stellar location and amazing fireworks. You can bet that we will discuss your breakfast feedback. Nevertheless, come back and visit us again anytime.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Staff was very friendly. Although they were doing some construction during our stay, staff always made sure sectioned were roped off and had detour areas to avoid the construction and had pool open after construction ended for the day. Breakfast is continental as described on website which was nice and space was accommodating to go in and grab some coffee and pastry. Rooms were clean and fridge in rooms were very spacious for bringing leftovers or storing items if you head to the store. Mostly you can NOT beat the location. Minutes to park entrance. We stayed in the C2 suite and was so spacious, We were able to park a scooter for a relative as well as a double stroller for our stay for the week at the parks. I would stay again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Ashleyn, It's so great to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer! From our amazing location to our wonderful staff and spotless accommodations, it sounds like you had a wonderful stay. We are so glad we could provide you with such a memorable experience and look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The very basic motel room was clean an the bed was comfortable. The breakfast was cold cereal, oranges, apples, toast, jam, butter, instant oatmeal, juice and milk. Coffee, too. Not great but OK. And there’s a Denny’s next door if you want a bigger or hot breakfast.  The best thing was the location just steps away from the crosswalk to Disneyland. I’ll stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Beth, There are plenty of reasons to enjoy a visit to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, and we love to see that our unbeatable location and clean accommodations were a few of yours. Thank you so much for the fantastic review. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Basic room but worked for us. I don't like the nickle and diming to charge $1.50 per locker per suitcase when the room isn't ready when you get there. Appreciated that breakfast is back to regular and housekeeping again.
Manager Response: It's terrific that our outstanding value, prime location, and delicious breakfast enhanced your time with us. That said, we are sorry you were disappointed with our locker fees. If you have any additional feedback on what we could've done to improve your stay, please feel free to reach out to us offline. The next time you travel to Anaheim, we hope you'll revisit us for a better overall experience.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The beds were ok. Noise from people walking past the rooms can be disturbing. Arrive a few hours before check in and had to pay to put our bags in lockers. Have never stayed at a hotel that charges to store bags so this was not a good introduction. Loved being so close to Disney. Breakfast was pretty bad.
Manager Response: Dear 3boyzandagirl, We're pleased that you enjoyed our central location and comfortable beds. Thank you for being our valued guest and taking a moment to share your valuable feedback regarding our breakfast and amenities, as we constantly work hard to improve in the areas that matter most to our guests. In the future, we hope you consider returning for a better experience.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We were comfortable here and the folks at the front desk were efficient. I was disappointed to find out that they do not have daily housekeeping. I would have liked to be clearly told this at the time of booking or checkin. So the way they calculate the housekeeping is “every other day” which for a 4 night stay, you get one room cleaning. This is totally untenable with a family of four in a room.
Manager Response: Dear Nikki,  Thank you for taking a moment to leave us a review. Receiving recognition for our friendly team and comfortable accommodations is always appreciated. We regret any inconvenience caused by our current housekeeping policy and will be sure to discuss your report with our team to see how we can make this information clearer moving forward. It was a pleasure having you here with us and we wish you safe travels.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Location is the absolute best especially at the end of a long day.  Friendly staff.  Continental breakfast is a plus for a quick grab on the go.  We always have an amazing experience and only stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your heartfelt review. We are truly honored to have you as a loyal guest and delighted to know how much you enjoy your stays with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in our area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I had a good stay at this hotel. The room was clean, comfortable and with all the amenities I needed. The staff were friendly and helpful to ensure my stay was enjoyable. The location was also great, across the street from Disneyland, with plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Michael, It warms our hearts to know that our clean, comfortable accommodations and friendly service impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Please come back and join us again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Great location to Disneyland Resort. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Had continental breakfast. Wasn’t big but good enough. Good deal on the room we stayed at, just have to look, cheaper than going to other website. Better to just book at the hotel website.
Manager Response: We're delighted you had a great stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Thank you for spotlighting our prime location, spacious rooms, delicious breakfast offerings, and great value. Hosting your visit was a pleasure, so please return soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great location, great price for Disneyland stay.
Summary: This hotel is right across the Harbor Blvd from the Disneyland Resort - a 5 minute walk!  The rooms are comfortable, clean, and enough space for my family of 6.  Storage space for our luggage is tight.  The breakfast is basic continental, but Denny’s is next door if you need more.  Price is very good compared to other hotels nearby.  Standard parking fee of $17 is OK, but it is secure with free valet parking if self parking is unavailable. Greatest compliment is I would gladly return for my next Disney fix.
Manager Response: Dear Dalton, Being so close to Disney is what guests often highlight about their stay, and we are happy to know that this was an added benefit to your family's visit as well. It is our goal to provide everything our guests will need to ensure a five-star experience. We appreciate you highlighting our comfortable accommodations and great value. The next time the magic is calling your name, we know we will see you again!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I am giving it a 3/5 because the distance from the Disney parks was fantastic. The rooms were clean and safe but outdated. The hotel staff were okay. The parking situation was less than optimal if the lot is full your car is parked off site a few hotels over. We rented a family suite that is listed as sleeping 10. The pull out was a regular sofa and there wasn't any bedding provided for it. The towels were also not enough for a full family suite. Lastly don't count on the breakfast it's toast, cereal, milk, juice and fruit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your visit. It is good to learn that you found our location convenient for your needs and that your room was clean. We want you to know there is always a member of our friendly team available to provide you with any items you may require during your visit. We hope you will consider staying with us again when you are next in the area.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Very pleasant.  They could have a better breakfast though.  Rooms were clean and comfortable and staff was friendly.   We would stay here again.  The best thing was how close it is to Disneyland. Not a bad walk at all.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for allowing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to host your recent stay. We're delighted to hear you had a pleasant experience and appreciated our convenient location so close to Disneyland, as well as our clean and comfortable accommodations. Your feedback regarding breakfast is gratefully received and allows us to review where we could be doing even better. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on another occasion.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Our go-to stay for visiting Disneyland!
Summary: We keep returning to The Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites for the convenience to the parks  and affordable rates.  We have always found the rooms clean and well stocked with towels.  I was tickled to see a fancy folded hand towel as a fun welcome.  The desk clerks are friendly and helpful.  I would classify it as a mid-range family hotel. Parking is tight, but they let you stay after check-out to finish your day at Disney.  At $14 per day it's a better rate than the Disney parking and closer too!   I would like to see the complimentary breakfast upgraded to include some form of protein - hard boiled eggs, peanut butter, cream cheese - but it is improving over the brown bags offered just after the COVID closure.  They have cold cereal, milk, packaged danish rolls, juice, hot coffee
Manager Response: Your excellent rating of Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites brightened our day! We greatly value your loyalty as return guests. Our team is proud to have consistently delivered the clean, affordably priced, well-stocked accommodations, friendly assistance, and great breakfast selections you've come to expect from us. It's also great that our proximity to theme parks is convenient for you. Many thanks for your enthusiastic praise and we look forward to your return!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Great location! Easy walk to and from Disneyland. Room is basic but clean and comfortable.  We didn’t eat the breakfast but it’s nice that it’s offered.  The extra room with pull out couch is great for families with older kids/teens.  We will return!
Manager Response: Dear Robin, What a fantastic review to receive! It is always an honor to welcome back a valued guest. Our team will be thrilled to know you had another outstanding stay with us. Thank you so much for your kind words, and we look forward to your next visit to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Always a nice stay. Only 4 stars as they don't change their continental breakfast options any longer. Looked forward to bagel days. But understand due to the high cost of groceries nowadays.  But overall a nice place to stay, so close to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  We are so pleased to have been able to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Familiar faces are our favorite and we appreciate your loyalty. Your feedback regarding aspects of your stay that could have been even better is gratefully received and allows us to continually review and improve guest satisfaction. Thank you so much for your review and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I love the location of this hotel.  The breakfast are great.  I have stayed here many times and I highly recommend it.  The suites are awesome if your are coming with a big group.  There is always enough space for my family.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're glad our tasty breakfast, spacious rooms, and convenient location impressed you. Please come see us again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Very Good Hotel Close to Disney
Summary: Having a hotel right across from  Disney park was a huge advantage to our disney experience and we would definitely stay hear again.  I did find our room to be noisy to outside traffic. We could hear people quietly walking outside our room. To fix this we  just kept the room thermostat on continuously to help drown out outside noise.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We were delighted to welcome you to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. It's great to hear we were able to provide a positive experience and that you appreciated our convenient location within close proximity to Disneyland, as well as our comfortable accommodations. Thank you for sharing your comments, and we hope to have the opportunity to host your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: One of the closest locations to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed here many times since 2000. And I have to say, it's one of the cleaner hotels we have stayed at. And the convenience of being right across from Disneyland has been fantastic for all of our family (grandparents, aunts, friends, etc.) so they can come and go when they please. The only complaints I have this time around are the beds. Very thin and every time we sat down on them, they actually slid one way or another and my back was killing me every morning. Also, the shower heads in all 3 rooms were so low, it was kind of ridiculous. Obviously for the men at 6'4, but even down to my sister at 5'5 and me at 5'7. So wasn't looking forward to that each night, bending down to wash my hair.  And it would be so nice if they added a hook in the toilet/shower area to hang
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal guest at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are thrilled that our prime location so close to Disneyland, as well as our spotless accommodations, continue to impress you. Your constructive comments are also appreciated, as we are always looking for ways to improve the guest experience. Please know we will be sure to review your comments and look forward to welcoming you back on future trips to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great rooms, breakfast could be better
Summary: Great big room, two full bathrooms, and a sofa sleeper.  Total of 10 beds. Awesome for a family.  Breakfast leaves something to be desired so if you want a better breakfast pack something. There is a fridge and microwave to heat up frozen bowls or something. Breakfast is basically cereal, packaged danishes, oranges and apples, oatmeal you make yourself, apple or orange juice, and plain coffee.  Not terrible but could include some hot choices to make it better for sure.  Overall great place for families.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, It was a pleasure to welcome you and your family to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites during your recent stay. We're delighted to hear you appreciated our spacious and fully-equipped accommodations. However, we're sorry to learn that breakfast fell short of meeting your expectations; we will discuss your feedback with the rest of our team and work together to address where we could be providing more variety. Thank you for sharing your review, and we hope to have the opportunity to host your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: If you’re looking for an easy walk to Disneyland/ DCA, this is the place for you.   It’s an easy 5 -10 minute walk depending on other pedestrians. Enjoyed staying at Desert Inn, their rooms are clean & their staff is always friendly & helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Tony, Thank you for allowing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to host your recent stay. We're thrilled to hear you had a positive experience and appreciated our convenient location within walking distance to Disneyland, as well as our clean accommodations and friendly staff. We're grateful for your kind comments, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Disney with some notes.
Summary: If you are going to Disneyland and want a place to stay that is easily walkable to the park, this one will do. It is located on the corner near the park and is very convenient. Across the street is a Starbucks, Walgreen, CVS and Blaze Pizza, all of which are very helpful. This property is on the corner of Harbor and Katela making it one of the busiest corners in Anaheim with cars traveling on it 24/7. Ask for a room in the back or bring earplugs because even though the property is nice, clean and customer friendly, if you are on the street, the noise will keep you awake. There is a pool and spa and a self service store in the lobby which is very convenient. Of special mention is that if you stay here and need anything, ask for Gabriel. He is a pro and is very helpful and
Manager Response: If you're traveling to Disney, there's no better place to stay than Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Our prime location and fantastic amenities allow our guests to have comfort, fun, and convenience. Thank you so much for the praise and additional feedback. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Thx!  Friendly staff, clean and so close to the parks! Our go-to place when we travel to Disneyland. Perfect location. Highly recommended. Literally across the street. 2 minutes to security. We will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. You can't beat our convenient location across the street from Disneyland! Next time you vacation in Anaheim, you can count on us for friendly service and clean rooms!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Reasonably priced. Having the indoor pool and jacuzzi was nice for this time of year and super close to the park. Would love another option at bfast other than toast. Maybe bagels? They also had cereal, oatmeal and pastries.
Manager Response: Dear Samantha, We were happy to provide you with convenient, affordable accommodations, and we're glad you enjoyed your meal. Thank you for your suggestions about breakfast. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we invite you to stay with us again should you be back in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Best location ever for Disneyland.  Front desk helpful and pleasant.  Parking was easy.  Room was clean abs quiet.  There was free breakfast we didn’t use because we left before it opened.  Enjoyed the stay.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our clean, quiet rooms provided you with the ideal place to rest and that our location worked well for your trip. Our friendly staff will also be glad you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This place is awesome. So insanely close to the park. VERY clean and VERY friendly. Will be staying again!  The only reason I gave a 4 is because their breakfast is really pointless to have, don't plan on using it.
Manager Response: Dear Marie, Whether you are looking for clean accommodations to relax in or a prime location to explore, you can bet that Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites will provide this and more. Thank you so much for the review. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We love the location and the people who work at the hotel. The breakfast could be a little better - rock hard butter and only orange marmalade for the toast but we were still able to find something to eat. We used to love the hard boiled eggs back before Covid. We will always come back to this place because it is such a short walk from the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Julauf, We know how exhausting a visit to the parks can be, so it's our priority to make sure our guests feel welcome and have a comfortable place to land at the end of a busy day. That being said, we are thrilled to know we were able to impress you and provide you with such an excellent stay. It will be an honor to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Parking can be crowded but if it is, they valet for free if you’re staying with them. The hotel is super convenient — location wise. There are food places close by and target is about 5 min drive away.
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa, We're so happy our accommodations provided a great deal of convenience for you! We are also glad you appreciated our complimentary valet service, and we hope to see you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. All the best!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Nice and clean. Free continental breakfast. Very short walk to Disneyland. They also have free valet parking.  Bed a little too hard for my liking but overall good hotel. I would definitely be staying here again for my next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure hosting you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Despite the bed not being your preference, it's great knowing our clean accommodations, free breakfast and parking, and convenient location would bring you back for another visit. We can't wait!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Simple hotel, but you can't beat the location. The extra space in the sitting area was nice. We were bummed that the pool & hot tub were closed on two out of three of our nights. We look forward to the hot tub after a long day in the parks. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: One of the best compliments a guest can give us is to let us know that they would choose to stay with us again when they are in town. We're happy to hear our location worked well for your plans to visit the parks and that our spacious accommodations were to your liking. That said, we're sorry that you couldn't take advantage of all of our amenities each night; your understanding is greatly appreciated. The next time you're in Anaheim, count on us for a stay that's worthy of a five-star rating.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I have stayed here many times - both before and during the pandemic.  I think it's time for them to return to pre-pandemic service.  There is no reason now not to have daily  house keeping service and a full breakfast. For $375+ fees per night the full-service should be restored.
Manager Response: Dear Lori, We do offer a modified continental breakfast and offer housekeeping every other day. However, we are disappointed to see that this did not meet your expectations. You can bet that we are always looking for ways to improve and will discuss your comments with our team. We hope to welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: No Frills Rooms But Great Location & Great Price!
Summary: Soooo close to Disneyland!  Literally right across the week.  I loved that we could see the fireworks every night from the roof top patio (and even from our window on the 5th floor).  Continental Breakfast was decent (pre-packaged danish, oranges, toast, cereal variety, milk, orange juice and coffee) and the sitting area was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.  Great price, Great Location.  Denny's on one side, IHOP on the other.  The rooms are no frills (you may need to ask for extra pillows, towels and  toiletries or bring plenty of your own).  Our room had two queen beds and a sitting room with a closing door, sofa (converts into a full size bed) and separate tv.  Our teenager loved having this space to herself.
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing to stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We're thrilled our enviable location in Anaheim worked perfectly for your family's Disneyland vacation! As you mentioned, if you ever need additional in-room amenities, just reach out to our front desk. We'll see you again soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: If only the neighbors were.considerate to others
Summary: This is our family go to hotel when we go to Disneyland. We have stayed there every year, for the last four years. With that said most of our trips are a five, doesn't take much to make us happy, clean, comfortable, lots of room/space, and indoor pool. This trip we were in the fourth floor (404) the guest on 504 would stomp, run and I dare same jump around till 1-3 in the morning. Called the office every night and it would just continue. Mad efor a very excusing trip, we were so tired.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. While we're glad you appreciate our clean and comfortable rooms, we're very sorry you experienced noise during your stay. We understand the importance of a solid night's sleep, and our team will work to be more diligent moving forward. Next time you vacation in Anaheim, we would be honored if you stayed with us again.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Love the location!! Minutes to the parks! The room was a great size. We loved the sink outside the room with the shower to get ready. The only negative is I wish breakfast had water and a few more options, like bagels or packaged muffins.  A change to the jam each day for the toast would at least add a little variety to breakfast or maybe packets of peanut butter and Nutella. And please add bananas! Besides breakfast, which in years past we stayed here and it was much nicer, we loved our stay!
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our location worked well for your trip and that your overall stay was pleasant. However, we apologize for any disappointment with breakfast, and we'll keep your comments in mind. The next time you're in the area, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Had a great time staying at your hotel commendations were great. We always stay there because we like this hotel. Next time we go, we will stay there again.  The continental breakfast that you have in the morning is very nice to start the day.
Manager Response: Dear Mamaholodnak, A lovely breakfast is often the best way to start the day, and we're glad you enjoyed yours with us. We're thrilled that you had such a great time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites the next time your travels point you towards Disney; until then!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Love the location.  Love the size of the rooms. Really love room capacity. It's my go to place to stay in the area. Literally steps to Disneyland.  If you have or rent huge strollers or mobility scooters, THIS CUTS OUT THE NEED FOR A CAR & PARKING (and is closer than Disneyland's own parking lot) OR HAVING TO HOP ON/OFF (and pay for) a shuttle!
Manager Response: We're proud to be your go-to hotel in the area! It's great to know that our convenient location and comfortable rooms keep you coming back to see us. We look forward to hosting you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We found that the price we paid was great value for th rooms and you can't beat the location. We booked two rooms for a family of 4 and they had comfy beds and were very clean. The continental breakfast was basic but all you need to get your day started.
Manager Response: We're delighted by your excellent rating of Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Our team is happy you found our clean, comfortable accommodations and simple breakfast to be a great overall value. It's also wonderful that it was convenient being so close to Disneyland. Your thoughtful compliments are appreciated, and we hope you'll return!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Clean rooms and close walk to the parks!
Summary: After an exhausting and long day of walking, it is wonderful to have such a close hotel to walk back to!  From the main walkway, just look to your right and there is the hotel— what a relief!  The staff is friendly and there were plenty of towels. Hotels don’t seem to offer daily housekeeping anymore, and Desert Inn and Suites is no different. However, the one cleaning we had during our four-night stay was very good.   The one complaint I have about the hotel room is the shower. The nozzle is so low— if you are over 5’3” you will have to duck down or arch your back to get the weak-running water to hit the top of your head. Also, there are no soap shelves or wash cloth racks in the shower. There is limited towel hanging space as well. This all proved challenging for this family
Manager Response: Dear Laura, If you're looking for an unbeatable location to truly enjoy all the nearby attractions, look no further than Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Our hospitable staff will be elated to be recognized for their hard work. We will certainly look into your bathroom comments. Nevertheless, come back and visit us again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Overall I like the location of this place, rooms are clean.  Pillows could you an upgrade, but overall great stay. Did do breakfast first day but not the rest due to not many options, but good for a grab and go.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. With location being so important when looking for a hotel, we are pleased that ours served your travel plans nicely. Additionally, our team will appreciate their dedication to cleanliness was a plus during your visit. We will be sure to keep your comments in mind about the pillows when looking to make improvements in the future. We appreciate your comments and hope to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites for another five-star stay!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We’ve been staying here for Disneyland trips for over 30 years. Hope to come for many more. You just can’t beat the location and the price is very good. We love the indoor pool and the firework viewing deck.
Manager Response: Dear Patrice,  We are so pleased to have been able to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Familiar faces are our favorite, and we appreciate your loyalty. It's fantastic to know that you are able to take advantage of our convenient location when you stay with us, and we appreciate you highlighting it to your fellow travelers. Additionally, thank you so much for highlighting our great amenities and excellent value! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We have stayed many times at Desert Inn and the best thing is how close it is to Disneyland. Location, location, location. Our stay was very pleasant with no issues.. Older hotel that needs updating but we didn’t spend any time in room except sleeping.
Manager Response: We're proud to include you among our returning guests, and we're glad our proximity to Disney keeps you coming back to see us. The next time you're in town, we'd be happy to host you again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Disney season pass holder looking for deals
Summary: Room is Clean and very close to the park. They could skip the bed spreads and big pillows coz obviously they're reused and not laundered for every turn around of guests. It's still a good deal and spacious for a family. I see myself booking here again
Manager Response: Dear Roselle, Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your thoughts. We're glad our clean, convenient accommodations added to your experience. However, we apologize for any issues with the bedding, and we'll look into your comments further. The next time you're in town, we invite you to stay with us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Good, clean hotel. The beds were comfortable and the room was in overall good condition. Main issues were with the AC/heater unit (fan sounded like it was broken and was pretty loud) and the shower head was VERY low (I'm 5'10" and the head was at my neck). Also, the continental breakfast is poor. The food offerings are meager. We knew this prior to coming so we brought our own breakfast food.
Manager Response: Dear Cory, Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your recent visit. It is always our goal to have guests enjoy a perfect experience at our hotel. That being said, it appears not everything was up to our normal high standards. Guest feedback is used to help us continually improve, so we thank you for sharing yours. We will be sure to mention your concerns to maintenance and food service and hope you'll join us again for an even better experience down the line.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Best hotel in the area for the cost!
Summary: Excellent comfort! Beds, room. Right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. Parking lot is small, but valet (even though an extra charge) is small price to pay! Valet quick to get your vehicle.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our comfortable rooms and convenient location added to your experience, and we're so pleased you appreciated the valet parking. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: It is a convenient and good stay across Disneyland. The only problem was the water in our sink wasn’t even running so we had to use the shower. Other than that the rooms were very clean. And the beds were comfortable at least
Manager Response: Dear Eddy, It's wonderful to hear that our convenient location was perfect for all your needs at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and that our clean accommodations impressed you. We'll have our maintenance team look into your comments about the sink and we hope you'll consider coming back to stay with us again later down the road.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Close to Disneyland. Clean room. The staff was friendly and helpfull, but no early check in.  Breakfast was all carbs with no protien choices like boiled eggs. Some hotels also have waffle that my kids love to make. There was no lift chair for handicap people to use for the pool and hot tub, and that made in challenging for my 79 yr old dad to get in and out of the pool/hot tub.
Manager Response: It's fantastic that our proximity to Disneyland was convenient for you, and we hope you had a great time! Additionally, thank you for spotlighting our clean rooms and friendly staff. That said, we appreciate you letting us know where we can be doing better, as we are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience. The next time you are in the area, it would be our honor to host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Quick walk to the parks, clean rooms and pool. The front desk staff was very helpful and nice. Our only issue was the valet would not let us park in the lot until 3pm, so we had to pay for parking someplace else until 3. The breakfast is just OK.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to host your stay. It is wonderful to learn that you liked our clean accommodations and were able to spend some time relaxing by the pool. We appreciate your feedback on the areas that need improvement and will speak with our team regarding this. Please allow us another chance to host you in the future, we want to meet and exceed your expectations.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: we enjoyed our stay, very convenient to Disneyland.  front desk staff very nice.  vehicle attendants very enjoyable.  we're planning our next stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  can't wait....
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Our team is pleased to learn we exceeded your expectations with our desirable location near Disneyland and friendly hospitality! We trust that we'll see you again soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This hotel is across the street from the entrance to Disneyland so we were able to walk over. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Becca, From our amazing team members to our clean accommodations, we're thrilled to know that you appreciated everything we have to offer at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Please consider coming back to stay with us again later down the road.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Hotel was great super super close to the walkway to the park , the staff at hotel was very nice and the rooms really clean. The towels and bedding were so clean and fresh . Do not have a bad thing to say about the place. Best place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Nate, Thank you for your recent stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are thrilled to hear you found our accommodations to be so perfect. We know there’s nothing better than a comfortable bed to end your busy day at Disneyland, so we are happy you were impressed. Our team always strives to make sure every guest has the best experience possible, so they will enjoy seeing your review. It would be an honor to have you visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Rate A-. Location A+, Rooms C-
Summary: As local Magic Key (AP) holders, ADI tends to have the best rates even with the ++ ( taxes, fees, parking) added and you can’t beat but would love to see a room update - especially towels ( tiny and far from fluffy) and carpets - yuck- staff is fine- and rooms are appearance clean ( but I’d not want to see under black light) and walls are paper thin ( note to amorous couple next door to us … we could here you… everyone could hear you).  Just a few key updates could make such a difference but those who look for lowest rate will return no matter what.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your recent stay, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your valuable comments. While we're pleased to hear you enjoyed our affordable rates, we're sorry to hear you were disappointed with aspects of your visit. Your feedback regarding any updates needed is gratefully received and allows us to continually review guest satisfaction. We hope to have the opportunity to provide an even better experience the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Always a pleasure to stay here. Beds are comfortable. Walking distance to Disneyland parks. Don't have to worry about parking. The workers are always helpful day and night. We be back again for our next disneyland adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! It's always a pleasure to welcome back a valued guest and we're thrilled to know that our comfortable accommodations and convenient location were a perfect fit yet again. Our team will be so glad to hear that they played a pivotal role in your fantastic experience as well! Familiar faces are our favorite and we appreciate your loyalty, so come back again soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We have stayed here several times. The hotel is across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. The rooms are perfect for sleeping and naps. There were plenty of clean towels. The hotel is quiet at night.  The morning breakfast offers a few selections. It is enough to get you to lunch.  We will continue to stay at The Desert Inn when ever we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you at  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, and we're ecstatic you were impressed! We're so happy you enjoyed our clean accommodations as well as our ideal location so close to Disneyland. Thank you for your kind review, and we look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: It was perfect distance to Disneys entrance, made it so nice to literally hop skip and jump in to bed after a long day at the parks! Room was clean and staff was friendly. Beds and pillows were quite comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Karen, We're proud to read your enthusiastic review of Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Our team was happy to provide friendly service. It's also great that after a long day exploring nearby Disneyland, returning to our clean, comfortable accommodations was relaxing. Thanks so much for your warm compliments, and we hope you'll return!    Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The staff is the best. Always above and beyond in help. Stephany got me a discount on an electric scooter. One of the nice young men got me a discount on airport shuttle. They answered every question; solved every issue. We feel safe there. We also like the parlor rooms which made the main bedroom so quite and the parlor was nice for the kids. Everything was clean and working. Comfy beds. Good oranges at breakfast & Kids and kids happy with toast & cereal. Nice pool. So close to parks. What more could we ask for?? Plus good price. Thank you Desert Inn for making us feel at home and for being so kind. It really makes all the difference!
Manager Response: Our goal is to impress everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our friendly staff and clean, comfortable rooms helped make your visit memorable. The next time you're looking for convenient, family-friendly accommodations in the area, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great Hotel - RIGHT Across the Street From Disney
Summary: Great hotel.  You can not beat the location, right across the street from Disneyland.   Friendly staff, check in was easy.  We arrived early and wanted to go to the parks, they have lockers that you can use to store your luggage, which is a nice bonus.  Room was clean, beds comfortable.  Basic breakfast (included in price) with decent coffee.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are thrilled to hear you found our accommodations to be so perfect. We know there’s nothing better than a comfortable bed to end your busy day at Disneyland, so we are happy you were impressed. Our team always strives to make sure every guest has the best experience possible, so they will enjoy seeing your review. It would be an honor to have you visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Nice and clean. Room was roomy and well suited for our arty. Would definitely stay there again. Friendly staff, So close to Disneyland entrance and such a short walk to room when your tired or to grab something you might have forgotten. Indoor pool was nice also.
Manager Response: Our goal is to impress everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! From our clean and comfortable accommodations to our friendly and dedicated team, we're excited that you had a great time with us. Thank you so much for also taking the time to note our convenient location right next to Disneyland! It was a pleasure having you here with us, and we hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Reservations, check-in and check-out were all smooth! Excellent customer service, clean room and just across the Street from the Disney entrance. Our location was the primary reason for choosing The Desert Inn Hotel. We had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Elbert, Your feedback has brightened our day here at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Guests often choose to stay with us for our unbeatable location near Disneyland, and we are pleased that we could check all the right boxes for you to have a great stay. Should you dream of another magical getaway, we trust that we will be your first choice for all your accommodation needs. Until then, we thank you for the perfect rating, and come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Our bathroom flooded but the staff was attentive and made the repair a priority. Staff was customer service oriented and the convenience of being just across the parks can’t be beat! The walk to the front gate is less than 5 minutes!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, It was a pleasure to welcome you to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. While we're sorry for the unfortunate issue you encountered with the flooding in your bathroom, it's great to hear that you appreciated the attentive and efficient service our team provided. We're also delighted you welcomed our convenient location close to all the parks. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind comments, and we hope to host your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Great location, the entrance to Disneyland is directly across the street which beats the hassle of waiting for a shuttle or hassling with a stroller for our family. Plenty of places to eat within walking distance. The deluxe and executive rooms are on the smaller side and the beds aren't the most comfortable but as I mentioned the location is great and we would stay again.
Manager Response: We're so happy to know that our amazing location was perfect for your needs and that you had a great time with us overall. We'll be sure to keep your comments in mind about the size of our accommodations, however, we hope you'll join us again in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Great for the price. No frills, super close to the park. Beds and pillows were comfortable, room was clean, had a fridge and microwave which was great. Breakfast was very "continental." Toast muffins and cereal with coffee and milk. Enough to get you out the door to the park! Staff was very friendly and helpful. Thin walls but didn't have any loud people.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We aim to provide our guests with comfortable and clean accommodations, friendly service, and great breakfast options at a reasonable rate, and we are happy to know that you found this to be the case. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We LOVED the location but the beds were very uncomfortable. Rooms are clean and the staff are friendly. The continental breakfast in the morning is just ok, we ended up walking to McDonald's on the last day because we need something more then tasteless cereal and dry muffin.
Manager Response: Guest satisfaction is important to us, so we're happy to hear our clean, welcoming accommodations and convenient location impressed you. However, we apologize for any disappointment with breakfast, and we'll keep your comments in mind. If you're in the area again, please come back to see us.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Not fancy but perfect for us and very budget friendly!
Summary: The rooms were clean. We stayed in a 2 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath room that had 4 queen beds, couch and a table to eat at. It’s not fancy but for as much time as we actually spend there it worked perfect for us. After all day of walking in the park it was nice to just have to walk across the street and be at our room. We didn’t eat the breakfast but Denny’s is right next door so that is very convenient and you can order online for pickup, plus they are 24 hours. Budget friendly and we will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica, We're so happy to hear that our clean accommodations impressed you and that our amazing value, as well as our prime location, were perfect for your needs. That said, it's unfortunate not to receive a higher rating, and we hope you'll let us know what more we could have done to have improved your visit. Thank you, and we hope to hear from you soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great for our last minute vacation!
Summary: Reasonable prices considering it is literally across the street from Disneyland. It was so nice to have our car valet as well, the staff were so nice!! Not to mention it was great to be able to leave Disneyland and walk across the street and almost immediately be back in our room. No driving or trams needed!! Thank you so much!!
Manager Response: Dear Brandalyn, We're so happy to hear that our amazing location, as well as our kind team members, impressed you during your stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and that you had a great time overall. Please consider coming back to stay with us again later down the road.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stay near Disneyland a lot. This is one of our new favorites! Super close to the parks, clean, nice staff, parking was easy, spacious room, vending machines around the property… we will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Haley, It's wonderful to hear that everything from our amazing location to our clean accommodations continues to impress you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We can't wait to host you again the next time you come to the area, so please, hurry back!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is located directly across the street to the Disneyland Resort entrance - a five minute walk.  The rooms are clean, and the staff helpful and friendly.  The included continental breakfast is basic, but satisfying.  There is also a 24 -hour parking attendant/valet so you will always have a parking stall. Although there is a $15 daily charge, that is way cheaper than Disney parking fees.
Manager Response: Dear Dalton, We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! It's great to know that our close proximity to Disneyland was ideal for your visit and that you appreciated our attention to cleanliness and service. If your travels bring you back to the area, we'd be happy to host you again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel & Great Location to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is wonderfully close for walking distance to entrance to Disneyland. Employees are nice and accommodating. Room was mostly clean for a high traffic occupancy room but we still brought our sanitation wipes and sprays for initial use. It was nice to have sink outside toilet/shower area. Nice refrigerator and microwave. Sofa bed was terrible to sleep on - felt every spring and bar. Queen beds were great!  Door lock was terrible and had to slam the door to get it to work. Electronic door opener on outside was hit and miss to work but once we got 10 key cards we had enough to open our door through the duration of our stay. Pool area was clean and nice - hot tub was nice temp but pool was cold. Continental breakfast was very nice and employee kept it clean and stocked. Would
Manager Response: We always enjoy hearing from our guests. It's great to know that our clean, convenient accommodations and friendly staff impressed you. Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed the pool and breakfast. We're sorry for any issues with the sofabed, and we'll look into your comments further. The next time you're in town, please consider coming back to see us.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay, Convenient Location to Disneyland
Summary: This is my hotel, "top -of-mind" choice, for stays during a Disneyland vacation. Book early to secure availability and a good nightly rate, better than most of the surrounding hotels. And, if you're arriving from a red-eye or morning flight, book your stay the night before like us so your room is ready when you arrive. It's nice to take a shower after a long flight, change clothes, unpack and, relax in the hotel room vs. waiting for check-in time later in the afternoon and storing your suitcases in lockers.   Great location, directly right across the street from the stoplight and crosswalk that leads onto the entrance to the Disneyland Resort and Downtown Disney. Walking to the park early morning to arrive before rope drop and, walking at night back to the hotel after the park
Manager Response: Dear JtD808, Thank you for your kind comments and for choosing to stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We are so happy to hear you thoroughly enjoyed our friendly service and our clean and comfortable accommodations. On behalf of our team, we thank you and look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I have stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites for years.  I am always happy with the service of all of staff, I had requested a room close to the front of the hotel for my last two stays but have been placed in rooms the furthest away from the front.  I am 73 years old and have issues with knees and feet.  I understand that they can't promise but am a bit disappointed because I made the reservation 4 months in advance.  On the whole it is a great place to stay and will probably reserve again for my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Kerry, Thank you so much for all the kind words, and we're delighted to know that our amazing team members impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Please know that our team members are always available to help you find more suitable accommodations during your visit, should they be available. Despite this, we hope you'll consider coming back to visit us again later down the road.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This is not a fancy hotel, if you’re looking for fancy go elsewhere. This was purely for price and connivence. Myself, husband, toddler, and infant had a nice stay. There was A/C, fridge, microwave, two beds (all the basics for traveling with two kids). It’s right next to the entrance of Disneyland and we just needed a place to sleep and shower, this was perfect. We did need additional supplies and the staff was so quick to accommodate. Staff was friendly from start to finish and S/O to the parking attendant kha “Kyle” for setting the friendly tone to our stay. We’re already planning our next Disney trip and plan to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 813stormb, Thank you for your wonderful review! It was a pleasure hosting you and your family during your recent visit. Receiving recognition for our hardworking and friendly staff and our convenient location is always appreciated. Knowing that you enjoyed yourself is the best compliment we could ask for. Returning guests pay us the greatest compliment by continuing to choose us, so we are already looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Management team
