Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel and my family and I love it so much. The staff is super friendly, very clean, and the best part is that it is right across the street from Disneyland park!
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that our clean accommodations and friendly team members impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! It's wonderful to know that you had a great time overall, and we hope to see you again the next time you find yourself in the area.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed a couple of days at the end of August 2022, in a 2 bedroom 1 1/2 bathroom suite.  Rooms were a good size, clean and exactly what we needed for our visit.  Staff was friendly and the continental breakfast was sufficient if you don't feel like going to the park to have breakfast. It was very hot when we were there and the a/c was up to the job.  The best thing is the location! Out the door, half a block down and cross the street to get to the entrance. Made coming and going very convenient as we found we took a lunch break off the park site both days.
Manager Response: From our amazing team members to our wonderful accommodations, we're thrilled that you enjoyed everything we offer at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Should you come to the area again, we hope you'll consider joining us once more.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Staff was very friendly and attentive.  Good sized room that was very clean. We had an AC noise issue that was promptly fixed.  Great location  right across street from Disneyland entrance.  Price was good. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Michele, We're thrilled to hear that our amazing team members and clean accommodations impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and that you had a great time overall. Thank you so much for your comments, and we hope to see you again at some point later down the road.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites from. September 10-18. When we arrive at the hotel; the front desk was very friendly and pleasant.  The workers on the property was very friendly and courteous also.  We also ate at their free continental breakfast, which they had granola bars, apples, oranges, breakfast pastries and their common items also ex: granola, milk, coffee, ion water filter/dispenser, cereal.   Also we tried their indoor swimming pool.  The kids enjoyed swimming in there.  And also there was a jacuzzi which the top jets wasn’t working during that time but foot jets worked perfectly fine .    The only complaint we had was the loud noise after everyone comes back from the parks, and also the water pressure for the showers could be a little stronger instead
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all the kind words, and we're thrilled that our fantastic team members, tasty breakfast, and wonderful amenities impressed you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! It would be a delight to host you again the next time you find yourself in the area, so please, hurry back!

Summary: This is one of the best locations you can pick for staying at a non-Disneyland property. The convenience is unmatched. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the on-site parking company was good. The rooms were comfortable, clean and enjoyable especially after a long day at the park. The only issues I had were the very lacking breakfast choices that the hotel provides and the wi-fi had a lot of connectivity issues. Otherwise I enjoyed my stay. More breakfast choices would put this hotel as one of the must stay at non-Disneyland hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Connor, Whether you are looking for comfy accommodations to relax in or an unbeatable location to explore, look no further than Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We hope you got plenty of R&R and made fantastic memories by checking out Disneyland nearby. Please let us know what breakfast options you would like to be added to our selections. Nevertheless, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We have stayed at this property for 15/20 years. Never disappoints. E we had a little hiccup the first morning we were here but staff responded and was taken care of immediately. We rented a scooter and could charge every night in lobby. Disneyland resort doesn’t even offer that service. Best thing is LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION. Staff is awesome and friendly as well. We will be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear Tina, We're proud to include you among our returning guests. It's great to know that our amazing location, facility amenities, and friendly staff keep your coming back to see us. Thank you for your kind words. Please come see us again soon at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Don't stay here! If you already booked be sure to lock up your things!!  Cleaning staff stole from our room. Breakfast included is terrible as well; cereal, apples or oranges, watery coffee and prepackaged dry pastries. Parking lot was very cramped with a car alarm going off often.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns regarding your recent visit. It saddens us to hear of any unfortunate issues you experienced with missing items from your room; we encourage our guests to notify our front desk team of any problems like this as soon as possible. While this is not a regular occurrence, we will certainly investigate your claims to ensure this does not happen going forward. However, we can assure you that our cleaning team did not take your items. We're also sorry to hear that the complimentary breakfast was not to your preference. We consider all feedback an opportunity to continually monitor guest satisfaction and review where improvements could be made.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We Loved having 2 rooms and 4 beds!  The proximity to Disneyland can't be beat. Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Would definitely stay here again. Will recommend this motel to all family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Donna, We want everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites to have an excellent visit, so we're happy to hear that was the case with you! It's great to know that our convenient, welcoming accommodations and comfortable rooms impressed you. The next time you're in town, we'd be happy to host you again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We love staying at Desert Inn & Suites. We’ve been coming here for years. It’s our ‘go to’ when visiting Disneyland. It’s adorable, very clean & can accommodate large families. Nice, friendly staff too.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're humbled to have earned your trust and your business with our immaculate accommodations and warm hospitality. Our team is already looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Affordable and super convenient! Our family has stayed at various hotels near Disneyland, and the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is, by far, the best location we have ever stayed. Only issue is parking
Manager Response: Dear Christopher, It was our pleasure to provide you with convenient, affordable accommodations. We're glad your overall stay was pleasant, and we appreciate your feedback about parking. The next time you're in town, please come see us again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: After a 5 hour flight, we arrived at the hotel around noon. I asked if there were any rooms available and she said it would be charge approx $40 dollars. Since we were already spending a lot to stay here I wasn’t paying so they put our bags in the room and we left. We came back around 5 and checked in, the staff were friendly.  The room has a strange layout. You walk in and the king bed is right there, no room to move. You have to walk past the bed to let others in the room. The bunk bed door had a lock on the outside, I guess if you want to lock your kids in the room…very strange. The towels and bedding could have all benefited from a wash with bleach. There were stains on the towels, and the bedding looked dingy.  On our second day I woke up around 7 to take a shower and get
Manager Response: Dear Heather, While we appreciate you reaching out, we are not sure you are speaking of our property. We do not offer early check-in, nor do we have bunk beds. Please know that we do try to keep this page open for our guests to leave their experience, so we do encourage you to move your review to the proper property. If you ever find yourself back in the area, we would be happy to show you all that we have to offer.

Summary: We always stay here when visiting the Disney Parks and Disney Convention.  We appreciate the larger rooms to choose from so we can spread out and have room for our luggage.  All staff members are helpful and kind.  And the location is fantastic!
Manager Response: Dear Riley, Thank you for choosing to stay with us again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites; we love welcoming back our returning guests. It is great to hear you once again liked our spacious rooms and had pleasant interactions with our friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you again when you are next in the area.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We enjoy this hotel. Great location, Clean rooms, close to restaurants and love the fireworks viewing deck. Rooms are a bit dated, could use a coat of paint and new decor but not what concerns me while at Disneyland all day.  We stay aprox 3x a year.
Manager Response: It's always wonderful to welcome back repeat guests, and you're no exception. We're thrilled to know that our clean accommodations and wonderful amenities at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites left a positive impression on you. We can't wait to have the chance to host you again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Had a great time staff was amazing only down side is having to pay for a locker because our room was not ready and we wanted to Disneyland they would not take care of our bags had to pay for a locker with them to do that.
Manager Response: Dear Oscar, It's wonderful to know that our friendly team members helped make your visit to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and Disneyland that much better. We hope to have the chance to host you again, so please, hurry back!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Best price for location! Clean too!!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. We took advantage of the fireworks viewing deck on our arrival day. It was so close to the Disneyland Resort, maybe a 5 minute walk. The continental breakfast was a little lackluster but did the job.   Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all the kind words about your recent visit to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, and we're delighted that our wonderful location left a positive impression on you. We can't wait to host you again, so please, hurry back!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Clean rooms, comfortable beds, plenty of space for bigger families, and literally right across the street from Disneyland main entrance. Breakfast included was underwhelming, basically cereal and breakfast bars, but it was enough to keep the kids happy. Coffee was very bad. If the pool were an outdoor pool I’d give this hotel a 5 star review. Indoor pool was ok, again the kids were happy, I just prefer outdoor pools. Rooftop patio to view fireworks was great, but for some reason it’s closed until just before 9:30 “due to covid”, even though you’ve been in close contact with others in the breakfast room and pool, never mind Disneyland. Inexpensive stay, good place if you just want a bed to sleep after a long Disney day.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We are happy to hear that you appreciated our proximity to Disney, comfortable accommodations, and reasonable rates. It was truly a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Just came back from a 6 night, 3 generation family trip to Disneyland with the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites as our home base for 6 adults and 4 children.  The convenience of being able to walk to the main entrance to Disneyland in about 10 minutes was all we could have hoped for.  Rooms were very clean and provided plenty of room, with very comfortable beds and with a small fridge and microwave  providing options for storing and/or preparing drinks and snacks.  Staff were very welcoming and courteous.  Continental breakfast was simple but adequate to start the day, and Denny's and iHOP on either side of the property provided the options for a more substantial morning start when needed.  For the prices being charged for the rooms, the value is outstanding.  This is our second
Manager Response: What a truly lovely review to receive! We are thrilled to have had the opportunity to provide you and your extended family with a comfortable and convenient place to stay at a reasonable rate during your Disney vacation. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We’ve stayed here for three Disneyland trips and you can’t beat the value and location. The rooms are spacious and clean, staff are friendly and accommodating. There are no frills, but we feel safe, it’s reasonably quiet, and after logging miles at the park it’s amazing to walk across the street and flop down on the couch or bed. We enjoyed the pool on check-in and check-out days. Breakfast in the post-covid era leaves some to be desired (cereal, granola bars, packaged pastries), but it’s worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Our incredible location near Disneyland is hard to beat, and we trust you found our spacious and clean accommodations to be a restful retreat after a busy day at the theme park. We'll see you again next time you vacation in Anaheim!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Amazing hotel to stay at and a great price. If you cannot afford the expensive hotels on Disneyland property, this is the hotel for you. It was also close enough to bring toddler back for afternoon nap so we could enjoy Disneyland fireworks and electric parade without a tired tot. We will definitely be booking again on our next Disneyland trip. 5 min walk to main entrance, Ihop and Denny’s close, simple complimentary breakfast. We got a room furthest away from the street as well as a request. Recommend park your car under shaded area. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Mandee, Thank you for your glowing review of your stay with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We are glad that our fantastic location was perfect for your trip and that you appreciated our affordable rates. The next time that you are in the area, we would be honored to welcome your family back again!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed 5 nights in July and had a really good time.  One of the main reasons we picked this hotel was location, having stayed at others in the area on previous trips.  The hotel was pretty much exactly as advertised. We had an early flight and loved that there were very reasonably priced lockers on site we could use to store our items and head to the park.  Check in was quick and easy.  The room itself was as expected.  Nothing fancy but had what we needed.  We stayed in one of the two bedroom units with a full bath on one side and a toilet/sink on the other.  This was perfect for our needs.  The room was comfortable and clean.  Lots of towels, though they are a bit on the small side.  The small fridge was great for us to keep snacks and drinks in and the microwave was nice
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful experience with us. It brings us great joy to know that you enjoyed so much about your stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. It would be an honor to welcome you back, so please return soon for another five-star time.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Families
Summary: We stayed here for eight nights while visiting Disneyland and very much enjoyed our stay. The hotel is a very short walk to Disneyland which allowed us to go back to the hotel in the middle of the day to rest and then return to Disney in the evening.  We stayed in a Parlour suite which provided two adjoining rooms, 4 queen beds, 1.5 bathrooms, a small fridge and a microwave. Lots of room for a family of five including 3 teenagers. The room was clean, the staff were friendly and helpful and the viewing deck on the roof provided a great view of the fireworks. The only thing which would have made the stay a slightly bit better would be an expansion of the breakfast offerings - perhaps a toaster with bread options, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, mandarin oranges and some healthier cereal
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review of your stay with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are thrilled that our fantastic location was perfect for your needs and that you appreciated our top-notch accommodations and stunning views. The next time that you find yourself headed our way, we would be honored to welcome your family back for another exceptional stay!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Very clean rooms - no funky smells -  we booked the double adjoining two queens (family suite) and were given room 212.  Parking was easy.  Breakfast was so-so    Granola bars, fresh fruit, packaged pastry, juices, milk, coffee, cereal.  Staff was very nice.  I slept great.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to see that our spotless accommodations and convenient parking, as well as our welcoming staff added to your visit. You can be confident that your feedback on our breakfast offerings will be kept in mind as we move forward, and we hope that you will give us another chance to exceed your expectations down the line.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay close to Disneylamd
Summary: Clean, comfortable and a very good value hotel.  Very close walking distance to the main gates.  Great job and will stay again. Staff was very accommodating and the valet staff were very helpful with our car during our stay.
Manager Response: Being a part of your wonderful stay is the greatest compliment, and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our cozy accommodations, prime location, local attractions, and friendly staff. Please come back soon for another memorable five-star experience.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel since 2011. They are clean and the staff is excellent and friendly. Always my first choice. They are just across the street from the bus loading zone which it makes it convent with little ones to go back and take a nap through out the day.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie, At Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, we take great pride in ensuring our guests feel welcome and comfortable, and we are happy that you and your family got that from us during your Disneyland trip. Thank you for being our valued guests, and until next time, we wish you happy and safe travels.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Have stayed at Anaheim Desert Inn every year for more than 13 years while visiting Disneyland. Clean comfortable rooms, easy walk (7 min walk to Disneyland, including waiting for the signal light at the corner). Will not stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Wow! Our Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites team is delighted to know that you continue to come back and stay with us while enjoying our great value and all we offer. Until next time, we wish you happy and safe travels.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Had a very nice stay at the Desert Inn!  Only downside, no hot breakfast.  Stayed in a two room suit. Rooms were clean and big enough for our family. Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you can’t afford the resort hotels or need extra room for a large family, this hotel is decent. Great location, easy access to crosswalk to Dland and Dennys is next door. Indoor pool the kids will like but don’t expect to relax in the hot tub if kids are swimming. Their screams echo off the walls and can be very loud, we had to leave. FYI: get pool towels at front desk.  We stayed in the rooms towards the front of the hotel (as requested: less walking) Room was old but clean. Beds were comfortable. Light outside the room was bright while sleeping. Door to the outside wasn’t sealed properly. We had no trouble connecting with the wifi. They offer “breakfast” 7-9:30, coffee, Oj, cereal, fruit (apple/orange) & pre packaged danish.  FYI: In room coffee is terrible, go to the
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out and sharing your experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our refreshing pool, prime location, and comfortable accommodations. On the other hand, we also appreciate you for letting us know what was not to your satisfaction, as we constantly work hard to improve in the areas that matter most to our valued guests. In the future, we hope you consider returning for an even better time' we're confident we can impress you.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Always a great time, our 5th stay at the property. You can’t beat the location! Rooftop fireworks we enjoyed, mid-day break in the pool, friendly staff.  We definitely will be back when we visit again!
Manager Response: Dear Amberg, Thank you for your loyal patronage! We're glad our convenient location and friendly staff continue to impress you. It's also great to know that you enjoyed the fireworks. If you're in the area again, please come back to see us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Easy  walk across the street to the park. Many room choices for various family sizes. Indoor pool and hot tub to beat the heat with the kids. Very clean rooms, comfortable too. Breakfast is included, very professional and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear Mary, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you had a fantastic stay with us and that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable accommodations, convenient location close to area theme parks, lovely pool area, and helpful staff. Please allow us to host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Familiar faces are a welcome sight, so come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Well, once again Desert Inn and Suites was just what we wanted.  A helpful staff, clean and comfortable rooms and oh so close to Disneyland!!!  For the price this hotel can not be beat.  The only negative is the breakfast was really bad, it use to have hardboiled eggs and toast but now just had packaged pastries, still fruit! and cereal.  Still, will stay here again next time!!!
Manager Response: Dear Pete, Thank you for the outstanding rating of your recent stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We love to hear from returning guests that they've had another wonderful time with us. Our clean and comfortable accommodations, helpful service, convenient location close to area theme parks, and exceptional value are among the many reasons our patrons return to visit with us year after year. Your comments are important to us, and we will use them as we continually work to improve our breakfast menu. It will be our pleasure to host you again when you return to Anaheim, so come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Can’t beat the location for the price
Summary: Almost directly across the rd, indoor pool, breakfast included  Great view of the fireworks from the roof  Try avoid rooms near ice machines, they are used all day and all night and sound like someone kicking at the door they are so loud
Manager Response: Dear Sommer, We were happy to provide you with convenient, affordable accommodations. It's great to know that you enjoyed the pool and breakfast and that the wonderful views added to your experience. If you find yourself back in the area, please come see us again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We do love this hotel. It has some very minor issues that can be resolved with maintenance. Doors between rooms wouldn’t close the microwave wouldn’t turntable wouldn’t turn so it would burn food if you weren’t watching, but a very minor issue. We had a great experience. Friendly accommodating staff. We love how close it is to the parks. We will be back in February we are already booked.
Manager Response: Dear Justin, Thanks for joining us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. With an enviable location just across the street from Disneyland, our hotel is the perfect choice for a vacation in Anaheim! We're grateful for your constructive feedback, and we'll work to address those minor maintenance issues. On behalf of our friendly team, we can't wait to see you again in February!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed as a family with teen kids.  Our stay was comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful.  We had the parlor suite.  The room was just what we needed for a Disneyland visit. It was clean and very close to both Disney parks. The breakfast was just enough to get us going in the morning for rope drop. The breakfast room was open from about 7-9 and consisted of cereals, juice, coffee, packaged danishes and granola bars and most days apples and oranges. The indoor pool and spa was clean, and so nice to cool off and relax in during an afternoon break from the park as well as out of direct sunlight. The sofa bed was not particularly comfortable and had some gaps at the head, but came in handy for an extra bed, and it was nice to have that extra space. The rooms are not
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and recommendation! We're glad our comfortable, welcoming accommodations and convenient location were ideal for your family. If your adventures bring you back to town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We have stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn before. The hotel is clean and very conveniently located across the street from the parks. It is about a 5 minute walk. We booked the Family parlor suite and it was perfect! It has two rooms and 3 queen beds. The staff is very friendly. My only complaint is the beds are not very comfortable. But we were so tired from a long day it didn't really matter.
Manager Response: Dear Jenn, We're proud to include you among our returning guests. It's great to know that our clean, convenient accommodations and friendly staff continue to impress you. However, we apologize for any issues with the beds, and we'll keep your comments in mind. Should you be in the area again, please come back to see us.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Very close to Disneyland.  Across the street.  Nice folks at front desk.  Rooms were quiet, large and clean.  Continental breakfast but wish had hard boiled eggs. Had cereal, oat bars, milk, coffee and apples and oranges.
Manager Response: Dear Fran, We aim to impress everyone who stays at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our convenient location and clean, quiet rooms impressed you. Our friendly staff will also be glad you felt welcome while you were here. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The location is great, it's only about 100 feet from the crosswalk across Harbor Blvd. from Disny. The breakfast was minimal.  A minor thing was that our room didn't have garbage bags in the trash cans.
Manager Response: Dear David, Thank you so much for highlighting our wonderful location. With so much to do nearby, we hope you had a blast checking it all out. Please let us know what we could've added to our breakfast menu. Nevertheless, come back and revisit us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites anytime you need another amazing Disney getaway.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Disneyland visit - couldn't be a closer walk to the entrance(s). Appreciate the layout of various rooms (this time we had a C1 parlor suite plus an A parlor suite) - lots of room & well-furnished. Friendly & efficient staff. We've come here many times & will continue to do so.
Manager Response: We were delighted to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. You can't beat our incredible location directly across the street from Disneyland! It's terrific to read our thoughtfully designed accommodations were a perfect match for your vacation. On behalf of our friendly team, we're already looking forward to your next stay!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Loved how close it is to the parks! Rooms are average. Maid service was every other day and they did a good job of cleaning the room. Breakfast wasn't much, just cereal and oat bars, milk, coffee and some fruit. Was ok.
Manager Response: Debra, It's terrific that our proximity to Disney was convenient for you! That said, it appears we have some work to do in other areas. Your comments are important and will be used to help us make positive improvements. Nevertheless, it was a joy to host you, and we hope you'll come back and see us again!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Our room was clean and quiet.  All of the employees are friendly and very helpful. . We enjoyed using the pool and spa. It is a short easy walk to Disneyland and California Adventure parks. I have stayed at this hotel twice and like it. I recommend Anaheim Desert Inns and Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Jannen, It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our clean, quiet rooms provided you with the ideal place to rest and that you enjoyed the pool. The next time you're looking for convenient, welcoming accommodations in the area, please come back to see us,  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Location is very good for entering and exiting parks.  Rooms are clean with restaurants next door.  We had an issue with noisy neighbors and WiFi connections going in and out both on our phones and the TV.  It could have been our location at the back of the property?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We are happy to hear that you appreciated our convenient location and clean accommodations. We intend to provide our guests with a peaceful and quiet atmosphere, and our team members are always available to address noise concerns. Happy travels to you, and we hope to see you again soon!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stay here so we can run back in the afternoons to shower, rest for a couple hot afternoon hours..... Also, the beds are great... everything else simple: a room, shower, microwave, fridge... What else do you need for a DLand/DCA trip?
Manager Response: Dear Rachel, We loved having you as our guest at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. It sounds like we checked all the boxes for a terrific stay with our convenient location near Disneyland and our cozy, well-equipped accommodations. The pleasure was all ours, and we'll see you again next time you return to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The front desk staff & the valet staff were very helpful and friendly. The housekeeping staff did a great job keeping the rooms clean. My family and I always enjoy our stay at the hotel. It’s also super convenient when visiting Disneyland/DCA. I look forward to staying at the hotel again. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Bradley, Making our valued guests feel welcome and comfortable is important to us, and we are delighted to hear that you approved. It was a pleasure having you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so please come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great hotel that is one of the closest to Disneyland
Summary: Great place to stay that is close to the park. Customer service up front was very nice and friendly. The kids loved using the pool and spa and enjoyed watching the firework show from the rooftop. I initially gave it a 4 star rating because of some issues with the parking but am editing it to 5 stars because that issue was be promptly resolved and went above my expectations to resolve it.
Manager Response: Dear Luke, Thank you for the outstanding rating of your recent stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We're glad you and your family enjoyed your visit with us and our convenient location close to area theme parks, lovely pool area, and excellent service. It's great to hear that the issue you had with parking was quickly resolved. It would be our pleasure to host you again on a return trip to Anaheim, so come back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The location is walking distance to Disneyland... it's faster to walk from the hotel than parking at the Disneyland Lot and taking a tram into the parks. This is very helpful when leaving the parks and everyone is tired. You will be back to your room before everyone else is even back to their cars in the Disneyland Parking Lot. Many fast food and sit-down options are also located within walking distance (under 15 minutes).
Manager Response: Dear Richard,  Thank you for making Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites part of your Disneyland vacation. Our location makes us the perfect spot for visiting the parks, and we hope you come back for another amazing stay soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: First time staying at the hotel. The room was very clean. Air conditioner was a little loud, but other than that it was great. Can’t beat the price. And walking distance from Disneyland made it perfect. All of the staff was very friendly. Valet guys were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are proud to deliver great value to our guests, so we are delighted that you found your experience to be well priced. It's so great to hear that you appreciated our convenient location and friendly team. We hope you will visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This hotel is maybe a 6 Minute walk with the crosswalk time. It is clean, always a parking spot, the workers are great, and help with whatever they can. This is the second time I have stayed there with my family, and I won’t stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're glad that our exceptional location and fantastic service paved the way for another exceptional experience for you and your family. Next time you're in the area, we hope you'll remember our excellent value and come see us again!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: If you’re going to Disney, you want a place you can get back to at the the end of the night without having to wait for a shuttle or take a long walk. This place does that. It was so nice having a close place.   The rooms don’t have great insulation. We could hear everything going on outside our room. That was the only complaint for me.
Manager Response: Dear Craig, We always appreciate hearing from our guests, and we're glad our location worked well for your trip. However, we apologize for any concerns about noise, and we'll keep your comments in mind. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Proximity to Disneyland is the main draw to the Desert Inn and Suites.  Literally took less than 5 minutes (including waiting at the crosswalk) to walk to the entrance to the park.  This is not a luxury hotel by any means, but the beds were comfortable and the room was spacious and included a mini-fridge.  All staff was very friendly and helpful.  Also provided breakfast each morning and a roof-top terrace for watching fireworks from the park each evening.  We were very pleased with our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Ross,  It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! From our comfortable accommodations to our friendly team, we strive to exceed expectations with every visit. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Nice spacious room, Comfortable beds, mini fridge and air worked great. The carpet had just been cleaned so the room had a little stench thankfully I traveled with some Lysol. Mini fridge kept our items cold.
Manager Response: Dear Julie, Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We are thrilled to know that you appreciated our spacious and comfortable accommodations. However, we are sorry for your experience with the carpet, and we will review this matter with our team. Happy travels to you, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: The price and distance was great value
Summary: Hello, even tho the place it’s a little outdated but for the price and location you really can’t beat it! Would for sure stay here again. The indoor pool was pretty outdated, and they don’t hold luggages but you gotta pay for you’re own locker which i found very strange. Front desk Melanie was amazing! Very sweet and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Collin, We were happy to provide you with affordable, welcoming accommodations, and we're glad our location was ideal for your trip. Thank you for your suggestions for improvement. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Location is great. Staff was very courteous and helpful. I called ahead of my reservation a few times with some questions and the staff was great in answering my questions. The rooms aren't big, but if the goal is Disneyland, then you probably aren't spending much time in there anyway. The only issue I had was that I needed to request extra soap - we only had 1 tiny bar between the sink and shower, but that was pretty minor - the front desk had no issue giving us some extra.
Manager Response: Dear Franky, It was a pleasure to host you during your recent visit. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review, and we're glad to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and friendly staff. That being said, we apologize that other aspects of your experience did not meet your expectations, and we have notified our team of your comments. It would be an honor to welcome you back to our hotel the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Location- couldn't be closer to Disneyland/CA adventure-easy walk over. Room- clean and no issues, very impressed! Amenities- Pool and hot tub were great(and clean), needed bandaids from blisters on feet and front desk guy gave us 8! Above and beyond customer service for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Burke, Our team is committed to providing our guests with a top-notch experience, so we're thrilled that this was the case for you! We would love nothing more than to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, so come and see us again!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed here last year and loved it so much, we stayed there again this year. You can't beat the close proximity to the Disney parks. The rooms are spacious and the staff does a great job of keeping the rooms and the property clean. Everyone is so friendly. We loved watching the fireworks from the roof deck and another night from the comfort of our own room. It felt like a TV commercial. The pool was fun but a little cold. Parking was a little crowded but the Valet staff does a great job of accommodating the cars.
Manager Response: Dear Mike, We're proud to include you among our returning guests. It's great to know that our close proximity to Disney was ideal for your trip and that our attention to cleanliness and service impressed you. Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed watching the fireworks. It would be a pleasure to host you again should you be back in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Can't beat the location. So close to the gates. Great for kids who need mid day breaks. The fireworks viewing deck is great. The kids liked the pool. The laundry facility is very handy.  Beds were not the most comfortable but rooms were clean. The lights outside the rooms are so bright it lights up the room at night. We have to use a blanket and hang over windows.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us! We are happy to know that you appreciated our proximity to the gates, lovely pool and deck area, and convenient laundry facilities. It is also wonderful to hear that you found your room to be clean. Happy travels to you, and we hope to see you again in the future!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you’re headed to Disneyland
Summary: The staff was helpful and friendly. It’s so close to Disneyland, I was able to go back to our cool, clean room for a rest/nap during the hottest time of the day. Lots of dining options close.  Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, Attentive service, a convenient location, and spotless accommodations are all aspects of staying with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites that our guests can rely on, and we are thrilled to hear that you appreciated them as well! Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope that you will come back to see us again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The room was clean and spacious enough for all 5 of us. Within walking distance to Disneyland was a huge plus, especially for the price. Parking was reasonable per night, and everyone we interacted with was nice. Next to multiple restaurants which was helpful in saving costs inside the parks. Rooftop access to watch the fireworks was awesome and the continental breakfast was nice to grab on the way to the parks in the morning. 10/10, would recommend and stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Haley, Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation! We're glad our clean, convenient accommodations and tasty breakfast impressed you. It would be a pleasure to host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Everyone was very helpful in finding us a last minute room and after having such a bad experience at a Neightbor hotel the staff was so nice and understanding. We will definitely come back! Thank you so much for finding us a room at a gray price
Manager Response: Dear Isabel, It was our pleasure to accommodate you when other arrangements did not work out. We're glad you appreciated our friendly staff and affordable rates, and we look forward to your next stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This location is prime for walking into the park. Breakfast was slim but lots of options with iHop and Denny’s next door if you want more substantial.  Our room was clean- beds fine. Pillows were flatter than a pancake & could certainly use an upgrade.  Parking is easy with valet. Charged $17/day regardless if self park or valet. All the employees were efficient and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We are happy to know that you appreciated our friendly and efficient staff members, convenient location, clean accommodations, and easy parking options. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This is a very nice motel. It is in a great location right across the street from Disneyland. Right near the crosswalk. We had the C2 Parlor Family Suite. We stayed here this time instead of another motel down the street because we needed the extra room. This was very spacious and just what we needed for traveling with our adult family members. We had 3 generations along and everyone felt like they had their own space. The rooms were very quiet and clean. Housekeeping came in every other day to clean. This was sufficient for our needs. Breakfast was grab and go but very helpful to have something to eat in the morning before going to Disneyland. We usually grabbed it and ate it on the walk to the park. We had a great view of the fireworks from the window in our room. The reason
Manager Response: We were honored to host three generations of your family at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! It's wonderful that you enjoyed watching fireworks from the window of our spacious accommodations! Our team always welcomes constructive feedback, and your thoughtful comments on our parking will certainly be discussed. Despite this, we appreciate you mentioning our clean and quiet environment! The pleasure was all ours, and we hope to welcome you back again in the future!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Room was nice and cool upon arrival. Easy checkin and out. Parking was easy. We could see fireworks from our suite. Breakfast only continental. Front desk service is excellent. Picked up my scooter in lobby.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're glad our comfortable rooms and friendly staff impressed you. Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed the view. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I booked this property for the location, which is across the street from Disneyland main entrance, and that we could book adjoining rooms. It was clean, quiet and had comfy beds. The A/C worked very well. The continental breakfast was minimal, but there is a Denny's next door for bigger breakfast eaters.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy, It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our convenient location and clean, quiet rooms were ideal for your trip. If your adventures bring you back to the area, please come see us again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We stayed in the far back - Room 132.  While I understand it's a vacation hotel, Disneyland was open until midnight.  Why did the guests outside our door choose to have a loud chat until 2 am, I don't know.  The beds were just OK.  The bathroom smelled strange.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan, Thank you for your recent stay, and we appreciate you taking the time to share your valuable comments. While we're pleased you enjoyed our convenient location close to Disneyland, it saddens us to hear we fell short of meeting your expectations. We're sorry to learn of any noise disturbance you encountered from other guests; we encourage you to reach out to our front desk team to alert them to any issues like this so we can intervene and ensure you have a comfortable night. All feedback is gratefully received and allows us to monitor guest satisfaction continually. We hope to have the opportunity to impress you the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I like this hotel for its proximity to Disney,  it is clean and safe. I wish it was more guest friendly and offered complimentary luggage storage. They charge to store bags. They do have a nice breakfast offering...upgraded continental. I like that they still offer a grab and go option. The coffee is good and there is a water bottle refill station.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia, We're so happy to hear you had a great time with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Our clean, safe accommodations and of course our prime location to Disneyland are just some of the reasons guests love to stay with us, so it's delightful to hear you enjoyed them as well. The next time you're in the area, please do not hesitate to visit us again.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I’m he room itself was comfortable. Minimal but with a fridge. The location is impossible to beat. Literally cross the intersection and you’re in Disney. The pool is indoors and the water was cold and very murky. Also very limited chairs, seating. Parking was $19 a night. Paid close to $250 for a night. You are definitely paying for location and location only. There isn’t a mart or store here you have to walk a ways to another hotel or 7-eleven and water in the vending machine is $4.
Manager Response: Dear Sophia, It was a pleasure to host you during your recent visit. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review, and we're glad to hear you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and convenient location. That being said, we apologize that other aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations, and we have notified our staff of your comments. Should you be in the area again, we would be grateful for another chance to change your perceptions of our hotel.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Every trip to Disneyland,  we've stayed here over the years, for the last 30 years!  It's never disappointed!  We'd obviously like to spend a little less on future trips, rather than spending more, but overall, we've reluctantly paid the price for the consistent service and convenience of this hotel.  Unless the prices get out of our range or the service declines, we wouldn't make any other choice in visits to come. Thank you!
Manager Response: What a truly wonderful review to receive! We are honored to know that we have been able to consistently provide you with the same level of quality and service over the last 30 years. It is always a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to many more years to come!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Check in was smooth, we were even able to swim in the pool before our room was ready and that was nice. The location is nice and our room was clean. That is it. There is absolutely nothing special about this hotel. It is old and dated. The bed is ok. I suggest bringing your own towels and maybe your own sheets as theirs felt rough.  They don’t replace the towels in a timely matter. The walls are thin, very thin. We made a joke because on our first night there we went to bed early and the people next door did not and we were up early for rope drop at Disneyland. We probably could have easily complained about each other. We were on the fourth floor and the elevator closes to us did not work properly. Breakfast was a joke, don’t bother it’s not worth it. The parking was not too
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your input with us, and we value your feedback. First, it is lovely to hear that you appreciated our easy check-in process, convenient location, and clean accommodations. However, we are sorry to hear about your concerns with the bedding and towels. In addition, we apologize if you were troubled by excess noise from your neighbors. Your comments are important to us as we constantly strive to provide our guests with the best possible experience. We wish you happy and safe travels and hope you consider returning in the future for a better time.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: This hotel is awesome! We stayed in a family suite with 7 people. 2 large rooms, a sofa bed and 2 baths.  It was very clean. We were right across the street from Disneyland and it was so convenient!  We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your lovely comments with us! We are thrilled to know that we were able to provide you and your companions with the comfortable accommodations that you needed to enjoy your Disneyland vacations. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again in the future!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I’m overall satisfied with my visit. I’ll do some pros and cons. Pro is location. It was probably the second closest hotel and we loved that. It was clean and the employees were friendly. The rooftop access during the firework show is a wonderful addition. There are plenty of places to eat and drink nearby. In our room there were two TVS and a separate area with a door. We loved that. Con was the pool. It was indoor and extremely hard to breathe with all the chemicals in there. The beds were also very uncomfortable and bad for backs. The water also took a very long time to heat up and didn’t last long. It was an outdated hotel but the price was good. Overall we would stay again but would love some changes.
Manager Response: Dear Shane, Thank you for sharing your input with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your overall visit and appreciated our convenient location, clean accommodations, and friendly staff members. However, we will certainly take your concern regarding the pool into consideration, and we apologize for this matter. In addition, we will review your comments about the hot water. Thank you, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Room was decent size and staff very helpful. The main reason for choosing this hotel is the location which is directly across the street from Disneyland. The main entrance is basically in front of the hotel entrance. They conviently are located between ihop and Denny’s and they have an awesome Mexican restaurant that just opened that is owned by sisters that has a bar and delicious authentic Mexican food. Loved it. And the lead bartender was super friendly gave me a glass of water while I waited for the food. The kids loved walking to the park it took seconds. Crossing the street. There are three hotels also around that are comparable but this one was convienant. Not a five star and I would bring my own sheets but nobody bothered us rooms quiet for sleep and nobody spent too
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to host you for your Disneyland trip! Hopefully, your room allowed you to rest comfortably after your theme park adventures, and we're glad our location made it easy for you to dine in the area. Your positive feedback is much appreciated, and we wish you well until next time!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The hotel is rundown and in need of a major overhaul. Having typed this, I should also add, it’s clean and the proximity to Disneyland can only be beat by Disney’s onsite hotels: Grand Californian and Disneyland Hotel. It’s also less than half the price.  A great choice if the ability to walk to the parks is important to you. It is to me.
Manager Response: Dear Scott, Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you found our location convenient for your needs and that your room was clean. Please know we are always striving to improve our guest experience and will discuss your comments with our team. We thank you for your feedback and hope you will allow us another opportunity to host you in the future.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We could not have asked for a better location to accommodate our large family group. We had the family suite which allowed us all (9 people) to share a room. It was only a 5 minute walk to the theme park entrances so leaving for rest breaks was simple.  Breakfast left something to be desired. Surely they can do better than pre-packaged pastries, cereal and some juice. That said, it was adequate to keep our stomachs from rumbling.  The pool and hot tub are indoors and were clean when we visited. Self-parking is a bit of a nightmare so we used the valet. They were efficient and friendly.  At the price we paid, this hotel is a great bargain and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, and we're ecstatic you were impressed! We're so happy you enjoyed our wonderful accommodations as well as our ideal location. Thank you for your kind review, and we look forward to your next stay with us.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Loved that the location is across the street of Disneyland. The room is clean and all have the basic needs. Breakfast needs more choices or variety like eggs and bread. All receptionist are friendly and accommodating. Special mention to Ruben who helped us in our parking and the tall white guy who worked morning shift, I forgot his name but they truly gave us an exceptional customer service. It’s our third times booking in Desert Inn and will definitely book the place again on our next Disneyland adventure.
Manager Response: When traveling to Disneyland, there's no better place to stay than Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. With our convenient location and top-notch service, you can always expect to have a fantastic time with us. Thank you so much for the review. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I will be honest, i was a bit worried granite how old the hotel is. it is definitely outdated. HOWEVER, it far exceeded our expectations. We checked in Saturday, our room was a suite. beds were comfy, everything was great. breakfast was exactly what we expected for a hotel breakfast. oatmeal, cereal, danishes. i guess covid really changed things. staff was friendly. saw a guest being rude to a staff member working breakfast Sunday morning, and she handled her self professionally. all in all, i will stay here again. probably our new go to. location was great. if fireworks weren't cancelled their roof top would have been amazing to catch them. maybe one suggestion, maybe more soap lol for a family of 5 we had to make it work lol
Manager Response: Dear Selina, Here at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, it is always our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, and we are thrilled to hear that we managed to succeed in that for you during your recent visit. Thank you for your kind compliments on our attentive and professional staff, as well as our fantastic location. It was an absolute pleasure hosting you, and we would be honored to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Love Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites
Summary: Absolutely love this hotel. Stephanie at the front desk was nothing but amazing. She helped us from the moment we booked the reservation to the time we checked in. She was extremely friendly! The rooms were clean and very close to Disneyland. The breakfast was great. Can’t forget to mention the awesome vallet worker named Ruben. Every single person We interacted with was amazing!! Thank you for a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: Our team is committed to providing our guests with a top-notch experience, so we're thrilled that this was the case for you! We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our team, and we can't wait to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites in the future.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: One of the best locations. It is across the street from the Disneyland Resort main entrance. The service was good, the valet parking was also good. Breakfast was very poor, but the hotel is between an IHOP and a Dennys.  I would definitely recommend this hotel. I'll book it the next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Javier, Thank you for the kind review and recommendation! We're glad our location was convenient for your needs and our friendly staff made you feel welcome. However, we apologize for any disappointment with breakfast, and we'll keep your comments in mind. Should you be in the area again, please come back to see us.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Loved our stay there Always a great place to stay no one ever bothers you there everything is Perfect There is a nice breakfast in the morning to start you on your way parking is always available they accommodated us on getting a Scooter
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, It was a pleasure to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites during your recent visit. We're delighted to hear you had such a positive experience and the opportunity to try our delicious breakfast menu, as well as appreciated the convenience of our parking. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind comments, and we hope to host your next visit to the area.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay for   Disneyland
Summary: Rooms were clean and well stocked with towels and soap. Breakfast included bran flakes, a necessity for us older folks. Reception staff was very friendly and helpful. Spacious lockers are available to store luggage for early arrivals, or when checking out while staying in the area after 11AM. Bring 5 quarters. Rooms are relatively quiet even when close to Harbor Blvd. Denny's and IHOP next door. If you rent a wheelchair or electric scooter, they will be waiting for you in reception on arrival, and you can leave them there when you check out. Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Piper, It was a pleasure to welcome you as our guest, and we're elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your thoughtful review; we are thrilled to see that you appreciated our well-appointed suites, friendly team, and convenient location to Disneyland. It's great to know you'll visit us again when you return to Anaheim. Familiar faces are a welcome sight!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay right across the main entrance of Disney!
Summary: We had a great stay to enjoy the Disney parks last week! -Super short walk to Disneyland and California Adventure parks which are directly across the street from the hotel. -Hotel is close to on and off-ramps to the I-5 freeway. -Bathroom was clean and shower head was nice; water was always hot and water pressure was perfect. -Air conditioner was nice and cold. -Continental breakfast with pre-packaged pastries, juices, sometimes oatmeal, dry cereals, some fruits. -Friendly staff at the front desk and prompt attention when we needed additional sets of towels in the room. -You can view the Disney fireworks show from the upper levels of the stairwell on the breakfast room side of the hotel. -Air conditioner is outside the bathroom/shower room, and sink is outside the bathroom, so
Manager Response: Dear Lisale, Despite a couple of hiccups, we're glad that you enjoyed the majority of your stay with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Please know that our team is always willing to assist should you bring us any concerns, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're looking for a convenient place to stay near the Disney parks.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Awesome place ! Been staying here for 7 years! Pros : Closeness to Disneyland, great military discount,  Parlor A suite is affordable and big. Cons: Front staff seemed a little rude or puttoff when I asked for early check-in, the elevator situation needs to be updated.
Manager Response: Despite some issues you encountered with our front desk team and the elevator, we're happy to hear our property could once again be a place of convenience for you during your Disney trip. We hope you and your friends had a blast, and we can't wait to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites in the future.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: I received a free room upgrade when I was assigned a room that was getting worked on. The room was clean, the beds are comfortable and a very short walk from Disneyland which is great! Only complaint is the water pressure in the showers, and the height of the shower head. I'm 5'8" and I could barely get under the shower head.
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to see that our comfy and clean accommodations were a highlight of your visit. If you're looking for a fantastic location to explore Disneyland, look no further than Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We loved having you and can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Sincerely, Management team

Summary Heading: Clean, updated and super close to Disneyland!
Summary: Our rooms were clean and updated.  The pool was great for the kids.  We were a stone's throw to Disneyland.  Only drawback is that we were not close to a supermarket by walking.   We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and we stayed on budget!
Manager Response: Whether you are looking for modern accommodations to relax in or a fun-filled pool to enjoy, you can bet that Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites will provide this and more. Thank you so much for the fantastic review. We hope you had a blast checking out Disneyland. Come back and visit us again anytime!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The hotel was clean and quiet and comfortable.  The staff was very accommodating and helpful when we had questions or needs. We got locked out of our room a few times because the key cards are tricky and that was frustrating, but the staff quickly responded. Would be nice for them to fix this system issue though, since it seems to be a known problem and happened to us more than once on the trip.  The breakfast was adequate, for being prepackaged pastries and cereals. It would have been nice for it to be open just a little bit earlier than 7:00 a.m. but 7:00 a.m. was adequate. The beds were a little bit stiff for my taste. The shower configuration is pretty awful and my tall husband had to essentially bend over to get a shower. But the water was hot and the space was all quite
Manager Response: Dear Cindy,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We are happy to have had the opportunity to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and friendly place to stay. We appreciate you choosing Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and hope you will be back to see us on your next visit to the area. Thank you again, and safe travels!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: The mark of good customer service is not about being 100% perfect every minute but in how an establishment behaves when there is a problem. We had a slight problem with our room when we checked in. When I went back to the front office to request a new room I discovered there were no available rooms left in our catagory but the manager cheerfully upgraded us to a family suite. We had a wonderful time and will continue our patronage in the future. (We’ve been regulars for many years every time we visit Disneyland).
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to host you during your recent visit. We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review. While we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with your first room, we are thrilled to hear our friendly staff was able to quickly find a satisfactory solution for you! It would be our honor to host you again at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Location Location Location! Loved being right across the street from Disneyland. Loved having all 10 of us in the same “room”. Quiet. Clean.Front desk helpful. Kids loved the indoor pool and hot tub. Breakfast was minimal but free. Appreciated the paper bags so we could grab and go.,
Manager Response: It brightens our day to know that you had a fantastic stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! Thank you for your thoughtful review; we are thrilled to see that you appreciated our convenient location, clean and comfortable accommodations, and family-friendly amenities. We hope that you will keep us in mind for the future as we would love for you to come back and spend some more time with us!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: Everything was great. Only complaint was that the pool was over chlorinated making it very uncomfortable to swim in and smell. Otherwise everything was great.  Location is as excellent and we walked to the parks including our children each day took about 5-10 minutes to the park gate. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to host you during your recent visit. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review, and we're glad to hear you enjoyed our convenient location. That being said, we apologize that our pool did not meet your expectations, and we have notified our staff of your comments. It would be an honor to welcome you and your family back to our hotel the next time you are in town.  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: As always, the location is great. The price point was great; book as far ahead as possible for a better rate.  We stayed in the "executive" 2 queen room with 2 adults and a seven-year-old. I like the executive rooms as it has a sofa (I believe it's a hide-a-bed) and is a bit roomier.  It's now my go-to for when I stay in this motel.  It's always been clean, and this time was no different-- it passed my "white sock test" without an issue. I tend to find the lack of trash can liners odd (it makes me feel like I can't put sticky stuff in it), but after multiple stays, I'm getting used to it.   Housekeeping is every other day, so the morning you check in obviously, then day #3, #5, etc. I accidently put out the "do not disturb" on day #3, and came back after a long day to realize
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty to  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We're so glad you once again enjoyed our convenient location, clean accommodations, and helpful staff. It is our hope you and your family had a blast visiting Disneyland, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely Management team

Summary: Great staff- friendly and efficient with lots of smiles.    Great view of the fireworks from the rooftop.    We love that the hotel is so close to the main entrance.  Big plus in our book.    Breakfast is simple and we wish they had more variety, but it worked for us.    We had a family of 5 and the room was a good size for all of us.  We were disappointed that there was only 1 sink for all of us.    They do need a bit of an update / renovation as it is showing its wear.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to welcome back a repeat guest, and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites once again! Thank you so much for taking the time to highlight our convenient location and friendly, dedicated team. We can't wait to host you again, so don't be a stranger!  Sincerely, Management team

Summary: We reserved a suite was comfortable and clean. The only thing I was not happy the the shower head had no pressure other than that the hotel was nice and clean. I also like it because is so close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Gabriela, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you found our accommodations clean and comfortable and enjoyed our convenient location close to the area's theme parks. It would be our pleasure to host you again at  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. Come back soon.   Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: Mediocre Hotel Right Across From Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is right across from the entrance to Disney property, so I guess they don't feel like they have to try very hard.    Let's start with the positive:  The beds were pretty comfortable, the staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, and the shower had decent water pressure (for Anaheim, anyway).  The entrance to Disney is very close - about a 5 minute walk to the security gate.  Sadly, that's where the positives end.  The windows have no curtains - only shutters with dubious privacy and lots of light leakage, which is a problem when trying to sleep.  This is a very noisy hotel (even when attempting to sleep with earplugs).  Even though we were in the back of the property, we were stuck on the first floor below the Boulder People of Granitor 7.  Every morning, starting at
Manager Response: Dear Donna,  We are always working our hardest to provide a high-quality experience for all of our guests, so it is deeply disappointing to hear that we didn't meet your expectations. We will discuss your concerns regarding our accommodations internally to ensure that we are meeting our own high hospitality standards. Thank you, and we hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely Management team

Summary: Super close to Disneyland- just across the street. Easy access to the rooms. Parking $17 a day wasn't too bad, Grab and go breakfast and cereal inside the breakfast room next to the indoor pool- seats available too! We did not use the pool so I can't comment on that, but the room was sufficient and had all the necessary amenities. Floor left our feet dirty and could probably use a shampooing, but I guess that's normal in a hotel with carpet where people where shoes inside the room. Staff were friendly and the check-in and out process was easy. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Sara, Thank you for making Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites a part of your trip. We're glad our convenient location and friendly staff impressed you and that you appreciated the grab-and-go breakfast. Please accept our apologies for any concerns about the floors. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we invite you to stay with us again during your next trip.  Sincerely Management team

Summary: This is our families 4th time staying here over 20yrs. We love that it’s right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. The rooms are always clean and service is friendly. We will be coming here again for the next 20yrs.
Manager Response: It has been an honor hosting your family over the past 20 years at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! You can always count on us for clean accommodations and friendly hospitality, and we hope you had a fantastic birthday celebration! Conveniently situated near Disneyland, you can't beat our enviable location. On behalf of our team, we're already looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: Appreciation for the spirit and intention of this hotel
Summary: As the reviews show, this hotel is basic. That's a good thing. What you get is amazing proximity to Disneyland for a reasonable price. The rooms are clean. Every staff member we met was friendly and welcoming. We appreciated the size of the fridge in the room, which could fit pretty much anything we put it in.  Of course, it is basic. Of course, it is noisy. It is full of families who, fortunately, can still afford to stay, since the room rates haven't (yet) been jacked up way above what is reasonable. (Unlike Disney tickets, alas...)   To be honest, we had a fairly unpleasant stay. We absolutely do not recommend Room 136, which is on the first floor near the echo-y stairwell and right next to the hotel's only smoking area. So, when families would come home at midnight after a
Manager Response: We're glad to hear our reasonable rates and proximity to Disneyland were some highlights of your stay. When our team was notified of the concern you had with noise, we were happy to move part of your family to a separate suite. It was also our pleasure to honor your request to keep your original first-floor room as well. It is unfortunate, however, that our solutions didn't suffice your needs, but we're happy our friendly staff made you feel welcome. Despite these issues, we hope you'll allow us a second chance to exceed your expectations down the line.   Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: It’s convenient to walk to the park from this hotel. It’s basically a motel and a place to maybe sleep when not in the park. I say maybe because the walls are thin and depending on who’s next to you there may be no sleep. There’s also a rooftop viewing deck that is not fancy by any means, but you will see fireworks. If your room is located under this deck you will not sleep because after the fireworks you can hear the tables and chairs being dragged around all night. It’s allegedly locked after the fireworks so maybe a ghost did it? I dunno, but I heard it.  This visit the pool was open one day but then the next there were signs everywhere saying the pool is closed for “maintenance.” This did not bother me because I find the pool here unappealing, but I can see how some guests
Manager Response: Dear Megan, Thank you for sharing your constructive feedback. We're so glad you appreciated our incredible location across the street from Disneyland. Rest assured, we will immediately refocus our attention on delivering warm and attentive hospitality.  Despite this, we hope you enjoyed watching the evening fireworks from our outdoor patio. Should your adventures bring you back to Anaheim, we hope you will return for an even better experience.   Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: Perfect Location - Room Size and amenities.
Summary: Booked here for it's location and we weren't disappointed. Rooms were spacious and clean, fridge in room good size with Microwave, and coffee maker. This location is about 10 steps from the intersection to cross over into the entrance of Disneyland. it has Denny's one side iHop on the other, plus short walk to McDonalds and other places to eat. The pool was a nice relax spot but the smell of excessive chlorine is overbearing, due to being an indoor pool, def no bugs, in it! We used the laundry and was easy to use, although I'd like to see dryer sheets also in the vending machine that dispenses washing liquid. a drink and snack vending machine on site also, storage lockers, for early, late check out. we were able to say no to housekeeping and grab what we needed/fresh towels as
Manager Response: Dear Shellie, Thank you for your glowing and detailed review of your recent visit with us at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. We are thrilled that our fantastic location was perfect for your needs and that you appreciated our spacious and well-equipped accommodations, as well as our excellent facilities. The next time that you find yourself in the area, we would be honored to welcome you back for another exceptional stay!   Sincerely Management team

Summary: We recently were able to finally come back to our favourite hotel after COVID foiled all travel plans. We have been staying with your hotel for many many years. We were very excited to be able to resume our several trips to the area each year. We are more than disappointed to have to report having a terrible stay with Desert Inn and Suites.  We arrived and checked in to the room we expected. We unpacked for our 7 night stay. Had our weeks worth of groceries delivered and set up for the duration. Once settled we started to notice the severe lack of  maintenance. The sink in our hotel was only working on the cold or warm setting. There was no ability to get hot running water. We also had a door in our room that wouldn’t remain closed without having to prop something in front to
Manager Response: Dear Justin, While we appreciated the opportunity to welcome you and your family back to our hotel, it's disappointing to read your remarks, as we felt we had adequately addressed your concerns prior to your departure. We were dealing with an unfortunate pipe issue in that part of the building that caused a leak each time the sink, toilet, or shower was used in your room. It was our hope that by accommodating your family in another room, we could address the issue more promptly and mitigate any further impacts. It's clear that our attempts to make amends along with the many solutions provided were not to your liking, and for that, we apologize. Thank you for your time. As a returning guest, you know our team typically delivers a stay focused on exemplary service and high standards of hospitality, and as such, we'd be grateful for a second chance to earn back your patronage on a future stay.  Sincerely Management team

Summary: It's a standard hotel/motel. Perfect place to spread out if you have a large family and sleep. Not fancy, but clean.  I will say, we have stayed there multiple times and have always been taken care of by John. He's great. Helped us change rooms when we had an odor issue with the first one. Always personable and fun. Glad I could finally give him props since the baby ate the card that had his name on it.
Manager Response: Dear Kira,  Thank you for your thoughtful comments regarding your recent visit. At  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites, we work hard to offer high-quality service to every guest. We made sure to share this feedback with John to give him the recognition that he deserves.   Sincerely, Management Team
