Summary: We had a very nice time.  The rooms were spacious and it was nice to have 2 bathrooms.  The rooms were clean.  Excellent location to the Park and restaurants and a little store.  Nice to have a microwave and fridge.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you as our guest, and we’re elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We are very fortunate to have so many great reviews, and I greatly appreciate you adding your experience! Thank you again for the comments that you have shared, and we look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Management team

Summary: Perfect location for Disneyland resort. Average breakfast, didn’t go near the pool and there’s no real outdoor space but if you need a room to sleep in during your time at the parks, then this is the place. We had a C2 room which was well equipped for the six of us. I think 10 would be pushing it but it didn’t feel cramped for the six of us.
Manager Response: Dear Neil, We're happy to hear that you loved the convenience of our location's proximity to Disney! It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites the next time you're looking to enjoy the Magic Kingdom.  Sincerely Management team

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times, and we are always incredibly pleased by how we are treated, the cleanliness of the rooms, and the overall experience. We will definitely stay here again! Thanks for a great trip!
Manager Response: It's always wonderful to welcome back repeat guests to Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and you're no exception! From our clean accommodations to our wonderful service, we're happy to hear that you had a great time. It would be an honor to host you again, so hurry back!  Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: Great Budget Friendly Disneyland Area Hotel
Summary: We've stayed at a few hotels on Harbor Blvd (all walking distance to Disney's entrance); but this was the least expensive one and we were very happy with our experience, so really who needs to pay more for fancier decor-NOT US?   We stayed in a Deluxe room (their lowest priced room) with 2 queens, mini fridge, microwave, tv, free basic (all carbs) continental breakfast, and in room safe.  It was spacious, comfortable and spotlessly clean.  There are no USB chargers so bring your own. The pool area was also good, although we never did find the pool towels, it was great for cooling off during a mid-day break from the Park.    We watched fireworks from the roof one night, which was very convenient, but they could have more chairs out because most of the people had to stand or sit
Manager Response: Dear Wendi, Whether you are looking to relax in our refreshing pool area or wake up to a yummy breakfast, you can bet that Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites will deliver this and more. We love to see that you had a fantastic experience and we hope that you made plenty of amazing memories during your visit. Thank you so much for the review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely Management team

Summary Heading: This place puts the Magic into the Kingdom!
Summary: Location, Location, Location!  This place is a dream.  If you are planning a Disney trip, this place is the best!  It is closer than most of the Disney Hotels!  With Disney charging so much a day (and it even gets more expensive with their new "lightening pass"), then the best way to get a return on your Disney expenditure is to be at a place that is close!  Although we went during April's Spring Break, the temperatures were 103!  It was so nice to have a nice lunch at our hotel and relax during the hottest hours.  My children went for a swim while everyone was over-heated at the park.  Then we were ready to go again when most park attendants were going home with heat exhaustion.  They are very accommodating.  They have a refrigerator and microwave.  We brought our own food and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Things we liked: Amazing location for Disneyland. Rooms were clean. Beds were comfortable. It was nice to have a mini fridge and microwave. Nice customer service too. Things that could improve: pool was freezing and the hot tub was just warm. The grab and go breakfast was the same packaged muffins and soft red apple every day. Some of the muffins were actually moldy on top. If you have time before you run to DL you can have some cereal.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not the greatest but would stay ahain.
Summary: Room lacked the normal toiletries found at most hotels The room phone did not work and the front desk staff didn't seem to care when told, nor was it replaced. The room was a bit outdated but was comfortable. Aside from the above, the proximity to Disneyland was the top reason why we would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Firstly, this motel is very close to the park, but still very affordable, given the location. Our favorite place to stay.    That said, the motel is quite noisy.  We were in a room way at the back end, with walls right outside our room.  Thought it would be quiet, but I think the walls just funneled all the noise to us...not to mention NO view whatsoever.  We could hear every movement from the floor above ours.  We were right close to the elevator, and that was handy.  The front desk staff is very efficient.  They have several luggage carts, never had any issue finding one at check-in or at check-out.  Not too much selection at breakfast, but that is because of covid.  In years past, it has been better.  We had an "executive" room, and would highly recommend, had lots of room to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location! Great staff! Great room! Great price! Great parking & rates! Very clean room ! Location, location, location👍 We will stay again at this hotel!  Breakfast in a bag was very nice! Smooth, simple, relaxing!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose the Desert Inn and Suites primarily for its location. Its perfect — right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. We were looking for an economy motel. It met our expectations. Nothing fancy but all the basics were met to our satisfaction plus some extras:  a larger than normal in room refrigerator, plus a microwave. They had a very basic grab and go breakfast which was a plus for us as we did not want to delay or entry into Disneyland park with a sit down breakfast. We were going to bring in food for a “walking breakfast” but their grab and go breakfast was a nice surprise. If you need to be pampered and want a 5 star experience, this place is not for you. If you want a good quality economy motel with moderate expectations, this is a great choice. I will
Manager Response: none

Summary: Family from different parts of the West were meeting to go to Disneyland and this place is right across the street from the entrance - you can't get closer than that!  We had reserved scooters from an outside vendor and the hotel allowed them to drop them off in their lobby until we checked in.  The suites that the Inn has are perfect for families.  We had the family with kids on one side and the aunts on the other.  Everyone on staff was very nice and courteous.  The rooms were comfortable as well.  On a side note: your car will most likely be valeted as the self park area is very small.  We had no issues with the valet.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone who is going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Anaheim desert inn and suites was exactly what we were looking for. The motel is clean, comfortable, safe and directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. I’m so glad that we chose to stay here. We’ll be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The only thing that makes this hotel special is its location. The rooms are dated but clean. The shower heads are very low. I wish they made more of an effort to collect the trash from the rooms on a daily basis. Also I was not told there would be no room cleaning due to Covid. You are also charged $17 a night for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review. All of us at the Anaheim Desert Inn take your comments very seriously and are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations. I understand your disappointment with the Covid housekeeping restrictions. We appreciate you bringing these problems to our attention, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests. We are slowly getting back to servicing rooms. We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you during your next visit to the area.  Thank you.

Summary: We visit Disneyland five to six times per year and we always try to find the most convenient hotels; Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is the perfect location. Four of us stayed in a standard room from Feb. 13th-16th and the rooms are basic, but clean and the beds are comfortable. For an average of $275 per night, it's well worth it especially at the end of a very long day at the parks. The only thing we didn't like about the hotel was the fact that they will not store your luggage in the hotel. You have to pay to put your luggage in storage lockers that are located down from the office.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.  Thank you choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.

Summary: Stayed one night.  We were in room 127. I would not recommend that room if you can help it. While it is the last room all the way back so there isn't any noise from other  visitors. It is directly across from the elevator control room. So every time someone uses the elevator you here it! Not too good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second time staying here.   Pros: Friendly staff, parking was allowed before check in, and room was clean. Free breakfast was adequate. Best part is the quick walk to Disneyland!  Cons: the room had a bad smell, and the water was barely warm in the shower.   We would stay again. We just didn't like the odor and would have loved a hot shower.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location. Best thing about this property is being minutes away from Disneyland. The rooms could use some TLC, a bit loud. Thin towels. Still a great value for the fabulous location. Would return again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I highly recommend Desert Inn if you are planning to go to Disneyland. It is located conveniently right across the entrance from Disneyland park. Rooms are spacious and clean. Great customer service from front desk and staff. The price to stay was very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests.  Thank you choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.

Summary: Recently stayed here in a Parlor suite with 5 adults and one baby. The room was clean and nice, exactly what we needed! Having 2 toilets and 2 sinks was super nice, one shower was a little tough but we made it work! Love how close it is to the park entrance. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. Thank you choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.

Summary: I have been staying here every time i go to disney, its clean, professional, welcoming and have been a client since 2014.  I never had an issue staying here. I am giving 4 out of 5 because this last trip, i found 2 bloonde hairs in the bathroom and in the coffee pot, i understand that hairs get everywhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Do not believe anything this hotel tells you or posts. Here was my experience with them a few weeks ago:  - Website says the pool opens at 8 am. A hotel worker also told us 8 am. We got all of ours kids down there at 815 am only to find out they don’t open until 830 am. Took the kids back down after 830. There was a sign on the door saying the pool was closed for maintenance. The door was still locked. One of the workers walking by told us that sometimes the locks don’t work, but the pool was open and opened the door for us. We were in the pool for about 15 seconds when one of the maintenance workers came in and said they were adjusting the chemicals, we needed to get out and go shower. Wow. Our kids loved being pulled out. Super great start to the day. - Website and workers say
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A fine place to lay your head....Noises abound though
Summary: The room itself was fine.  Comes with a microwave and small fridge good enough for water/soda/beer/other.  No maid service right now, so we had to put our trash cans out and ask the desk for more towels.  I certainly hope they reduced the price for this, but I rather doubt they did.  Maybe though!  The biggest negative came almost every morning at about 530a. when the dumpsters got emptied.  The bangs were loud enough to wake us from sleep.  This and the constant walking of employees with wheeled carts or mop buckets up and down the property...It didn't make for a good sleep.  All in all, it was a place to lay my head down which is all I really expect.  But it could have been way nicer for the price we paid.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are clean, the hotel is very close to the parks, the staff are always friendly and valet great with cars. Have stayed here multiple times and never disappointed. Will definitely be staying again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had two rooms.  BEWARE the fridge in BOTH  rooms FROZE a large container of milk, bag of salad, pretty much everything in there over night was partially  frozen. Ruined a bit of our food that we had order from Target.  Other than this, the room was nice, well used and closest to the entrance (you still have to walk a long ways to main gates) to Disneyland.  Enjoy your Disneyland fun!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location was ideal. We could walk back for afternoon rest.  The valet service was ideal for us.  They were very fast and efficient.  Check in and check out was very fast and problem free.   Everyone was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 6 nights. No room service during covid, but not a big deal as you could request towels and they would bring them to you. If you had trash you just placed the cans outside the room by 10am and they would empty. Parking both self park and valet were quick and easy. Many restaurants just steps away. Has self laundry and vending machines on site.  Elevators were a little slow but even the walk up the stairs was not bad up to our 4th floor room for someone out of shape. All suites appeared to be on the 4th or 5th floor.  Smoking area is in the back of the self parking area near the atrium rooms. Grounds were kept clean and tidy. Some other reviews complained about the beds, but we found the beds to be comfortable. not soft or worn out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is amazing based on location to Disneyland and that’s always going to make it a favorite of mine.  Good space inside.  Everything is older but I’m not in my room long enough to dare anyways.  Biggest downfall is the walls are thin and I have a 2 year old and the next room told us to be quiet since we had conjoining rooms.  That was pretty discouraging and there’s not a lot I can do which was a helpless feeling so that will sway me away from this place if anything.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn never disappoints. Our family has been staying here for over 10 plus years. Rooms are decent and you literally are right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. IHOP and Denny are right next door. After a long day in the park nice to be just across the street. We will definitely be back. Hotel of choice. Staff is always welcoming and personable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed here several times and it has been great; however, this time was just ok. We love the convenience of this property but the room we stayed at this time was not great. It was very noisy. People hitting the walls and running around upstairs at 5 am. The bed was terrible. It might have been more comfortable sleeping on the floor. This is the first time I've been disappointed, but I don't think we will be staying here again. Slept horribly and it really affected my trip.

Manager Response: none

The hotel is clean and the employees are polite and helpful.  I'm sure they have a constant round of guests. The pool area is near the front and the pool is great.  The

Summary: So close to Disneyland entrance, good value and lots of restaurants right next door. The continental breakfast was not yummy at all but at least they offer one! Most of the staff was nice bit a couple were grumpy which isn’t fun to deal with when you’re on a much needed vacation.

Summary: We love staying here because you are so close to Disneyland. When you are tired mid-day and need a nap, or at the end of the day it's a very sort walk back to your room. Indoor pool which is great when you visit during cooler weather. There is a viewing deck on the roof to see the Disneyland fireworks without the crowds every night. Each room has a large fridge and microwave. We ate dinner a few times in our room and had plenty of food for snacks and supplementing breakfast. The staff was helpful and very polite. I feel you are even closer to Disneyland here than if you stay in one of the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Hannah, thank you for your amazing review. We are pleased to hear our location was convenient for your Disneyland adventure. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our firework viewing deck and our room amenities. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Been going to Desert Inn and Suites for several years. I have never had any issues with them in any way. The location is great. The rooms are nice and the beds are comfortable. If you are looking for a decent hotel close to the park and don't need all the amenities and over the top decor that higher prices hotels (like all Disneyland hotels have,) then this is the perfect place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are honored to hear you continue to stay with us. It is nice to hear you enjoyed our location and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at Desert Inn and Suites several times; this stay was probably our 5th stay. The room rate is always very competitive. The rooms are large and comfortable with the decor what you would find in a moderately priced hotel and, really, all we ever do there is sleep after the day in the parks. What we really want is a comfortable bed, which they are, and a hot shower. The hotel offers free continental breakfast with the usual toast, muffins, bagels and fruit. Hard cooked eggs are also offered, which is nice for those of us watching carbs.   There is an indoor pool that is nothing to write home about. Again, not an amenity we have used.   The hotel is steps away from the crosswalk to the parks, which is one of the best reasons to stay here.   The parking lot is small
Manager Response: Dear Mary, thank you for your excellent response. We are honored to hear you continue to stay with us and that you enjoy our rooms. We do charge a $6 daily resort fee and $12.87 for the daily parking fee. It is nice to hear you had an enjoyable stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: It was good for the price
Summary: The stay was good for the price.  The front desk and valet attendants were very courteous. The rooms were cleaned up nicely.  The only thing that happens was on the first night the when I turned the faucet on it started making this weird loud noise, but I assume the issue was addressed since I didn’t happen the following nights of our stay. Other than that I had an enjoyable stay and will reserve with them in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and courteous staff. It is nice to hear you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Amazing location for a basic hotel-perfect for Disneyland
Summary: This was our first stay here and overall it was a good stay. Nothing fancy, but our room was clean and comfortable and the location absolutely can't be beat. We also swam in the pool several times and the breakfast is simple, but filling and makes a good value. The walls are paper thin, and we could hear EVERYTHING going on outside, but we were so tired, it wasn't a huge deal. Overall, I definitely recommend this place, but it is not a fancy hotel. I wouldn't stay if I planned on spending a lot of time there, but it was perfect for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we greatly appreciate you recommending us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was our first time staying here, and we were very pleased! The location is amazing being basically right across the street. We had a suite which was great with an extra room with a hide-a-bed, and out our window we could see the park and fireworks. The staff was very courteous and helpful when we needed them. The breakfast was not very impressive, so we just grabbed bananas. Still nice to have something. We will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are glad to hear you had a pleasant first stay with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Excellent value for the price point.
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 3 times in the last 5 years and will continue to return.  Short walk to Disneyland (literally right across the street from front entrance), cant be beat.  Closer than even the Disney owned hotels.  Rooms and beds are comfortable and clean.  As a large family we always have trouble finding affordable rooms that can accommodate us and this hotel never disappoints.  Continental breakfast is decent. Toast, cereal, pastries, fruit, boiled eggs, oatmeal, coffee, juice, etc....all served in a nice little breakfast room that is clean and well maintained. Front desk staff are not excellent but adequate for the price point.  We will keep coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are glad to hear that we were able to accommodate your large family and that our beds were clean and comfortable. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: All time favorite hotel when going to Disneyland
Summary: If your looking for a convenient, clean, and affordable hotel while going to Disneyland this is the place to stay! I've stayed at this hotel a few years ago with my family in a suite a total of 6 people and it was nothing but awesome! clean rooms, friendly staff, affordable, great continental breakfast, and most of all it is super close to Disneyland. We recently took our 3 year old son to Disneyland for the first time and staying at this hotel was the best thing ever! we were able to walk back and forth to rest, the rooms were clean, and the staff was nice! I rave about this hotel to all my family and friends!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are pleased to hear our location was convenient for you and your family and greatly appreciate you recommending us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have been staying here for more than a decade.  The staff is very courteous and responsive.  The rooms are clean and comfortable, and you can’t beat the proximity to Disneyland!  Additionally they have a mini suite option (parlor suite) that has a separate living room with a pull out couch which makes it comfortably sleep a full family.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie, thank you for your amazing review! We are so honored you continue to stay with us! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and suite options. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Best Suite Floorplan we have ever had!
Summary: It was awesome!  The location is directly across from Disneyland.  We are a large family of 6- this was the best suite floorplan we have ever stayed in.  4 queen beds, 2 rooms, a sitting area, and 2 bathrooms.  It was perfect in every way!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed our large family suite. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This Hotel is conveniently located just a six minute walk to the Disneyland / California Adventures Main Gates.  There is a Denny's right next door and a McDonald's just within a 3 minute walk from the Hotel.    The rooms are very clean and comfortable.  They have a small Fridge and a microwave.   Front desk and Valet were friendly and professional.  This was my second stay here and if I return again I will definitely stay here.   So conveniently located, I never had to use my car until I checked out.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We’ve stayed here numerous times and always are happy we did. Customer service is wonderful.  Accommodations are simple but clean and comfortable and location is perfect.  He will stay again for future Disney visits!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review. We are happy to hear you had a pleasant Disney visit and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Been at same hotel twice. Shortest walk to Disney Parks. Reasonable price if you reserve earliest. More parking spaces than other hotel next door. Comfort sleep. I will reserve same hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for an excellent review. We appreciate you coming back to stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Your basic needs are met if going to Disneyland. 5 min walk to parks (you can see the parks across the street). View fireworks from room or roof. Quick, basic breakfast stuff. Denny's, Ihop, Coldstone next door. If you get a good deal, it'll work. NOT fancy. Relatively clean. Comfy beds. Nice staff. Large lockers for your stuff on checkout day if you are leaving later.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear we provided you a with a good value. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Love staying at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites
Summary: We love staying at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites! We take yearly family vacations (with and without extended family) to Disneyland and for the last 4 trips we have stayed here. It’s so close to the park, the rooms are great, service is great, and pricing is very competitive.
Manager Response: Dear Kailee, thank you for your amazing review. We are honored you and your family continue to stay with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Great hotel directly across the road from Disneyland and super close to lots of restaurants and eateries. Has a basic continental breakfast each morning, an indoor pool /spa, a great rooftop viewing area to watch the fireworks at Disney and a laundry to do any washing.  Would highly recommend for anyone that wants to be close enough to walk to both Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Dear Lyndel, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel nice and close to disney
Summary: Great hotel, clean, friendly and so close to Disney. Stayed for 10 days and enjoyed our stay - never had a single problem while we were there. Indoor pool and spa were fantastic and the complementary breakfast was a great start to the day.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: This hotel did not properly cancel my reservation & then charged me
Summary: I made a reservation with this hotel and then needed to cancel later the same day. I called the hotel to cancel and was told the cancellation was confirmed. A month later I noticed a pending credit charge showed up on my credit card 2 days prior to the original scheduled date. I immediately called the hotel to advised this reservation had been canceled a month earlier. The hotel staff refused to reverse the charge because I did not have the confirmation number with me while I was on vacation. The call was barely less than the hotel’s 48 hr policy and staff still refused to reverse the charge. As soon as the charge posted to my account, I had to put the charge in dispute with my credit  Card! I will not book this hotel again with this kind if service attitude!
Manager Response: Dear Lorraine, thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you faced. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Parked our car and was able to walk to both parks, downtown Disney and many restaurants! So we loved the location of this hotel. Maid service was slow, but all staff was very nice.  Breakfast was simple but nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very nice room and friendly staff, directly across from Disneyland!!very prompt response from the valet attendants, will definitely stay with the Anaheim desert Inn for all of my future Disneyland vacations
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our friendly staff and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Location for Access to the Disneyland Resort
Summary: I have the worst luck when it comes to picking hotels that I have never been to.  In this case though, I did end up lucking out.  The location of the hotel (as most will know) is excellent for access to the Disneyland Resort.  Based on past stays down here and using the ART system, even though we may have walked a little more, it saved a good amount of time (and at the end of a long day, not having to wait around for the ART bus to show up or to have to wait for another because it is loaded).  The hotel was actually quite nice.  I had no major issues at the hotel, so I really didn't have to deal with the service staff much, but I would say they were a mixed bag.  Some of them were really friendly and engaging and some just really appeared to be tired of dealing with guests.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our clean room and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location within an easy walking distance to Disneyland pedestrian entrance. Nice, clean rooms with microwaves and refrigerators. Separate bathroom & vanity area. Larger suites available. Very friendly and helpful staff. Good value for the location.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and friendly staff. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable.  Desk staff was friendly. Location was very close to Disneyland. Nice to have a quick walk after a long day.  Breakfast was very simple and not very good.  We went next door to Denny’s. Parking was packed and valet parked our car.  Which wasn’t a problem. On the day we left we only waited a few minutes for valet to bring our car to us.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and our valet service. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location for Disneyland.  Staff was accommodating when we arrived before check-in. Rooms were fairly comfortable but when you spend the day at Disney then any bed is comfortable.  Pool and hot tub were not very appealing but we didn't have time for that anyways. I would stay again because it is such a quick walk to the gate.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights. 4 stars for location, cleanliness, friendly staff, and cost. No star for parking. Each room is allowed only 1 car. We had only 1 car, but still no parking. They will validate your vehicle in this situation. We arrived at 10pm. We received a courtesy call earlier in the evening asking the estimated time of arrival-this didn’t bother me. This hotel has the feeling of a family owned and run type lodging, which is nice in a big city.  My family, friends, and I plan to stay here again when we visit Disney parks.  With our late arrival time, we headed to Downtown Disney. Not much action at 1030pm. It was safe to walk up and down Harbor blvd.   You have all the basic necessities. Rooms are spacious. Most people stay here because of the convenience to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant Halloween stay with us. We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Comfy beds, clean rooms, could use a bit more on the free breakfast( can’t complain much, it is free). Five minute walk to Disney security check can’t be beat. I would absolutely stay here again. Great no frills place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here a few times- on par with most on strip- we got good price on connecting rooms as have 4 adults so 2 bathrooms a must- literally steps from Main gate- beds ok- not great- “breakfast “ basic but what do you expect?  Truly a Motel vs hotel atmosphere- will stay again if rate is good
Manager Response: Dear Lisa, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect choice for our trip: older couple with no children
Summary: The staff was so kind, and the room was perfect. The location made it an easy walk for us to Disneyland and all the local restaurants. The easy access to the freeway also made it possible to see other sites in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our staff and that our location was convenient for your trip. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: You book this hotel for the location. When we travel anywhere else we stay at a Marriott or Hilton but they are too far from the park. We have stayed here 4 times and won’t stay anywhere else. My son asked why we couldn’t stay at the hotel with the water park. When we were walking back to the room at midnight he quickly understood. If we didn’t spend all our time at the park I would consider somewhere else but when you have 3 sets of tired little legs nothing beats this place.  If you are picky about linens and amenities but not location consider somewhere else. If you have kids and don’t want to waste time waiting for a shuttle or carrying them a half a mile down the road book here.
Manager Response: Dear Jen, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you and your family enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Family Affordable with a Great Location
Summary: Just steps from the crosswalk that leads to Disneyland's main gate. You can't beat the location. Rooms are a nice place to rest between visits to either of the Disney parks. The rooms are clean, however, they could use some upgrades to the paint and furnishings. The beds are comfortable, more on the firm mattress side than soft. Plenty of dining options nearby.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, we have shared your feedback with our hotel departments and will be taken into consideration.  Warm regards,  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: We always stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. So close to Disneyland!  Clean, decent continental breakfast.  The viewing platform is handy for the fireworks.   Recommend this hotel for young families wanting to be close to the entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, hotel is so close to the parks which really helps with tired little legs. The rooms were extremely clean, including the carpet. We liked that the vanity was outside the bathroom to make getting ready easier. Fridge and microwave came in handy. No complaints at all.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa thank you for your excellent review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and clean room. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Disney Not So Scary Halloween Party (Tues)
Summary: The room was a double room suite. . The staff was professional and willing to explain things. The location of hotel, breakfast, and pool is good too. One thing I wish was included for the price of room was the additional parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great for price, location and room options
Summary: This is our second year staying at the desert inn, and we like it very much. Right across the street from Disney, and the suites are set up nicely. Our only complaint is that housekeeping wasn't done on our first 2 days. We are gone all morning, and only return to the room in the afternoon for a couple of hours. Somehow they couldn't seem to do our garbage and towels during the times we are out. We did however, speak to management who promised to  investigate the situation and our room was done fully on the 3rd day. It's just hard when you have a kid, with diapers and food scraps in the garbage, and need new towels. But it won't stop us from coming back here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience you faced with our housekeeping service. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: From the pictures online we thought it was going to be a little nicer. Was also to bad we had to pay for parking even though it should be included in the room rental. If We had of known these things then we probably would have paid a little extra to stay at a nicer place. Overall it was okay.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly, thank you for your response. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Rooms were less than average and outdated. Bed had a big dent I mattress which made it uncomfortable. Staff was friendly and accomodating. Proximity to main gate was awesome.  Price was average for the area but we liked the fact that two rooms could be connected easily.
Manager Response: Dear Alex, thank you for your response. We would like to apologize for the issue you faced with the bed. We are glad to hear you did enjoy our location and staff. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: The room was so comfortable and overall awesome!  We always choose Desert Inn not only for location but the accommodations from the staff.  They took in my FedEx delivery, but make sure to notify them prior to doing so.  We look forward to many more vacations and staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Jesse, thank you for your wonderful review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and staff. We greatly appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Location and availability of some larger rooms close to Disney
Summary: Easy walk from the parks which is the biggest plus. Parking is tight but valet is available if there aren't any self parking spots left.  The rooms are nice and have fridge and microwaves.  They have many sizes of rooms to accommodate.  They do have a resort fee that they disclose but when you are checking prices be sure to count that and the parking fee.  Light breakfast but usually we just run to McDonald's which is also close.  It's a good hotel and the prices even with the fee can still be better than most of them in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We do have a variety of large rooms and suites that can accommodate large families or groups of friends. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: So close to the park. So nice of staff and management. Thanks Marissa! Clean firm beds. Valet parking didn't charge when they ran out of parking space. Plenty of towels and t.p.  Very comfortable stay the only thing the only thing maybe that was a problem... Could've had better coffee in the room but then the coffee downstairs in the Continental Breakfast was very good!   Thanks we're already reserved for Christmas!
Manager Response: Dear Andrew, thank you for an amazing review. We are happy to hear Marissa and our staff were able to accommodate you and we will pass along your praise. We greatly appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to your return in December!

Summary: Booked a last minute room for a surprise Disney day with the kids. The room was nice, the extra little living room within worked out good for when the baby went to bed the older kids had a place to play without waking her.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our hotel and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I have stayed here several times and I just love the location and the continental breakfast! It is right across from the entrance to Disneyland. It is also close to a ton of restaurants outside the park. I also really enjoy the continental breakfast that’s included in the price. It’s perfect for fueling up in preparation for a long day at Disneyland or wherever you might be headed. My only complaint is that the rooms could use some updating. The carpets could also stand to be shampooed, which is obvious if you accidentally spill water and try to soak it up with a towel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and continental breakfast. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is our 5th time staying at this hotel and the room was clean and spacious. The hotel staff has always been pleasant and helpful. We love how close it is to Disneyland and plan to stay here for all future trips.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are honored that you continue to stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our pleasant staff and convenient location. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Room was clean.  Slept 6.  2 beds and a pull out couch, which was fairly comfortable.  Parking was terrible. They allow people not staying at hotel to park there. Cars are parked everywhere and they block in your car, then valet has to move cars around to get yours out.  Nice employees, just takes extra time.  Breakfast is very continental.  Would recommend because it is clean and close to Disney.  Reasonably priced, nice employees.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy, thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the issue you faced with parking. We only allow guest to park at our property.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Large clean spacious rooms.  Attentive cleaning services.  Best location possible!  It took me 6 min from the street crosswalk to the Disneyland gate! Convenience of free breakfast starting at 7 am. The park opens at 8 am.  Check in and  check out was a breeze.   Stayed here 4 years ago and will stay here again on future visits!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you coming back and staying  again with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Overall the stay was not that bad. The beds I thought were comfortable, friendly staff and the rooms were nicely sized. A couple of things that could have gone better; water pressure in showers was very low, the trash truck outside our window was extremely loud every morning at approximately 0700 and it’s a little run down. There was also an issue with one of our keys, never worked despite numerous office visits to fix it. Good thing we had two more!  Best thing was the distance it is to Disneyland, amazingly right across the street.
Manager Response: Dear June, thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the issues you faced and that your stay was below expectations. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we do appreciate you staying with us. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient and close to the park!
Summary: This property is located right across the street from the main entrance to both parks.  It is close and very convenient  for families who don't want to pay for parking at the park.  Room was clean and comfortable and served its purpose well.  Perfect for families who aren't looking for any frills, yet the room did include a microwave and a mini fridge.  Price was comparable to other properties in the area.  Also the air conditioning unit worked very well.  Will probably stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Location and clean rooms, hassle free checkin/checkout
Summary: Can't beat the location, walk is ~5 mins to Disney front entrance. Rooms are clean but aging. Breakfast is meh (cold boiled eggs) but Denny's/IHOP/McDonald's within walking distance. Self parking is extremely limited, need to get car valet, paint scratch on my rental minivan side door upon return. Pool is small and can get busy. Teens riding their rental scooters on the ground floor parking lot at night so can be noisy on lower floors. C2 parlor suite had microwave/fridge in one room only but ok if adjoining door is open.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: If you enjoy Disneyland but might need to take a break during the day this is the perfect place for you.  They have a large breakfast room with seating outside on sunny mornings. One complaint is that they ran out of bagels one morning and one day the bananas were so green one couldn't eat them.   Our room was comfortable and roomy.  Our biggest room complaint was the water pressure in the sink....very low.  I would certainly stay here on my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We apologize that you faced some issues while staying with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and breakfast room. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn a great location. So close to walk across the street to Disneyland‘s main entrance. Our family of five basically only slept and showered at the hotel, so it was definitely sufficient. Included breakfast is your average convenient continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear we were sufficient for your Disneyland adventure. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Directly across from Disneyland. We had a suite with four queen beds and it worked out great. Clean rooms and the night front desk staff was fantastic! The day staff was good, but evening was extra helpful.  The beds could be more comfortable and the breakfast choices were sparse.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Terry, thank you for your comments. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our staff, especially our night staff. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Family Vacation Disneyland, large room, great price.
Summary: We recently stayed at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  We needed a large room.  So we got the room with two rooms, two queen beds in each room, bathroom in each room and small living room with fold out.  It was clean and decent size. Decent items for breakfast.   Denny's is next store if you wanted a bigger breakfast. Nice clean indoor pool.  Friendly staff.  Also had contacts for scooter rental for the park.  Best thing right across from Disneyland.  So close.  Loved this place for the value, room size, and convenience to the park.  I will for sure stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa, thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our large rooms and that we were convenient for your Disneyland trip. We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Location, location, location! This place is so close to the gates that if the kids need to nap, it’s a short walk. Staff is friendly and welcoming. Rooms are old, but clean. We stayed in a 2 room suite this time (this is our 5th stay here), and it was spacious and pretty reasonable cost wise. My only two complaints are the lack of parking (we sometimes use our car to venture out during our stay so valet is less convenient) and only one elevator to take you up past the third floor. But those are minor inconveniences. Overall, a nice stay and we’ll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Mandy, thank you for your response. We are honored you and your family continue to come back and stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is a nice, clean hotel close to Disneyland. If you're looking for a place to rest and sleep during and after your trip to the parks this is the place for you. Friendly front desk staff as well.  Already have a trip booked around Christmas time. :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our property and we appreciate you staying with us. We look forward to seeing you in December!

Summary: You cannot beat the location of this hotel. We have stayed here 3 times over the last 6 years (5 trips total to dl in this time) and we book for the location and the ‘suite’ room options. Even the pull out couch was comfy (pillows not so much) This hotel offers a free breakfast which is nice but it’s a pretty limited selection. We don’t eat much first thing in the morning so what they had was fine, except peanut butter would have been handy , but maybe that’s an allergy issue. We will most likely stay here on our next trip as well as we always are satisfied with our stay .
Manager Response: Dear Carla, thank you for your response. We are honored you to continue to stay with us and we are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and our suite options. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Couldn't ask for a better location if going to Disneyland. Check-in was fast and easy, clerk was very polite. Rooms are very clean and well kept. Never heard a sound from any neighboring rooms all week. The roof top viewing area was great. Went and watched the fireworks the first night there. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Todd, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location, rooms, and firework viewing area. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: C2 Parlor suite perfect for Disneyland family trip.
Summary: We stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites every time we go to Disneyland. The C2 Parlor suite is perfect for a family of 6-8 people and the hotel is within a 5 minute walking distance to the main ticket entrance with a Denny's conveniently located next door. Complementary continental breakfast is provided, the rooms are always clean, and the staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We are honored you continue to stay with us and we are happy to hear that our Parlor suites fit your family comfortably. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Location is perfect to walk to disney. Great for solo female travel
Summary: Single female solo traveler to Disney. I felt safe as I walked to and from Disneyland during late night hours. Front desk was friendly and informative. Room was clean with ample towels. Refrigerator and microwave in the room was a plus. The free breakfast was simple but plentiful. Will definitely stay here on my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our hotel and had a pleasant stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay ...Desert Inn and Suits
Summary: Love staying here. The place has always been clean and well maintained. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The price is very reasonable. Easy access to Disneyland. We just walk across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Leslee, thank you for your amazing review. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I travel to Anaheim multiple times a year and have stayed at several different hotels along Harbor. This was my first stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. I did not have high expectations and ended up extremely impressed! My room was not just across the entrance from Disneyland and affordable, but spacious and clean. This is not the case at most hotels along this street! The complimentary breakfast included more than just pastries, which was nice! When traveling to Anaheim, this will definitely be my first choice of places to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia, thank you for your amazing review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our property and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: Rooms were clean and large.  Check in Staff very friendly  The breakfast could be better. We chose to eat at Denny’s instead. Most of th house keepers were friendly Just steps to the gates of Disney. We would defiantly stay again
Manager Response: Dear Dennis, thank you for your awesome review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and friendly staff. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay very much. A great location. Very convenient. Next to ihop which is great for breakfast and cold stone which the the kids loved. Room was clean. Valet was very courteous and willing to help.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Awesome hotel! The rooms were very clean and quiet. One of the best parts about the hotel is how close it was to the park!! It was directly by the crosswalk to the esplanade, which was amazing. The only “bad” thing about was that they only have luggage lockers, that you have to pay for. You can only open them one time, and have to have an employee go to open the room that they are in. I had to wait often for someone to come and unlock the room. Other than that, the hotel was great! Really friendly service.
Manager Response: Dear Levi, thank you for your amazing review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This no-frills motel is getting a high rating from me based on location. It is directly across the street from the Disney walkway. The rooms were basic & clean (for the price this is ok). I didn't have problems finding parking. The indoor pool was refreshing. Breakfast was simple, cereal, toast, boiled eggs & good coffee. Wifi worked.  Only downside was having a room near the ice machine. People were loud in the halls. Tip:bring earplugs & a sleep mask because the window blinds will let light in. I would stay again & I'm picky about where I stay.
Manager Response: Dear Monica, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: We've always had a great stay at the Desert Inn
Summary: The Executive Suites are esp nice - as they look over a little courtyard with palm trees. Combined with the plantation shutters, it can be very relaxing while recovering from trips to Disneyland and/or California Adventure parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. It is nice to hear you enjoyed our rooms and our courtyard area. We hope to see you the next time you return to Disneyland.

Summary: I was a little worried about staying here after reading some bad reviews but all turned out well!! The rooms were clean, and the staff were friendly. You can’t beat the location. Right across the street from Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Becky, thank you for your response. We are glad you enjoyed our clean rooms and friendly staff.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was spacious for our family. Conveniently across the street from the park. The only thing was the shower wouldn't drain as you showered so you stood in a puddle of water. The breakfast could be better. Other than that it's an affordable, nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our location. We do apologize for the issues you experienced with the shower. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I can’t say enough good things about this hotel location.  Pros: Located across the street from Disneyland  Walking distance (about 3min walk)to Tony Roma’s, Denny’s, IHOP, and Cold stones. Continental breakfast Large lockers to lock up suite-cases for early arrivals.  Valet parking Clean rooms and bathrooms  Cons: Parking lot is very very small Won’t allow early check in before 3:00
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This isn't the best place I've ever stayed at in the Disney area, but it's hands down the most convenient. No need for shuttle as all things Disney is literally right across the street. Rooms are nothing special, but I'm not very picky. They are clean, and fine for what you're going to do in them which is just shower and sleep.  The worst part about this place is the parking. Very tight and valet only. Make sure to include that in your budget. On the plus side, the valets themselves work very hard and try to make the experience as painless as possible.
Manager Response: Dear George, thank you for your comments. While our parking is limited, our valets do a great job of accommodating all of our guest and the parking fee is cheaper compared to some of the neighboring hotels. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great Hotel,  Good Room, Worked fabulous for our family.  We had a room with a suite, that my daughter loved, she could have her own space.  Great Location, nice & close to disneyland park and restuarants.  Would like the option of a kitchen or a few dishes in the room for th use of the microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and that we were able to accommodate you and your family. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We'll be starting here again, no doubt! The staff was friendly, super convenient for the disney parks, quiet even though our room was right in front of the stairs. The valet were especially great to work with.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and valets. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here many times and can not ever use the butler's cart because it is no where to be found in the lobby area. Often times me and my family would just carry all our baggages one by one. This last time we went (9/23 to 9/25) we have 8 people in our group and again there's no butler's cart so I ask the fornt desk and I was told that if there's none in the lobby then there's none to use and I ask if we can get help to look for one and I was told no.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We apologize that there was no luggage cart available for you and we should have better assisted you in finding one. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The room was amazing, tucked away in an oasis, surrounded by plants, made you feel like you were on a tropical island, clean rooms, friendly staff, excellent made service, it's a must to book at this hotel...
Manager Response: Dear Anela, thank you for your amazing review. We are pleased to hear you had an excellent stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Would Stay here again. Nice and affordable
Summary: The room and bathroom was clean and nice. The continental breakfast was a good basic continental breakfast with hard-boiled eggs, dry goods, and fruit. Had   A nice size sitting area to eat. Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and friendly staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff is great and the room was clean. We have stayed many times, hard to beat the location and price. The breakfast could use more options, but having coffee and cereal worked for me. Nice we were able to get an annual passholder discount also.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are honored you continue to stay with us and we happy to hear you enjoy our location and staff. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our trip to Disneyland with lots of little kids. It was great walking back quickly to our room after a long day. The breakfast was perfect to start off our morning before heading over to Disneyland. Our rooms were clean and the cleaning staff were wonderful. My only complaint was our room had a strange smell from the first day we got there until we went home but it was slight and the rooms were clean so we didn't complain about it. We loved that the pool was opened until 11 so that the kids could relax and play after walking around all day. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Mary, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed our breakfast, pool, and cleaning staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: As always the staff at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites were amazing. Not only was I warmly welcomed they also greeted me by name. They were very accommodating by allowing us to pre-check in and park while waiting for our room to be made available. The remodeled room looked amazing. The continental breakfast always is great and the selection is amazing. It is my favorite hotel to stay at while in Anaheim. I will be happy to stay there again soon.
Manager Response: Dear Rosemary, thank you for your amazing review! We are honored you continue to stay with us and we always look forward to your arrival. We appreciate your kind comments and we look forward to your return!

Summary: The hotel room was clean and the staff helpful. I wish that the room with 4 queen beds had 2 full baths instead of just 1.5. The location to Disneyland was great, so that being said, I’ll stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear David, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean room and helpful staff. We do offer a larger suite that has 4 queen beds and 2 full baths for the next time you visit!

Summary: No frills motel but it was clean enough and super close to Disneyland. The breakfast is adequate although I do wish they offered skim milk along with the 2%, but that's a minor complaint. The lady running the breakfast was very efficient and accomadating. She even gave my son some muffins on a day they were not offered. We've stayed here before and will definitely stayvagain as long as the prices aren't too bad
Manager Response: Dear Nikki, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great room for families and perfect for Disneyland.
Summary: Rooms were clean, they have suite style where the beds are in a separate room. The bath tub came with a mat which was great for the kids bath. Walk to Disneyland is 5 mins tops! Will stay again. It’s directly next to a Denny’s and in walking distance of lots more food.
Manager Response: Dear Leah, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed staying with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The best attraction is the location is the good. Only 10m. on foot to Disn. entrance. The breakfast is poor,but you can find various restaurants around there. The parking lot is filled soon,you will rely on valet parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed for the first time at this hotel and I think this is going to be our go-to every time we go to Disneyland. Only 5 minutes walk from the hotel to the park. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The only downside is the parking space, we were able to find a spot to park our vehicle, but they offer a valet service. Basic continental breakfast is available and also good. Overall it is a good hotel. The staff is nice and friendly. One thing my family and I enjoyed was the Fireworks view area they have, we watched the fireworks the day before we went to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our location and our firework viewing deck. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is not a fancy hotel, but it is a great place to stay if you are spending a majority of your time at the Disneyland park. We enjoyed the short walk to the park and the large spacious room that fit 3 adults and 5 kids, with room to spare.   The room could use some updating and better towels but other than that. It was a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kamee, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We usually stay at Desert Inn 2-3 times a year when going to Disneyland. The rooms are clean, beds comfortable, good rates, easy walk to the park, the staff are always friendly, the buffet breakfast is ok.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy, thank you for your wonderful response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our property and appreciate you continuing to stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Very clean room.Comfortable bed.They give you plenty of extra pillows.And what I liked is that we had a real blanket on our bed not just a sheet and some sort of foot decoration half bedspread. Location is excellent!Only one of the employees was a sour puss,the rest were great!We will be back there in November.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We appreciate you staying with us and we are glad you enjoyed our clean room and location. We look forward to seeing you in November!

Summary: I will be recommending this hotel and will definitely keep using for future vacations. Although it’s a small hotel everything was clean and organized the employee were extremely nice and helpful. Out room was perfect in size there were 12 people in our party and we fit very comfortably.
Manager Response: Dear Maria, thank you for your wonderful response. We appreciate you recommending us and we are pleased to hear you and your party enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent 6 nights here in late August 2018 in the C2 family parlor suite (room 312). It was great. Our room was clean and very spacious with plenty of room for our group of 4 adults and 4 kids and all their assorted gear. The furniture (beds and couch) were new and very comfortable. The indoor pool was closed for a few days for some tile work but once it opened the kids had fun in the small but perfectly useable pool and spa. Front desk staff was nice. Housekeeping was able to exchange used towels for new ones and replace amenities as needed without doing a full clean since we had a toddler napping every afternoon. Our room had two coffee makers for each of the 2 bathrooms. A decent sized mini fridge and a microwave were also included.   The highlight of this hotel is the
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us and we are glad our location was convenient for you and your family. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: My daughters and I just stayed at this hotel for three nights. You can’t beat the price and location! It’s so easy to just walk right across the street and you are at Disneyland! The staff was super friendly and helpful also. We left my daughters nightlight in the room and it was found and brought to me super quickly!! I would totally stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for you response. We are pleased to hear you and your daughters enjoyed staying with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The staff is very friendly. The room was clean and comfortable and very close walk to the parks. The only negative I would say is, since they have replaced all of the curtains with shutters, it lets in way to much light at night (espicaly if you have a walkway light right outside your room). Bring large binder clips to hang the bed drapes over the shutters to block the light. Please provide a shade or something to help block the light. We will absolutely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My family and I always stay here when we go to Disneyland/California Adventure we love this Hotel! It is so  convenient to walk to and from the parks especially having little kids who sometimes need a break! It’s not your fanciest nicest hotel but it gets the job done and you can’t go wrong with the location.
Manager Response: Dear Cassie, thank you for you response. We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Affordable rates, clean rooms, nice staff. This was the first time we used the luggage lockers and it made it so easy to store our stuff and go to the parks for the day!!! Our room was clean and the ac worked great. We’ve stayed her many times before and even tho the bfast is lacking, everything else make up for it! Well stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Stinky rooms, bathrooms not cleaned well....
Summary: We had multiple problems during our stay , I can definitely say next time I’d rather pay more to stay somewhere else close to Disneyland. Upon arriving we noticed in both adjacent rooms we had , the bathrooms had not been fully cleaned, and we had to clean up the prior occupants mess. The carpet and floors were not cleaned well , also both rooms had a musty/moldy smell coming from the ac unit, After we sprayed a ton of febreeze it was not too bad . In one room , there was something that appeared to be either a booger or smashed bug on the ceiling. The beds were actually clean and comfortable but after a long busy day , we noticed we only had 1 small shampoo that said “conditioning shampoo” and one small bar soap. Very disappointing for the price paid . Valet did not lock our
Manager Response: Dear Hailee, thank you for your feedback. I would like to apologize that you had a poor stay with us. We failed to deliver you a great stay and for that I am sorry. Please contact me so I can further look into the issues you faced and address them with our housekeeping staff.  Thank you,  Teo H. Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: I stay regularly at Desert Inn and Suites and I just love staying there!! So close to Disneyland and all the activities going on in Anaheim!!  I've been a customer for many years now and the rooms are always clean and the staff is very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review! We are glad to hear you enjoy coming back and staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had a 3 night stay here and loved the hotel and its location. You are steps to the Disney entrance and our room had a perfect view of the nightly fireworks. The hotel also has a great rooftop seating area for viewing the fireworks. I was travelling with my family and mother so we got a larger room that had a separate room with a sofa bed so we had some space and privacy. There is a basic but good breakfast and an indoor pool that the kids loved. Office staff were very nice and helpful. It was also one of the better priced hotels in the area as well as being closest to the park entry. I would definitely stay again on my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Bailey, thank for your for your review. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed staying with us and enjoyed our rooftop deck to watch the nightly fireworks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was amazing, great proximity to the Disney resort gates. Was clean comfortable and all the staff were eager to assist. Pool was nice clean and all amenities were at an arms length. Breakfast was always ready and decent variety.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review! We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to the parks and the low rate. We stayed for 3 nights and never had any issues. The rooms were larger than we expected and everything was clean. You don’t have the style or amenities of a 4 star resort but that’s not what you are paying for. It was great to have free WiFi, mini fridge, coffee maker etc and continental breakfast. The breakfast was very light but was an added bonus for the amount you paid. All of the staff was very friendly. We spent most of our days at the park or beach so we really only needed the room for a quick park break in the day or to sleep. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Crystal, thank you for your wonderful review! It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed our location and low rate. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Location, location, location! Almost right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. Free breakfast included is basic, but fills the need. Staff we encountered were all friendly. Rooms were kept clean and were done every day.
Manager Response: Dear Rodney, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you loved our convenient location. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We've been staying here for years when visiting Disneyland. We did a last-minute trip last weekend and were thrilled to find that Desert Inn had availability. The room was clean and in good repair, the breakfast selection has improved over the years and now includes apples and bananas (sometimes oranges), Danish, toast, either bagels or muffins, oatmeal, hard-boiled eggs, several cold cereals, milk, coffee and juice. I hope they never switch from the vegan margarine (an awesome plus for my milk-allergic daughter) and love how they keep the breads and bagels in their packaging (reduces cross-contamination and allows me to check the ingredients - I wish the cereal was in packages as well). The distance from the park cannot be beat. My husband didn't even think twice about staying
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your detailed response. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us and we are glad to hear you and your family enjoy our property and its location for your Disneyland vacations. It is also nice to hear that you and your daughter enjoy our breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again when you return!

Summary Heading: So close you can feel Disneyland
Summary: So close to the park! We were able to walk to security in 6 minutes. The breakfast didn’t have a wide enough variety that we would eat it unfortunately but the rooms were a great size! This visit was just a girls trip but when we bring kids back at a different time it will be nice since you can get joined rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Dayna, thank you for your amazing review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Really enjoyed the convenience of the hotel.  We stayed in the C2 Parlour room and all grandkids and kids were with us, which is special and very few hotels offer these types of suites. We also needed a scooter and the front desk staff immediately hooked us up to a provider who dropped it off in the lobby.  Saved so much hassle and we are grateful.  We will stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen, thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed our hotel and had a great vacation. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. It was very convenient to return to our room for a rest in the early afternoon.  Wonderful eating places close by and with coupons available from the front desk. Room was very clean and comfortable.  The only thing was  we missed breakfast one morning since it was  not available until 7 and since we had an early morning pass we had to get going. We did not go to the rooftop to see the fireworks because we were in the park until 11 at night.
Manager Response: Dear Peggy, thank you for your excellent review! We are delighted you enjoyed our clean and comfortable room. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: All in all the room was basic and clean. The location is perfect; right across from Disneyland entrance. The breakfast is the typical continental carb load.
