The front desk employees leave a lot to be desired. The parking valet couldn’t get our car out for 30 minutes because they blocked it in and couldn’t find the keys to the other car. Then when we picked our car up on another day it smelled like a sweaty person inside, seat was leaned back, and AC on high blowing straight at driver (I never have the AC blowing on me)- so maybe someone took a nap/break?  Just don’t set high expectations for this place. Clean. Basic. Don’t ask for anything. Park your car yourself.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location but would like to apologize that you experienced issues with the valet parking. We will use your comments to try and improve our service. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Had a great vacation. My room was huge. The continental breakfast would have been better with scrambled eggs and bacon but appreciate having breakfast included at the hotel. Love how close this hotel is to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Donna, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you had a great vacation while staying with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Disneyland Park right across the street
Summary: I've stayed here before, and I love the convenience of the park being right across the street.  Rooms were clean, front desk was accommodating.  Just make sure you ask for, and check your receipt when checking out.  For some reason, there was an extra $500 charged for the room.  Luckily, I happen to go to my online banking during our stay, and brought it to their attention.  They fixed it by the time we checked out.  This, however, was not the first time they've added extra charges to my card.  Otherwise, a great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Lina, thank you for your review. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us when you visit the parks and that you enjoy our location. We apologize about the billing issue you faced and hope it was resolved quickly for you. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Room felt clean, carpet could be replaced, hard floors would be much better in motels. The Valet manager was absolutely the best, most professional and kind. He was there because 2 employees did not show up for their shift. A/C worked well, beds were comfortable.  The viewing area on the roof is a nice feature. Breakfast was very adequate. The pool is not worth having, indoor, small and all tile flooring so very slippery.   Lastly, a guy was scrubbing the floors above us and draining the water. We were not advised of this and dirty mop water almost down-poured on my head!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed our rooms and had a pleasant stay with us. We will pass along your comments to the valet manager and we are glad he was able to assist you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was my third trip to the hotel in the last year. The location is great and it's enough amenities for what we need when I know we will be in the parks most of the day - except for nap time, when I really appreciate the dark rooms and air conditioning! Service has always been friendly, including the parking attendants when I've driven in. When we had flights that arrived before check-in and departed after check-out, they had secure storage lockers where we could keep our suitcases. The one thing I would add is nicer towels, but they get the job done :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your great review!  We are honored you continue to come back and stay with us. We are happy to hear our location is convenient for your Disneyland adventures. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites was a fantastic property for our Disneyland vacation. It literally took us 6 minutes to walk to the security gates to get into the park. We were able to walk back to the room midday to relax and eat. The room was clean. The breakfast was good. The pool was warm. We would not stay anywhere else for a Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer, thank you for your amazing review! We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful Disneyland vacation and that our property and amenities were convenient for you. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This was our second time staying at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites. The room was great still dated but clean, The front desk clerks where very friendly. The maid staff was less friendly. We waited 20 plus minutes to get our bags out of the storage lockers. We called for extra wash cloths and they never arrived. The lady running the breakfast bar said they where out of bananas, I watched her give the man in front of me a banana from the very full banana box but when I asked she said they were out.   You can't go wrong with the price and location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We appreciate you coming back and staying with us. We are sorry for the issues you experienced with the service you received and with our bag storage. We will use your comments to try and improve and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights recently on the 5th floor. Fantastic proximity to Disneyland (literally just walk across the street), decent pricing, good on-site parking. The continental breakfast is very basic and really the only thing with protein was the hardboiled egg, but I'm thankful that at least they offer something. Our room felt dated, but it was okay. Both the bathroom sink and the shower drain backed up our first time using them - we called to have them fixed the next morning and unfortunately only the sink got fixed. Our shower kept backing up the entire trip, which was a little gaggy. While it's nice that fireworks can be watched from the upstairs viewing deck, our 5th floor room was directly below the tables up there and there was a HUGE amount of noise
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We appreciate you staying with us and would to apologize for the issues you faced while staying with us. We hope you return so we can offer you a room in a different location that will be more to your liking. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location, clean room and good size, nice breakfast to start your day off. Very busy in summer . I recommend this hotel I’ve been there ten different stays and keep going back every visit..I was told the room with two beds are not handicap the room with a pull out coach you can get handicap if available....
Manager Response: Dear Dot, thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you continuing to stay with us and are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location, clean room and breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: I reserved this hotel cuz it’s across from DL. I have stayed at different hotels when I went to DL and so far the best place I have stayed at. Breakfast is open until 9:30, wi-fi worked well in my room, there are many options for the restaurants in this area, and we can see the beautiful fireworks on the roof. I’ll stay here again if I plan to go to DL.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your great review. We are honored to hear that we are the best hotel you have stayed at while visiting Disneyland. We are glad you were able to enjoy the nightly fireworks from our rooftop deck. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is ideally located directly across of the pedestrian entrance to Disneyland. The hotel is standard fare, a little worn, clean, comfortable, 3 stars, but its location raises it to the 4 I have given it.
Manager Response: Dear Scott, thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our location and that we were convenient for your Disneyland trip. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here in February last year, and just booked again for next February. Over the years we have probably stayed here at least 10 times and each stay has been great.   The staff are friendly, happy to help, and quick to bring the car around.   The rooms are clean but a little dated. All worth it for the perfect location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are honored you continue to come back and stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: We had a family trip to Disneyland and this location was perfect!  The hotel was right across the street...all you had to do was cross the cross walk.  And the night we did not go to the parks, we watched the fireworks on the rooftop terrace.  This area fills up quick, so get there early.  The staff was courteous and the room was large enough to accommodate a family of 6.  For the location, the service, and the price, you can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review! We greatly appreciate you staying with us and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed our property. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: My family visits Disneyland quite often, and we love everything about staying at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  A spacious room, comfortable beds, a good continental breakfast, and a fantastic location right across the street from the Disneyland Resort; all for a very affordable price. A big shout out to Tio and the staff for their friendly and very accommodating customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Edward, thank you for an excellent review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and friendly service. We will share your comments with our staff and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nothing great about it and nothing wrong with it
Summary: This place is 50/50.  All we really need when visiting Disneyland is a comfy-enough bed and a hot shower.  This place provides that, but don't look for more.  Rooms are as clean as any other budget hotel.  Breakfast room is not great compared to neighboring hotels - too crowded, not enough seats inside or outside, only cold options - so we bring our own.  Ice machine is only on 2 of the 5 floors and 1 of them was broken last time we were here.  We asked for a 1st floor room but our room type was only on the 4th floor.  Convenience and amenities are not abundant but we've stayed in worse. :) Location is excellent and prices are usually good for Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, thank you for your comments. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location but would like to apologize that your overall stay did not meet your expectations. We greatly value your feedback and hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: This is our first time to disneyland ,we're lucky to found here! it's really close to disneyland, just opposite there.U can just cross the road and arrived! The room is clean and quiet,but the breakfast was simple and so so. We really had a great time here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear you had an excellent first visit to Disneyland and you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times over the years.  They serve breakfast and have a pool.  Reasonably priced.  Not a lot of bells and whistles but has all the basics.  Denny's and IHOP are right next store for a "cheaper" bite before you go in or after you leave the park.  Also, SUPER close to the main gate...which makes a HUUUGE difference at the end of the day :)  Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you continuing to stay with us over the years. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Always stay at this hotel, right across the street so when you your party is tired and cant walk any more, there you are. : ) We started in the morning and came back for lunch at McDonalds a few doors down then took a nap before heading back into the park.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear our location was convenient for your Disneyland adventures. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed in the executive room and were very pleased with the accommodations. The room was a perfect size for the 4 of us and very comfortable. The price of the room was a main selling point as was the proximity to Disneyland. The walk was only about 5-7 minutes after our long days in the park - and it was affordable for our family. We’ve stayed here before and it never disappoints. The staff was all very friendly too! Can’t wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Laurie, thank you for your amazing review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and the room was the perfect size for your family. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: They are way over priced for what you get. They say they have breakfast but it should have said cold, hardly anything available breakfast. The pool is indoors which seems great but it is so stifling in there you can't really enjoy it. The hot tub was also way too hot. Based on the location I have them a 3 but honestly that is the only reason.
Manager Response: Dear Trinity, thank you for your response. We apologize that your stay did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: We stayed two nights. It was extremely convenient since we went to Disneyland two days in a row. We literally walked across the street to Disney and was amazing to walk back with 2 tired little kids at the end of the day. The complimentary breakfast was decent. All the food tastes good. The room itself was very clean and the air conditioning was wonderful since it was so hot outside. It was nice the room had a small fridge and microwave since my kids brought snacks. There were 5 of us staying in the room so the fact that the couch turned into a big bed was brilliant. My 1 and 5 year olds loved the indoor swimming pool. It was great letting them play in the water and not worry about them getting burned in the sun. Also, the staff was very friendly and promptly helped us when we
Manager Response: Dear Ana, thank you for your wonderful review!  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our property and that its location was convenient for you. We are happy you and your family had a fun Disney trip and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We have been staying at the Desert Inn and suites for the last 6+ years it’s very convenient and we have always had good customer service.  I recommend this location for your family vacations.  The rooms are very clean and always stocked with enough towels and toilet three items .
Manager Response: Dear Rosa, thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear you enjoy our location and clean rooms. We appreciate your recommendation and for continuing to stay with us over the past 6 years. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Really handy to the parks!  Clean and comfortable. We are not used to such comfortable mattresses in a hotel!  They upgraded our room at no charge which was a huge help with our big family. The breakfast was just average, but  helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our comfy beds and that your room was able to fit your family. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I really appreciate the comfort and ease of checking in to the Desert Inn Suites. I've used this hotel ever since my bachelorette party for subsequent years because I love it so much. The ease of walking across the street to Disneyland and CA Adventure is worth the cost! The cleaning service is excellent as well and everything feels very professional.
Manager Response: Dear Melody, thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you continuing to stay with us again and again. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Great valet service even though they charged me extra for parking when I was sure it was included in the overall price. Room was fine for just coming back from Disneyland to sleep & shower. Didn't end up using the pool due to time, but wanted to because it looked so inviting.
Manager Response: Dear Renee, thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed staying with us. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This was the second time we’ve stayed at the Desert Inn and Suites and it did not disappoint. We returned to the property based on the extremely close proximity to the Disneyland  main gates and the unbeatable nightly rates. We had a family parlor suite which my family of 5 shared with a set of grandparents. The room was large, clean, well kept and gave everyone the space they needed. The air conditioning in each room provided constant cool relief from a 90+ degree heat spell. While the breakfast is rather lackluster it does the job when you are trying to get to the parks in the morning. Desert Inn and Suites is our go-to basic economy motel in the Disneyland Resort area!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear that we met your expectations and you had a pleasant stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: I love the convenience of this hotel to Disneyland, clean rooms, comfortable beds, etc. The only thing that isn’t awesome is the staff. The desk staff can be very rude and short with customers, I experienced this myself and saw others have the same issue. They were focused on their personal discussion and other staff than taking 5 minutes to explain something to you as a guest.   The continental breakfast is kind of a joke. Small selection of dry pastries, hard boiled eggs, and a couple cereals. Not much to fuel up on a day of Disney, I get that it’s free and shouldn’t expect it to much, but it’s pretty pitiful.   If you’re looking for decent accommodations close to Disney where you don’t want to talk to the staff, it’s a great option. Lol. If you want to be treated as a
Manager Response: Dear Lizzy, thank you for your comments. We would like to apologize for the issues you faced and that your stay did not meet your expectations. We greatly value your feedback and will share your response with our staff to improve our service. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: We love staying at Desert Inn and Suites. Location is the best. It has a  Great continental breakfast that changes per day to help add to the variety. Friendly staff. If I know we are going, I always stay here if possible.
Manager Response: Dear Melinda, thank you for your amazing review. We appreciating you continuing to stay with us and we we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Kind staff, basic amenities, great location
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel often. And we already have plans to return soon. Difficult to beat the location. We found the beds very comfortable and the rooms clean. One of our favorite features of this hotel is the large-sized rooms. That is, they have a number of rooms and pseudo-suites (typical hotel rooms modified and combined into multi-room suites) that can accommodate larger families. There were maintenance issues in our room during this past stay. But after a few times of working with staff, they were resolved. Amenities are very basic. So we recommend bringing preferred toiletries such as shampoo, if that matters to you. Breakfast is particularly simple. So if you need a substantial, hot breakfast, plan on visiting one of the various nearby restaurants that can
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our beds and clean room. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Can't beat Desert Inn and Suites for a great location when going to Disneyland!  The short walk after a long day at Disney is awesome!  The staff is friendly and professional and they always take great care of us. The parking lot is small, but the valets do a great job of taking care of the vehicles.
Manager Response: Dear Diane, thank you for your amazing review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our friendly staff and valets.We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent two nights here in May for a weekend at Disneyland. I was hesitant since the beds were not comfortable in the past. I must say now they have very comfortable beds and overall the hotel was great. The proximity to Disneyland cannot be beat, it’s right across the street. The hotel is basic but clean, comfortable, and the staff were friendly. They offer a free breakfast which has cereal, toast, and boiled eggs. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We appreciate you visiting us again and we are glad to hear you enjoyed our beds and had a great overall experience. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and breakfast is good
Summary: Stayed two nights recently.  The room is quite big and has an automatic air conditioning which is quite comfortable and easy to use.  Location is very close Disneyland and many Disneyland quests are staying at this hotel.  The breakfast was really good.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Such an easy walk to the park!
Summary: AP holders on and off for 6 years, so we’ve had multiple visits to the park and made it a mission to check out multiple hotels hoping to find the perfect spot. While this hotel is on the older (aka not updated) side and the breakfast selection was fair, the location was worth it!!!  We’re very spoiled now. It was great after the long long days at the parks to not have to walk another 20+ minutes to the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We appreciate you checking us out and glad you enjoyed our location. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was very clean and the room was spacious. The beds were FANTASTIC, pillows and mattresses were very comfortable. There was a safe in the room. Self parking/valet is 15.00 per day. We were allowed to park the car on property before check in. The staff were friendly and helpful, the morning breakfast was ok. Mostly muffins, toast, cereal, assorted drinks. There is an inside pool and jacuzzi that require a room key to enter. Overall a great value. It is located across the street from Disneyland main gate, and there is an IHOP, and Denny's next door. Also within walking distance of McDonald's.
Manager Response: Dear Robert, thank you for your wonderful response. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our rooms spacious and beds comfortable. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: this is a wonderful property to stay at during your Disneyland vacation.  The hotel is across the street from the main gate and a five minute walk to the gates of California Adventure or Disneyland.  The room we had was spacious Quiet and well kept with comfortable beds.  Hotel has an indoor pool, breakfast room and roof top patio for viewing the fireworks.  Underground valet parking for your vehicle.  This hotel is flanked by a Denny's and IHOP with a cold stone at the front for a late night treat.This facility is an excellent value for the money.  No complaints and the next time we travel to Disney this will be our first choice for accommadations.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and comfortable beds. We look forward to seeing you on your next Disney trip!

Summary: Everthing was very good we travel with 3kids and the room was spacious and very nice the bathroom very clean . The continental breakfast was perfect to stat before going into the park  the service of the personal was very kind reapectful . Everything was really nice defenetely staying in this hotel again
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Best things about this hotel are the location and large rooms
Summary: One of a couple hotels directly across from the main Disney entrance and right by the crosswalk, just a few minutes walk to the security checkpoint. Small parking lot and we had to let the valet park the car as there is very limited self-parking and we arrived very late. We stayed two nights but could only check-in for one night at a time because of the way I booked (first online booking was non-refundable so wouldn't allow for adding nights, so I had to make a separate booking for additional night). So I had to come back in the morning and check out, then check in for second night. Just a minor inconvenience, but it would be nice if they could have just modified my reservation to allow me to check in for both nights at once. Luckily we didn't have to change rooms. We were on
Manager Response: none

Summary: No water pressure .Air didn't work and believe it or not needed it in January .rooms our very small were from Oregon and come with grand babies once a year have stayed in 5 of motels located  with in feet of cross walk to Disneyland This one is  number  4 out of 5. I rate on price , being clean , kid friendly, We need  refridge and microwave,pool  oh forgot pool was down for remodeling and you had to go to another motel to swim  THe  one thing they do have is a place to watch fire works from . But I would suggest being in Disneyland to watch fireworks  I've been going to Disneyland for 54 years and the new light show is amazing . Have fun
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed here a couple of times, four to be exact, and feel I can now give an appropriate review. Let's get the most burning question out of the way first, yes, this place is super close to Disneyland.  The Good:  Location, location, location, located on Harbor Blvd. it is one of several hotels within walking distance to Disneyland. I used my map app and dropped a pin, from the hotel to the gates to enter Disneyland is .6 miles, or a 3-6 minute walk pending the one light you need to use to cross the street. It is actually closer to the resorts than Disney's own Paradise Pier.Only two other hotels on Harbor are actually closer than this location, so it is very good for distance.  Valet Parking, one thing that annoys me when I go to a hotel while visiting Disneyland is
Manager Response: Dear Chris, thank you for your response. We appreciate you staying with us and we are glad you enjoyed our location. We greatly value your feedback and will try to use your comments to improve our services. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is all about the location.  It is approximately 15 steps from the crosswalk across to the main entrance promenade for both Disneyland and California Adventure.  From inside the parks it takes approximately 10 minutes to walk back to your room to grab warm clothes, snacks, sunscreen or whatever you may have forgotten.  No waiting for shuttles or long walks on tired legs.  The rooms are clean and the price is great, especially for families or groups of 5 or more.  The continental breakfast is a bonus and included pastries, bagels and cream cheese, muffins, toast, hard-boiled eggs, oatmeal, dry cereal, apples, oranges and bananas, as well as Coffee, milk and a variety of juices - more than enough to get your family started for a day in the parks.  My four kids are now
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We are delighted to hear that our location was convenient for your Disneyland vacation. We appreciate you and your family continuing to stay with us, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the room. It was clean and tidy. Perfect for a trip to Disneyland, since you'll only be sleeping there. My family typically spends all day at the park and return to the hotel ~0030. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear you would recommend us and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We were visiting as part of our summer family trip.  We like to be close to Disneyland, and this location is just about as close as you can get.  As always, we were more than pleased with the service of the front desk staff and housekeeping and the accommodations and cleanliness of the rooms exceeded standards.  We will continue to stay here for all of our Anaheim trips!  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing response. We are delighted to hear you and your family had an excellent stay with us. It nice to hear you and your family were pleased with our room quality and staff.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Bang for Your Buck at DLR
Summary: This is our second trip staying at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites and it was great. The rooms are clean and updated. The staff is very friendly and always helpful. We will definitely be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing review. We are happy that you had a pleasant stay with us and that you enjoyed our rooms and friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: As Disneyland passholders we like to do quick weekend getaways. This was our first time at Anaheim Desert Inn and we really liked it. Love separate seating area. Room was quiet and employees were friendly. Location cannot be beat for Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review. We appreciate you giving us a try and we are glad you had a pleasant stay with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is seriously the best location for visiting Disneyland! The breakfast is great too. We love the oatmeal, hard boiled eggs, dainishes, cereal and all the rest of the yumniness. The staff is kind and super helpful. We stay here every time we go to Disneyland and it’s always been fantastic! We are annual pass holders so we get a discount too!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your amazing comments! We greatly appreciate you continuing to stay with us and are happy to hear you loved our breakfast and as well as our staff. We look forward to your return soon!

Summary: We are spoiled by the desert inn!  Nothing compares to the quality of this place! It is our go to home away from home when we are visiting Disney!  Everyone is so kind and warm no matter the time or matter!  This is not a standard across the board for all hotels Desert Inn has something special!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah, thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear you continue to enjoy our hotel and we will share your comments with our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Being Annual Passholders this is our go-to hotel when we have to have our Disneyland fix for our Family of 6! This hotel sits right across the street from the main entrance of Disneyland. Making it safe for those of us that have teens that like to go on their own. It's nestled between a Denny's & Ihop, plus McDonalds and Panera just a 5 minute walk down the same block.   The rooms are set up to accommodate families or groups. All rooms have two beds and if you are looking for more space and comfort, than you must book a suite on the 5th. floor. The suites have two queen or king beds plus a small living room with a pull out couch. For our Family of 6, one suite is perfect. However, for larger parties you should get two connected suites. - Disclaimer: This hotel is not fancy at
Manager Response: Dear Domingo, thank you for your excellent review. We are honored that we are your go-to-hotel for your Disneyland trips. We are glad to hear you enjoy our hotel and all that it has to offer. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was our 4th stay at the Desert Inn and suites. Great location, literally  across the street from Disneyland! Had a double queen bed with a sofa bed room and it was good for our family. Very basic continental breakfast but it does the job. There is a Denny's next door and it's very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us and are happy you enjoyed our location. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We enjoyed staying at the Anaheim Desert Inn.  Our rooms were very big and clean.  Your hotel was nice and convenient to Disneyland.  We liked that it was so close to restaurants too.  We would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your great review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed our rooms. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We were in a suite for 8 and the space was very comfortable. It is so nice and very easy to get to  Disneyland and the Angels games. It was clean and the staff was helpful. It would have been more convenient with 8 people to have 2 showers. There was only 1 shower but 2 toilets. The breakfast is very convenient but not very good. The parking is kind of a nightmare. There is only one way in and out. This was our 2nd stay and we would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Jared, thank you for your response. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate your comments. For your next stay we suggest you check out our C2 Family Suite which has 2 showers in it. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our room with 4 queens and a sofa bed was perfect for our large family plus grandma and grandpa too. It was a fun (and short) walk to the park each morning. It was also fun to watch the fireworks from the roof. The room was big enough and well cared for. Breakfast was just right as well. Thank you for taking good care of us.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear you and your family were well taken care of and enjoyed our large family suite. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another good stay across the way
Summary: Great value and recently updated rooms right across the street from Disneyland. Fourth floor is good, as it can be busy/noisy. Breakfast was also really good. Only downside was indoor vs. outdoor pool if you are into relaxing by the pool. Great value for larger parties if you get the family suite, which is basically two adjoining rooms. Can't beat the location either!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you had a good stay with us and enjoyed our large family suite. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great value for your Disneyland trip.
Summary: We live in northern California, are annual pass holders and go to Disneyland quite a few times a year. Our trips often include our adult children and grandchildren. The options of suites at Desert Inn are fantastic. We can get a 2 bedroom suite (with an additional small room for kids) for around $250 a night, which is an absolute great value. The rooms are large and clean, the staff is very friendly and the breakfast is adequate to get your day started. The location is one of the best in Anaheim and a short walk to the entrance of the parks. Parking is a little tight for large vehicles but the staff does a good job of accommodating all the SUV's and minivans. The only dig I have is that the breakfast doesn't open until 7AM and when you are trying to get an early start it would
Manager Response: Dear Rick, thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy to hear that we are a great option for you and your family when you visit Disneyland. It is nice to hear you enjoyed our family suite and were able to fit your entire family comfortably for a decent price. We appreciate your comments and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Across the street from the Disneyland entrance
Summary: I stayed at this hotel about 20 years ago. It was outdated then as it was now. I love the place due to proximity of Disneyland. Parking was a little crazy but they were organized. The restroom by the pools were the cleanest I ever seen from a hotel. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Damini, thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your comments and are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean restrooms. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: If you are visiting Disneyland Park, this hotel has one of the most privilege location, after Disneyland Resorts. It’s located in front of the main park entrance, within 100 yards form the front door. You won’t need to take a shuttle or use the expensive Disneyland parking lot. Even though most of the hotels in this area are very old, this hotel has been recently renovated. The suites are comfortable. It could use some upgrades, but it’s quite average for you would find around here. The suites have a mini fridge and a microwave, but it does not count with a kitchen area.  The parking spaces are limited, but the concierge would find you a space to leave your car if you can’t find a parking space (it could be in a risk spot, though)  The hotel does not have a restaurant, and the
Manager Response: Dear Gretter, thank you for your comments. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and it was convenient for your Disneyland trip. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: have stayed many times in the past 20 years. rooms have been updated and service was great. This time staffed tried to get our room for my family ready before our actual check in time.  Great place to stay for families bigger then 4 people.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you continuing to come back to us again and again.We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel was clean and right across the street from Disney! What else can you ask for? The pool was a nice break, although water was very warm, a little too warm for my liking but it didn't seem to bother the kids. Parking is a bit scarce but we got lucky the couple times we actually moved our car. Otherwise once you park you don't need it much, IF Disney is why you are there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We appreciate your comments and we are glad you enjoyed our property. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Didn't like it as much as usual
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times. This time we stayed for 11 nights. We originally had 4 rooms reserved but ended up just needing one. So I called 3 weeks ahead of our arrival date and canceled 3 of the rooms. Then I got a call from the hotel the day after our rooms were originally scheduled. They said that we didn't show up for our reservation so we were being charged for the first night for 3 rooms! It was the rooms I had already cancelled. When I checked my email there was no confirmation of the cancellation. I spoke with the manger who was condescending. But eventually they refunded those charges. Fast forward to the night of our check in. When we checked in they tried to charge me a higher rate than what we had reserved. This time I had a confirmation email
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We apologize that your stay did not meet your standards. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay and plan to stay there again in the future.  We will, however hope to get a suite with two showers.  The parking could be improved though it beats trying to park at Disneyland!!! Love the convenience to the parks, dining and stores.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and plan to return in the future. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in June. The location was great!  It took less than a minute to walk from the lobby to the crosswalk to Disneyland. The was a charge for parking but it was reasonable compared to other hotels in the area. Check in was very easy. Breakfast was good and is set up to keep the line moving. There was fresh fruit, toast,bagels,cereal, hard boiled eggs, coffee and orange juice. We never had a long wait. The parlor suite was roomy and clean and housekeeping was good.   We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jim, thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and our happy to hear we made your Disneyland trip easy. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: All good except for one issue
Summary: My family group of 4 enjoyed our stay at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites; the room was clean and comfortable, and the valet service excellent.  The only issue arose when we returned to our room from Disneyland one afternoon and heard the phone ringing, but weren't able to answer in time. The message light then flashed but despite following the printed instructions on the phone, I wasn't able to access the message.  I called to the office and was told
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and valet service. We apologize that you had issues with the room phone but hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Very convenient parking and access to the Disneyland parks.
Summary: We traveled as a family of 5 and really appreciated the location and the cleanliness of the facility.  It wasn't a 4 star hotel, but it was good enough for our needs and you could not beat the location. We booked a 2Q/1Sofa room which was perfect for our party.  The enclosed shower/toilet area added to the convenience. Parking was easy, and if there were no spots available then the valet took over.  Breakfast was simple but sufficient to get you going.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us and our pleased to hear that you enjoyed your Disneyland trip. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: It was very disappointing on our first night the AC did not work and we had already un packed and they didnt have a maintance guy they sent up the laundry room guy to fix he took apart the AC right in front of us... Finally they told us we had to move to the bottom floor away from our group we were with my whole family was together except us at the way bottom.. We did get a discount but we still missed being next to all our family and that night we missed out on dinner and the fireworks cause we had yo pack and move to another room and unpack again.. We always stay here on disneyland trips and never had a promblem before
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your comments. We apologize that you had issues with your AC and had to switch rooms. This was inconvenient for you as you were moved away from your family. We will use your comments to improve and hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: This property is located almost directly across the street from Disneyland's entrance.  While it is a little old, the location can't be beat.  Denny's is right next door & Ihop is 2 doors away.  The indoor pool is a plus during the winter months.  The "continental" breakfast is a little bare, but considering the price of the room & the location, the breakfast is enough to get you started in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Julie, thank you for your response. We are delighted to hear you and your grand kids enjoyed staying with us and had a pleasant Disneyland trip. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Very close to the Disneyland entrance which will save your legs by the end of the day. Handy also to Dennys, IHop and Bubba Gumps restaurants.  Good laundry and indoor pool and the included breakfast is great. It was the second time we have stayed there and happy with the hotel and they are serviced every day but could probably do with an upgrade of the room decor.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location. We appreciate you coming back to stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had a parlor room.  The beds are comfortable enough and the room is set up nicely.  Pros...  *LOCATION, it is only a 40 second walk to the entrance to Disneyland.  It takes about 5 minutes to get to security check.  Desert Inn is one of the closest hotels. *Good size room, able to spread out. *Free continental breakfast every morning. *Helpful staff *Indoor pool (not amazing but serves it's purpose) *Fireworks viewing area.  (We didn't use it because we were able to see them from our 4th floor room)  Cons... *Limited parking (but valet did say that if we couldn't find a space, that we could use valet and not be charged extra) *Very low shower head.  I am 5'9" and had to lean down to get my hair under the water.  Overall, it is a great value for the money we paid.  If we ever
Manager Response: Dear Beverly, thank you for your amazing review! We are delighted to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay with us and enjoyed our location and rooms. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Good location, but NOTHING ELSE to like about it
Summary: RECOMMENDATION:  Cross this hotel off your list right now. Do not consider staying here. The staff is beyond horrendous. I've never experienced such a consistently awful staff at any hotel, ever. We've stayed at several hotels just next door to this property on Harbor Blvd for Disneyland trips and this was the worst experience by far.  *We have also tried Best Western Plus Park Place Inn, Castle Inn, Camelot, Park Vue, Howard Johnson, Fairfield Marriott, Holiday Inn Express Resort Area.   SUMMARY:  The ONLY good thing about this hotel is the location, it is one of the closest hotels to the entrance of Disneyland. If you factor that out then the hotel would fail miserably. Ask yourself is it really worth it to save 2-5 minutes of walk time but have to deal with a horribly run
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your detailed review and comments.We would like to apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We are sorry to hear you had a poor check-in and housekeeping experience and we will use your comments to improve our process. We hope you give us another chance in the future to exceed your expectations.

Summary: The Hotel is directly across from the entrance to Disneyland. The Rooms are comfortable and AC works great. Easy access to Uber and Lyft. Denny's  is right nest door for that late night snack. Staff was responsive and polite.  Great Stay
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and had a great stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for a quick Disney trip over Christmas. We chose the hotel for it's location and it didn't disappoint. It was so nice to be able to walk across the street to the park. Comparable to staying at one of the Disney hotels.   The rooms were decent and what you would expect from this type of hotel. Our room was right above the indoor pool and that was slightly problematic. There were some very rowdy kids playing late at night in the pool. It did not sound like they were supervised because they kept running back and forth from the pool to their room. The only reflection on the actual hotel is that they don't regulate the pool better. There are families staying with small children and it was difficult for my daughter to sleep. The noise was disturbing and it was past
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and had a pleasant Disneyland trip. We apologize that you had issues with noise from the pool. For future reference please do not hesitate to contact the front desk during your stay and we would be more than happy to assist you with any concerns. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had a great stay at the hotel. The location is great, being right across the street from Disneyland was fantastic! There was plenty of restaurants nearby and our room was clean. We have no complaints!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are pleased to hear you had a great stay with us and you had no issues while on vacation. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I totally love this hotel. The staff is amazing. They treat you like family. Love the fact they have the breakfast area. The rooms looks so fresh since the remodel. I love the location as it has a variety of places to eat.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy you enjoyed our staff and liked our new furniture. We hope to see you again soon when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: We loved this place! The staff was very helpful and super friendly. The valet gentleman was very helpful and sweet. We were a family of 6 and had ample room together. The hotel is literally right across from Disneyland and next to perfect family affordable restaurants. The continental breakfast was the only downside. I recommend 100%!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are delighted to hear you and your family had enough space and enjoyed your stay with us. We will share your comments with our staff and valet team. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The suites are perfect for our family of 5.  Super clean, wonderful a/c, affordable, friendly staff, filling breakfast, guest laundry facilities very nice & helps us to be able to pack light, easy parking, pool, rooftop fireworks viewing and the best feature for our family is how close it is to the parks, just a short walk allows us to come back to the room midday for a bite to eat, a swim & rest.  Really easy to get to from I5.  The one year we flew into LA, the hotel was so gracious to store our bags until check-in & then again after we checked out until it was time for our return flight.  We have had groceries & Chinese food delivered directly to our room. We think of the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites as
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you continuing to stay with us. We are happy to hear you and your family have a great Disneyland experience when staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Great location across the street from Disneyland. Clean room, decent size, elevator. Executive Queen Suite big enough for 4 people, 2 queen beds and pullout sofa. Bathroom sink outside of shower, that’s good. Microwave and mini fridge a plus too. Only bummer was low water pressure in shower.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our executive queen suite and our location. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Can't beat quality for price, location.
Summary: We've stayed here a few times. Always a good value for our $$, especially since it's across from park entrances. With a disabled son it's so much easier to access the fun and surrounding restaurants. Only thing I don't care for is their version of continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy, thank you for your review. We appreciate you continuing to stay with us. We happy to hear our location is convenient for you and your family. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: PERFECT!  Right across the street from Disneyland..at the the crosswalk everyone uses to cross to the main entrance.  Rooms were nice and cleaned daily. Breakfast was fine - fruit, juice, milk ,cereal, oatmeal, hard boiled eggs, breads, danish and coffee. Nice breakfast area.  Small indoor pool and hot tub...we didn't have time to use but it looked fine.  Elevators so you don't have to take your sleeping kids out of the stroller to cart them up stairs!! Great place! I'll stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we appreciate your wonderful review! We are happy to hear you and your family had a pleasant stay with us and that our location was convenient for your Disneyland trip. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable.  We were at Disneyland to get engaged and my fiancé had seizures from the fireworks because he fought in Iraq.  The staff helped him and extended our stay to accommodate our engagement.  John and I will never forget your kindness; especially the day and night managers!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted that you and your fiancé enjoyed staying with us. We would like to thank him for his service.  It was our pleasure accommodating you and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice and close to the entrance to the parks
Summary: Great location to the parks just a short walk. The rooms are clean and the beds are very comfortable. The pool area is very small and its inside oppose to being outside. The breakfast is ok if your into eating a lot of carbs.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and comfortable beds. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The place is nice for the price. Clean and quite. Close to the main gate Disneyland ! The suites are spacious . Breakfest is provided. Toast, bagels, cereal, oatmeal, danish, mini muffins,bananas, apples, hard boiled eggs, coffee, milk and juice
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our property and our breakfast options. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Across the street....what else could you ask for!
Summary: The only negative is that we wanted a bigger breakfast so Dennys and IHOP I will not be eating for awhile! Other than that, no complaints from us. The pool was also legit because indoors is legit.....
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and indoor pool. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great stay right across the road from Disneyland. Free continental breakfast daily. The Family suite is excellent, lots of room we had  5 adults and 2 children. Great rooftop viewing of Disney fireworks nightly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted to hear you and your family enjoyed our family suite. We are also glad you were able to check out our rooftop viewing deck for the nightly fireworks. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We love the location of this hotel. The staff is friendly and accommodating. Although the rooms we’ve stayed in are dated, they have all the necessary essentials. Two negatives are the parking and only having one elevator, both of which are frustrating when the hotel is crowded.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and staff. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Excellent location - across the street from Disneyland.  Neat & clean basic room which is all thats needed for a few hours of sleep.  Breakfast is included & is good for a quick bite on the way over to the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and clean rooms. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights.  Clean and up to date.  Very reasonable pricing.  Would stay again.  Staff is awesome!! Walking distance to the park. Awesome value for the money. Saw that they were updating and replacing furniture. Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are happy you enjoyed our property and staff. We appreciate your positive comments and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I brought a small group down from our music department.  The rooms were clean, parking charges are low, the staff is courteous and helpful, and it's really close to Disneyland!  If I ever bring a group to Anaheim, I will always stay at the Desert Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted that you and your group had a pleasant stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: There were 2 reasons for booking this hotel- the fact it was right across the street, and that we could get a suite that had 3 rooms connected- their largest suites have a large room with 2 queens, a bit smaller room with 2 queens, and a center middle room with tv, table and a pull out couch. This gave us the the ability to put a toddler to bed in each room, and still have somewhere to be. Grandma was happy to stay in once the littles were in bed, and thus the parents could return to the parks till close.   Booking- I changed our booking when a better rate came out for check-ins starting on sundays, thus I made a 1 night booking for the saturday night we arrived, and a 5 night booking after that. It was a good thing I called to ask a question a month or so out, as they had our
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response and feedback. We would like to apologize that your stay did not meet your expectations. You have highlighted some areas we can improve on and will share your feedback with our staff. We will discuss our locker room procedure with our staff, as we want to ensure the safety of guest belongings. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: We have stayed here a few times. The rooms are a good size and you can't beat the location, just quick jaunt across the street and your at the parks. Parking is also fzntasyic. They let you park before check in and the valet staff is very friendly and helpful. This is one of my favorite place to stay when I go to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy to hear our location was convenient for you and will pass along your positive comments to our valet team. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: One of the closest hotels to Disneyland, and the best price.   Rooms were clean and a good size. Bring an eye mask - the shutters on the window do nothing to block out the corridor lights.   The pool and hot tub were great, nice to soak after a day in the parks. The pool hours were similar to the park hours though, and often the pool closed before the park did. It would be better if the pool was open earlier and later so that people could actually use it. The hot tub was a bit dirty because there is no shower area on the pool deck, so people go into the tub dirty.   Breakfast was sub-par - the 'pastries' were the kind you might find at a gas station and the hard boiled eggs were cold from a bag. Bring your own peanut butter.   All in all it was a great hotel for the price and
Manager Response: Dear Allana, thank you for your response. We greatly value your feedback and will share your comments with our maintenance team. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: You can’t beat the price or convenience of the location. I will try pick this hotel every time we visit. It is right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. Breakfast is also served to guests also,
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad you had a great stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: The only good thing about this place is the location. It’s a few minute walk to Disneyland and is in between IHOP and Denny’s. BUT if you want a restful stay the beds are hard and small, the pillows are half size and you can hear what’s going on in the roof above you. There is lots of outside noise AND the outdoor lights shine in all night.  Then there’s the shower. Now I’m only 5”5 and I was too tall to stand under the shower head. The bath was grotty underneath the bath mat.  And to make an average stay worst when checking out the receptionist ignored me when I complained the room was noisey, then tried over and over again to charge me for a night I had already paid for (I use traveller cards with just enough cash for each stay so they can’t take more out). But after trying to
Manager Response: Dear Kate, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you did not have a pleasant stay with us and we would like to apologize that your room was noisy and that you did not get a good nights rest. We will share your valuable feedback with our staff and attempt to improve.

Summary: We have stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites on several occasions now, and we find the proximity to the Disneyland resort extremely convenient and especially so at the end of a long day in the park.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you find our location so convenient for your Disneyland adventures. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for three nights and were very pleased with the hotel for the price we paid, especially considering the location.  The beds were comfortable and the rooms clean.  The hotel is dated but that doesn't bother us, we're more interested in a clean, safe room.  Breakfast was extremely limited, the only protein was hard boiled eggs, but we made do.  The lights outside the room were very bright and while we did notice it the first night, we were too worn out from the parks the other two nights to notice.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sara, thank you for your wonderful review. We are happy to hear you were pleased with your stay here at our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: FANTASTIC location. On our recent trip, we were able to go back to the room for a quick nap for “the kids”. Everyone fell asleep, and then I remembered we had a Fastpass for Indiana Jones. Fastpass expired in 30 minutes by the time I realized, so I grabbed my son, and off we went (leaving the other two boys and my husband behind). My son and I were able to get through security and to the ride with 15 minutes to spare! Woot!  Besides the proximity, the rooms are comfortable and clean, with what you need for a stay at Disneyland. They aren’t fancy rooms, with lots bells and whistles, like I said, but they have a good sized mini fridge (we brought two gallons of milk for our families stay, and there was still plenty of room for sippy cups and baby food. We have stayed here before,
Manager Response: Dear Josie, thank you for your wonderful review and continuing to stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and that you were able to make your Fastpass time. We look forward to seeing you and your family again in the future!

Summary: We love the Desert Inn  & have stayed at this location for the past 23 years. The staff is wonderful- the indoor pool is great & the new roof top patio is AWESOME! The rooms are clean & the location is so convenient - Recommended many times over.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We thank you for being a valued guest and that you continue to stay with us. We greatly appreciate your recommendation. We are delighted to hear you enjoy our staff as well as our location and amenities. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is very close to the park. We were in the enclosed area near the back room 236. It was kind of loud in the evening because the area held sound. The porch light never turns off so the room is lit all night long.  Shower was fine, beds were great. Breakfast was not my kind of food.
Manager Response: Dear Suzy, thank you for your response. We apologize that you had noise issues while staying with us. We are happy that you enjoyed our beds. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. It’s walking distance to the main gate and the staff are wonderful. You can’t check in until 3 but they’ll let you pre-check in so you can park your car in the morning and go enjoy the park. The price is great for the area and all rooms are suite style rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoy our property and continue to stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We like staying at this hotel.  No real complaints.  Parking is tight but works out well.  Very close to the park and perfect walking distance.  The complimentary breakfast is good.  Only issue we had was that the shower drain was slow to drain.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Across the street from Disney main gate
Summary: We've stayed here several times.  We keep coming back because the hotel is right across the street from Disneyland so walking back to the hotel with little people asleep in the stroller makes life easier.  Also if we want to head out in the middle of the day for a nap then it feels close enough to make it worth while.  The breakfast is okay, nothing special to write home about but it works.  The rooms are clean.  We'll stay here next time we go.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our convenient location on your Disneyland trip. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Amazing! Very close to the park
Summary: Super close to the park! Fairly affordable and very smooth check in/check out process. Plus the continental breakfast was a plus! Saves us a bunch of money! Also the staff was super super friendly! 10/10 would stay here again and refer this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful response. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and our friendly staff. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: This is our second stay at this hotel. We checked in on 4/30 and checked out on 5/4. The walking distance can’t be beat and is one of the biggest reasons why we continue to return to this hotel. The room is clean, everything is in good condition and staff is friendly. My only con is the  Continental breakfast. I wish they would turn it into a hot breakfast. We always end up not using it and getting breakfast inside the park or downtown Disney. If improved the breakfast this place would be magical and definitely worthy of 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear Hannah, thank you for your response. Thank you for continuing to stay with us, we are happy to hear you enjoy our rooms, location, and staff. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: We were a family of 8 and stayed in a suite. Fantastic space for everyone and so close to the parks it was easy to run back and forth. The kids loved the pool and it was open till 11 which was helpful as we liked to stay late at the parks and soak ourselves in the hot tub when we returned. Breakfast was good, it was nice, basic and since we had a mini fridge we also bought yogurt and additional fruit and jams to round it out.  Staff were helpful and kind. The wifi was non existent though. I think that is fairly typical of the hotels around Disneyland but it was a bit of an issue for us as we like to use Facebook to contact and arrange meetings with friends and family. I was unable to reach my nephew to arrange a time to meet while we were in California so I was a bit
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen, thank you for your response. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our hotel and had a pleasant Disneyland trip. We are sorry about the issues you experienced with the WiFi. We will share your feedback with our maintenance staff. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The location is so amazing!! The staff were friendly and the room had a good amount of space. The continental breakfast wasn't the best but everything else made it worth it. The convenience fo having the scooter delivered to the hotel was amazing and they let you charge them downstairs to make it easier. I appreciated the parking there and having access to my car at any time. Great location!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff and the service you received while staying with us.We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice location but there were issues...
Summary: This hotel is clean, well-kept, and reasonably priced for being right across the street from Disney's main entrance. These were the reasons we chose this hotel and IF we ever stay again, that will be why.  Parking was a huge issue here. Self-parking is limited so expect to valet park. We did know this in advance. The problem is that there isn't any space to temp park while you check in and unload. There is room for exactly two cars. Thankfully, we were one of those two. But more people kept trying to pull in and there was a line of cars backed into the street. I would hate to have been sitting indefinitely on Harbor waiting to pull in. And it took quite a while to check in. Then, we had to pile all of our stuff on the curb and hand carry everything up to our room on the fourth
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate your comments and would like to apologize that your stay was not up to standards. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with parking during check-in time and will share you comments with our valet team. In regards to your bill, please contact us directly and we can help you sort out your bill and ensure that you were not overcharged. It is possible that you were charged the parking fee, which could have happened in error.

Summary: My 8th class had an excellent time in Disneyland.  The location of this hotel makes it ideal for a quick walk to the park.  Rooms are clean, and service is great!!  Thank You, Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites!
Manager Response: Dear Mary, thank you for your response. It was a pleasure having you, we are glad you and your class enjoyed our hotel and had a wonderful stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Thank you for a great stay!! I highly recommend this hotel. It's right across from the street from the parks. Clean, friendly staff and big rooms.  The parking is a little confusing but the valet guys were nice & quick with getting us our cars. I will be back soon, thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy, thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear you had a pleasant stay with us and enjoyed our friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We stayed 4 nights in a parlor suite.  The room was on the 5th floor near the very end. The walk to Disneyland was quick and actually shorter than some of the on property hotels. The breakfast was better than I expected. Fresh fruit (apples, bananas, oranges), hard boiled eggs, muffins/danish, bread/bagels, hot coffee & decaf, apple juice, orange juice, hot water, dry cereal, and milk.  It was nice to grab an egg and a bagel on the way to Disneyland.   The room was spacious and had plenty of space for 3 adults and a teen. My 17 year old daughter slept on the sofa bed and said it was comfy. The extra blankets are “scratchy”, so I was glad we packed some from home in our extra suitcase. Plenty of towels and soap from housekeeping. They were happy to get us extras when we asked.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your response. We are happy to hear that you did enjoy our hotel and amenities. We hope to see you and your family again in the future.

Summary: The desert inn is our favorite hotel while visiting Disneyland.  Although not a Disney resort hotel it is the closest hotel to the main gate!!  Great for going back to hotel to rest, eat or take a swim in the indoor pool.  They have a yummy continental breakfast which we always stop in before going to the park.  I recommend the desert inn to all my friends.  See you soon!!
Manager Response: Dear Rose, thank you for your amazing review! We greatly appreciate your recommendation and are happy to hear you had an excellent vacation. We look forward to seeing you when you return.

Summary: We’ve stayed here numerous times over the years and it just doesn’t seem to change.  Great service and friendly staff.   The downfall is that the rooms are well overdue for a makeover.   The beds suck. The floors creek.  The walls are paper thin.  On the positive note: great location and great employees.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for your valuable comments. We appreciate you for continuing to stay with us over the years. We are sorry to hear the room quality was not up to your standards and we will pass along your comments. We are happy to hear to you enjoyed our friendly staff and will pass along your comments to them. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Location couldn't be more perfect! Breakfast was great, pool was great and 3-5 minute walk to the park. Not the fanciest or most updated decoration, but you don't go to Disney for the hotel anyways. Was everything we needed and more. :)
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, thank you for your great review. We are delighted to hear that our hotel offered everything you needed and that you were able to enjoy our breakfast and pool. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We had a quick overnight stay.  The location was perfect.  All we had to do was cross the street and we were at Disney.  We had a parlor suite, which was very roomy. There were two rooms with a total of 4 beds.  Each room had their own sink. The hotel was clean, but beds were very hard and we could everything that was going on around us. I don't think the people were overly loud, just thin walls. The continental breakfast was fine.  Everyone had something to eat that got us through the morning until our first churro. Due to the proximity to the park, we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we greatly appreciate your comments. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our clean rooms and close location to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: I liked the hotel was so close to disneyland. We really enjoyed watching the fireworks from the roof. The staff was friendly and made it easy to check into our room. We got down there early before check-in time and they let us keep our car there so we can enjoy Disneyland and tell her it was time to check in. The pool area could use a little updating but my son did not seem to mind. He enjoyed swimming there.
Manager Response: Dear Tami, thank you for your response. We are glad you enjoyed our rooftop deck to view the nightly fireworks and that you had a pleasant stay with us. We will share your positive comments with our staff. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is a perfect hotel for a trip to Disneyland or just any trip really. It’s rigth across from Disneyland and you won’t habe to drive anywhere. A lot of great food places to eat at in the area. Overall, it was a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for your excellent review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel for your trip and had a great experience staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We usually stay here anytime we go to Disneyland. It's in a perfect location and most times a great value. This last trip was good with the exception of waking up one morning to a 2 inch Beatle/roach crawling on me. I am hoping it came in from outside while they were cleaning the room, nonetheless waking up to a huge bug crawling on my neck was not pleasant. Other than that, the water pressure in the shower and the sink were non existent and never was addressed by the staff even after telling them 2 separate occasions.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff, we apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. We value your feedback and will discuss it with our staff. We are sorry that the water pressure issue was never addressed. We are glad you enjoyed our location and hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: I love staying at this hotel when we travel to Disneyland. The location and price can’t be beat!! The staff is friendly and try to accomadate you as much as possible. Parking is a little tricky but they attempt to be helpful with finding a spot or quickly retrieving your vehicle from valet.
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our staff and valets were able to accommodate you. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Clean, quiet and very easy access to Disneyland.  It's right across the street   We had no problems.  The breakfast has lots of fruit, danish, sorted breads and eggs, which is enough for us.  Right down the street was a store where we could by discount tickets for Disneyland.  And around the corner was a little drug store whee we were able to buy bottled water, toothbrushes (which we forgot to bring) and just about anything you might have forgotten.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are happy to hear you had an excellent stay with us and enjoyed our location. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is amazing!  It is so reasonably priced for being an easy walk to Disneyland.  Our family suite slept 7 people easily.  The suite isn't huge but for the price it can't be beat.  Very clean and updated.  We will use them again as they are a great bargain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful response! We are happy to hear you and your family had an excellent stay at our hotel and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The best part about the hotel is that it is right across the street from the park! The price is ok if you are able to use one of the reviews.   Try not to stay in a room near an ice machine or elevator (or both, like we did). You can hear everything outside!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We are glad you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Nice, clean, friendly, helpful staff, location unbeatable. We would definitely stay here again. Beds were comfortable and inviting. Directly across from Disneyland. There are so many places to eat, just steps away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I would recommend the inn to anyone looking to visit the Disney park experience. courtyard rooms are highly recommended for couples without children, a bit more private. The Chinese food delivery you recommended was 1 hr 45 min and they didn't honor your Desert Inn discount. The morning snack you offered is poorly laid out and offered hard boiled egg or an orange (might have run out of other items.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and are happy to hear you had a positive experience and enjoyed our hotel. We apologize for the issues with our breakfast but we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is a really great place to stay and it's so close to Disneyland.  so it really works out.  I would stay here again and again and again.  If I forget something i can just run back to the hotel.  Need a nap for the little ones? back to the hotel.  Its not a hassle.
