Manager Response: Dear Dreniaks  Thank you for sharing your positive experience here on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.   Looking forward to having you stay with us here at Anaheim Desert Inn!

Summary: The location is great!  The room was clean and the breakfast was so so.  Plan on eating breakfast out later after the sweets and hard boiled eggs.  We have stayed here before and it about the same.  Would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear WWall5  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review here on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and made the most of our convenient location.   Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Love how close it is to Disneyland and budget friendly restaurants and watching the fireworks from the rooftop was wonderful. Staff very helpful and accommodating.  5 adults in our party and keys were given to everyone for ease of coming and going. Can't wait to get back!!!
Manager Response: Dear TristaKathleen  Thank you for your kind words here on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed the view from our rooftop viewing deck for the fireworks. It is quite a view. I will pass along your compliments to my front desk staff.   Come back soon !

Summary: Location, location, location, and man do they know it! Our first visit was pretty good, all things considered, but this last visit was poor. Upon arrival I was told of the "resort fee" which was absent last time. I knew about the parking fee, but after paying nearly 1000 bucks for our accommodations, we were told to pony up about a 100 bucks more at check in, and that was a great first impression. The new gal up front was allergic to friendliness. So ok... O for 2. Then our room was clean, yayyy. Well, then the tub was completely stopped and wouldn't work, so we called that one in, but they said they really couldn't move us. So they finally got the problem fixed around 10pm, which was pretty crappy, and the manager said he would contact us in the morning to discuss. That never
Manager Response: Dear Erica,  Thank you for completing a TripAdvisor review. All of us here at the Anaheim Desert Inn strive to ensure our guests are completely satisfied with their stay, it is clear however that we missed the mark during your stay. I completely understand your frustration with your whole stay in general and would like to discuss the situation with you. I can be reached at teo@anaheimdesertinn.com, please send me your contact information with the best time to reach you.  Your comments and feedback are truly appreciated. This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.  Thank You,   Management Team

Summary: Right across the road from the Disneyland main entrance, you can't go wrong with the LOCATION of this premise.  We had an Executive Room, which had two queen size beds and a full size sofabed. Amenities included a refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker, hairdryer, iron and ironing board.  Our room (as did my sister in laws room) had a musty/old smokey smell, but this could be attributed to the fact the room was fairly dated. However, given the fact we were only in the room to sleep and bathe, we were able to overlook this.  All in all, the room was very comfortable and clean.  Breakfast was included in our stay and although basic, it was enough to sustain us for a morning in the park.  The facility has an indoor pool and whilst we didn't make use of this, we noted other families
Manager Response: Dear MandiMangle  We appreciate you bringing these problems to our attention, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests. This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.  We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you during your next visit to the area. Please contact me personally to arrange your accommodations, I can be reached at teo@anaheimdesertinn.com

Summary: Huge positive is the location! Less than 5 mins walk to Disney and near a few places to eat. The rooms are clean, tired but comfortable - I agree the showers are warm at best. The indoor pool is nice, kids loved it. The included breakfast is adequate to get you out to Disney. The wifi was down for 3 out of our 6 nights, which when coming from overseas is very inconvenient.i called up a couple of times about it, no apology just that it was not t of their control. On check out I mentioned it again and again no apology or explanation. The parking / driveway staff are the friendliest of the hotel - always saying hello or helping with questions.  If you are not going to be in the room much this place is excellent value and you can't go past it.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca C,  Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete this TripAdvisor review. Guest reviews have become such an important part on making bookings for future stays wherever you decide to go. We truly appreciate your positive feedback you leave for our staff and our future guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn about our shortcomings from our guests. This information that you have provided helps us to address our problem areas and improve our service we are providing.   Once again, Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: At the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is very comfortable, clean, very Accommodating to their guest where they are close to restaurants and most important of all they are just across the street to the entrance into  Disneyland Resort Property and it makes it very nice and very convenient for everyone who stays there.  I have stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites at least 8 + times when my family and I go to Disneyland Resort.  Thanks for the Awesome Service!
Manager Response: Dear pmtenoso,   I would like to say we at Desert Inn & Suites appreciate your kind words from your review here on TripAdvisor. We love that you have chosen us ever since your first stay for your Disneyland home for every trip.    We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: The lodging had all of the amenities needed and was clean.  Staff were friendly and helpful, the pool was  a plus.  Right across the street from Disneyland, unbelievably convenient!  Truly a great price for this area and it was a well-kept hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete this TripAdvisor review. Guest reviews have become such an important part on making bookings for future stays wherever you decide to go nowadays. We appreciate your positive feedback you leave for our staff and our future guests.  I am glad you enjoyed (and took advantage of our amenities like the valet service.) More importantly, we can only improve when we learn about our shortcomings from our guests. This information that you have provided helps us to address our problem areas and improve our service we are providing.   I am glad you have enjoyed your Disney vacation with us. We look forward having you stay with us!

Summary: You really can't get much closer to Disneyland than this.  I think I literally walked by maybe one hotel that was a tiny bit closer?  And we're talking 50 feet closer, if even that.  It was so wonderful, after walking so much in the parks, to exit Disneyland property and immediately see your hotel sign right across the street.  It was very clean, beds were reasonably comfortable (brought my own pillow, so can't speak to that).  We stayed in a Parlor Suite, and though we didn't need the pull out bed, it was nice to have the extra space.  But having that divider wall and the shutters on the windows made for a comfortably dark room the one morning we slept in.  Plus the little ventilation fan going into the bonus room made a lovely, constant white noise.  Having a fridge and
Manager Response: Dear Julie P,  First I would like to thank you for taking the time on leaving a review here on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed our spacious room and valet service. Our hotel is located in a perfect spot so our guests do not have to travel far to and from the park.   Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: HORRIBEL STAFF COMMUNICATION!!!! It's a good thing the location is close to Disneyland!!!
Summary: HORRIBEL STAFF COMMUNICATION!!!!  It's a good thing the location is close to Disneyland!!!  My family and I have stayed here for the last few trips to Disneyland. Short walking distance to the park. Close to 24 hour food establishments, IHop and Denny's. There is an amazing pizza shop to the north, Pizza Press (highly recommend).  The rooms a basic quality rooms. Like I said it's a good thing the location is close to Disneyland.  My biggest struggle was dealing with staff after checking out of the room. Unfortunately I left behind my Halloween costume, and I emphasize the I left the costume behind. It was my mistake. Without any doubt in my mind I left the costume in the top drawer of room 312, a suite (they claim anyway). I immediately called once my family and I had returned
Manager Response: Hi Tyler S,  Thank you for staying with us recently. It is unfortunate that your costume was not found in the room that you stayed in, however I can assure you that anything that is left behind in our rooms is turned in to lost and found. I apologize for this huge inconvenience, please let me know if I can be of any further assistance to you and your family.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites

Summary Heading: Good Basic Hotel to Stay Right Across the Street From Disneyland
Summary: Very close and convenient as its right across the street from Disneyland Resort Main Entrance.  The shower could have been hotter.  The breakfast was ok.  More than anything it is very convenient! And the staff friendly and very helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time and leaving us a review on TripAdvisor. I will report the positive feedback to our staff, as they work very hard to make sure our guests feel right at home.  The information helps us to address the problems head on.   Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert INN & Suites and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Over the years, we have stayed at several hotels along Harbor blvd. and this hotel ranks in the top three. The room we had was a two queen bed room that was on the ground floor (as requested) towards the rear of the hotel. Room was very nice and clean with all the normal amenities i.e. iron/board, mini fridge, hair dryer, and microwave. The a/c unit works well, but a little noisy. The only cons I have is that there was no hot water at the bathroom sink, but the shower/tub was fine ? can't figure that one out, but only cold water was available in the sink. The beds are lean more to the firmer type mattress where I prefer a more softer mattress, but not a big issue. Staff was friendly and efficient during check-in & check-out. Parking is limited, but valet parking is available
Manager Response: Dear ArizonaBob1,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Customer reviews have become a crucial part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. We are delighted to hear that we were able to meet your request and that you were overall satisfied with your stay. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary Heading: Very Comfortable and Good Location to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms have been updated since we last stayed there 4 years ago and is very comfortable.  Love that it's across the street from Disneyland and California Adventures so we could go back to the room to rest for a bit before heading back for more fun.  A lot of my friends and relatives stay there and enjoy the stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sandi Y,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out this review for TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your time and feedback.  We are happy to see that you came back to stay with us and hope you stay with us again in the near future!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: Once again stayed at The Desert Inn & Suites and had a good room at a great price and the shortest walk to Disney you can imagine. Neighbors could have been a little more considerate of others ( loud talking in the hallway, kids running up and down the stairs). Let's be real, even kids get to vacation too. We will be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Duane H,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  We are glad that you find our hotel so accommodating to your needs and criteria. I understand your frustration with the noise from the kids and people coming back from Disneyland.  Sometimes it is hard for them to contain their excitement. If ever it becomes an issue call down to the lobby and we will do out best to take care of the situation. We are delighted that you will be returning to stay with us!     Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.

Summary: Initially we were a little disappointed that it was a motel and not a hotel. The nightstands and dresser's were worn and nicked but it was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful, the guys parking the cars were great. However, The best part was the location. We'd grab the continental breakfast at 7 and walked over to the front gates and it only took about 5 minutes. We'd come back about 1 for swimming and soaking tired feet in the hot tub. Beacause it was so close it's was easy and quick todo and we were back in the parks by 3 or 4. We didn't spend a ton of time in our room but it was nice to have the microwave and fridge for our snacks. The price was a little high for the quality but the location is what they are charging for.
Manager Response: Dear Mom4boys2016,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  The reviews customers contribute have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. We are delighted our location was right for your family and that our staff met your needs and were friendly.  More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: We stayed here last week in room 528.  Our room had 2 queen beds plus a sofa bed in a separate little room (which also had its own TV).  The room was clean and quiet.  The bed was hard, but the pillows were nice and not too thick.  We could see parts of DCA out one window, and the Matterhorn out the other window.  We saw the fireworks from our room, which was great.  It's located across the street from the park entrance, right near "the crosswalk".  Can't get much closer unless you stay on property.  Plus, I love a hotel that is a mere 3 minute walk to Tony Roma's.  I only have a few minor complaints.  The parking situation is bad, as are most of the motels along the strip.  We arrived late and had to unload our car & then bring it over to be valet parked.  The 5th floor doesn't
Manager Response: Dear Traci A,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Customer reviews have become such an vital part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests.  We understand your frustration with the parking and we have valet 24/7 to make that burden less for our guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: Great location, friendly staff!   Beds a little firm for me but otherwise we loved it!  Breakfast helped us get a good start in the morning!  Denny's right next door very convenient.  Would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear PatriciabY620ZF,  Let us start by thanking you for taking the time to complete this TripAdvisor review.  We appreciate your feedback and your time.  Our staff work their very best to keep you smiling from the moment you enter to the moment you leave.  We want you to feel at home at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and hope you visit us again really soon!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: As always we stayed here for our yearly Disney trip.  The staff is always friendly and the rooms clean.  I've always enjoyed the convenience and location of this hotel. It's located right across from the park and have family sized rooms that work great for our family of 6.  I had had a small issue a few years back with the smells from the sinks and they have even fixed that.  They get a 10 our of 10 from us!
Manager Response: Dear Krissy H,  Thank you for your time and for completing this TripAdvisor review.  We are glad that you choose us every year for your yearly Disneyland trips.  We do our best effort to take guest comments and issues very seriously and work on them as quickly and efficiently as possible. Thank you for your continual visits and we cannot wait to see you next year!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area!

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable opposite Disneyland entrance.
Summary: This is the perfect location for a Disneyland motel, right opposite the entrance. It is close enough to come back to for a rest during the day if needed. I would say it's probably closer than some of the Disney hotels and certainly at a much better price.  There's is a viewing deck to see the fireworks if you are not in the park.  The indoor pool and spa were ok and laundry conveniently in the next room.  Parking was $9 a day (plus tax) but of course you don't need your car for Disneyland!  We also went to Knotts Berry farm and the Outlets at Orange which were close by.  We tried to book about 6 months ahead on Booking.com but it was already booked out, so went directly to the motel website and they had rooms free so it pays to book ahead as this place is popular.
Manager Response: Dear Durneyfam,  Thank you for taking the time to publish your review on TripAdvisor.  We here at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites appreciate your feedback and so do our future guests.  The firework viewing deck and our location are just a few reasons why our guests love staying with us and we are glad you took advantage of these amenities.  We look forward to your future stays with us!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: I stayed here on a Thursday night and really wanted to like it  because it's only a five minute walk to the Disneyland and California Adventure entrance.  The room was very clean, and my bed was comfortable.    Unfortunately, noise from the street, people talking as they walked  by the room, and light coming into the room through the shutters and gap around the room's door prevented me from sleeping well.  Even with the air conditioning turned on, I couldn't believe how much I could hear people's voices and traffic noise from inside my room.   The tub and bathroom sink had very low water pressure, so I'm glad I didn't need to wash my hair.   Breakfast was mediocre and not very healthy: white bread, white bagels, danish,  black tea, red apples, cut oranges, milk (mystery milk: it
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review. All of us at the Anaheim Desert Inn take your comments very seriously and are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations. I understand your frustration with noise levels at the property, however it is hard sometimes to keep our guests' excitement after they have spent a whole day of fun at the Disneyland Parks. We ask that you contact our office immediately when noise levels get out of hand so that on property staff can resolve as soon as possible. Our maintenance staff was able to look into the water pressure issue and found pressure to be normal throughout the hotel. Our Free Continental Breakfast is great to get the day started and your comments have been shared with our management staff for a possible revision. Our coin operated lockers are great if you want to spend the day at the park either before your room is ready or after you check out, these lockers are airport sized and come in handy when you have quite a bit of luggage and don't want to carry it with you while trying to have fun. We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you during your next visit to the area  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: The location is really good, just across the street from Disneyland.  It is about 5 minutes between the hotel and the security booths.  Check-in was smooth.  Only negative was that we were on the ground floor and it was very noisy! It seemed literally every other guest had to walk past our room on the way to and from Disney! Also there were trolleys (possibly house keeping carts?) rolling by from 6am.  I would stay again, as it's so convenient for Disneyland, but I would request a higher floor next time.
Manager Response: Dear Erin,  Thank you for taking the time to complete the TripAdvisor review. Customer reviews are an important part of creating an opportunity to address our problem areas and improve on the services we provide. Next time you book call directly and we can make some notations for your requests.  Thank you for the positive feedback you have provided us and our future guests. We can only aim to improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites each time you return to the area!

Summary: This hotel is directly across from the Disneyland entrance. My husband loves to walk back mid afternoon and have a nap. They had a crib set up and ready for my grand daughter, without me having to ask.The staff are helpful and friendly. The prices are great.
Manager Response: Dear 1lanif,  We are extremely delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our staff are trained to offer quality customer service and try our best to accommodate the needs of our guests.  We are glad everything was set up for you and that your husband didn't have to go far to take his naps!    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for you stay and future stays!

Summary: Great location, right across the street from the Disneyland entrance. The rooms were nice and the prices were reasonable. The only complaint I have was with our check-in. The guy was very rude and didn't want to try to work with us to resolve a problem. He basically told us to figure it out or go somewhere else. The rest of the staff were very polite and the valet staff was amazing.
Manager Response: Hello alexandriahull3,  Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. Guest reviews are such an important part of travelers' research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback. I completely understand your frustration when you find an employee that does not want to help and I would like to apologize about that incident.  I have shared your concerns with my staff and they have been reminded on the importance of customer service and the impact it can have on a guests' stay. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to change your impression of our hotel in the near future, thank you and we'll see you soon.  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Hotel is great for families, prices seem reasonable & rooms are clean.  The best thing I like about this place is the easy walking distance to Disneyland.  I hate waiting for all the shuttle buses & you can leave the park & head back to the hotel for a short rest no problem.  There is an indoor pool so weather is not a factor.  Have stayed here multiple times over the years, never had a problem. Donna K
Manager Response: Dear Donna,  We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit here at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. We are glad you have found a vacation home for your Disney trips over the years.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!  Management Team

Summary: Can't beat the location, reasonable price for what you get. t's old but the rooms have been refurbished.  The valet staff were outstanding,  very efficient and friendly.  The front desk staff aren't overly friendly but efficient enough overall.  We asked for a late checkout and they didn't charge which was nice.
Manager Response: Hi Jan201502,  We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your feedback with the TripAdvisor community. We are glad to hear that your stay was great and that our checkout extension was of help to you and your family. Thank you also for sharing your front desk staff concern, we will make sure they understand the importance of awesome customer service, specialy at the Disneyland Resort.  We sure hope that you'll stay with us in the near future.  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Great location! Right across the street from the entrance. Comfortable beds, nice staff so so continental breakfast, decent rates.would stay there again. Perfect for families. Even has valet service. Denny's next door, IHOP 2 doors down, Tony Roma's walking distance as well as other restaurants
Manager Response: Dear B3aguiar,  We want to thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for your time.  Our goal at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites is to have our guests leave pleased with their stay.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to have you here in the near future!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: I would like to start out on a positive note seeing that we have stayed at this location three times and the first two times were without any problems. The rooms are quite large, clean, and offer a fridge and microwave. The furniture is old and outdated but all we needed was a clean room to relax in at the end of the day. Plus, they are located right at the cross walk to Disneyland.  The staff is mediocre, I say this because they are not unfriendly but they are not really happy to be there either. You can tell they are just there to collect a paycheck and that was fine for me because we never needed anything extra while we were there.  As I said we have stayed here three times and were scheduled to stay again in February for my daughter's birthday trip but had to cancel due to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you staying with us over the years and for taking the time to share your feedback. All of us at the Anaheim Desert Inn take your room and staff comments very seriously and are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations. I’m sorry to hear that you cancelled your future reservations with us. Your claim was sent to and handled by our insurance broker for investigation. I apologize again for the inconvenience and hopefully you could give us another chance to restore your faith in Anaheim Desert Inn.  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Third stay, will be back June of 2017 again
Summary: Easy to get to the parks and back, located within walking distance of anything we needed, great viewing area on the roof, Good continental breakfast in the morning and relaxing pool experience in afternoon.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is wonderful to see you enjoyed your getaway Disney trip. We appreciate your compliments of our property and its location.  We hope to see you soon. The pool will be waiting for you!  Management Team

Summary Heading: Good stay and location - directly across the road to Disneyland entrance.
Summary: We always choose this hotel for its close proximity to Disneyland and complimentary continental breakfast. Hotel is nothing flash but reasonable value, quite, clean and the staff are always helpful. Breakfast selection is very repetitive and the breakfast area can get very busy. All considered, would not choose any where else to stay.
Manager Response: Dear B. G,  We want to thank you for taking time to complete the survey through TripAdvisor. We do our best to achieve quality customer service and products. The fact that you were happy with our staff and the cleanliness of our hotel pleases us immensely. Your comments help us work on our troubled areas and to let our staff know they are meeting our expectations of customer service. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and future stays with us!  Thank you!

Summary: Great location across from Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast could be better. Water pressure in room was horrible. If I stayed again I would not stay in the handicapped room.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey through TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate the feedback and so does our staff.  We are delighted that you were pleased with our customer service and how helpful our staff was during your stay.  Your comments will help us to work on problem areas so that we can provide quality products as well as customer service.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and we hope you do return to stay with us in the future!

Summary: This hotel has a great location and a pretty solid selection of room size.  The price for the rooms was something I did not have a problem with at all.  The rooms are a little dated but this was truly a trip where we used the room for sleep and really not much more.  Great place to lay your head down after a long day after the parks.  Short walk, still had plenty of energy to go out and eat.  Free breakfast is always a bonus, I eat a high protein diet so plenty of hard boiled eggs for the taking.  Kids enjoyed the selection of cereals and standard oj and apple juice selection.  I just recently joined DVC so the likelihood of returning is slim but I would definitely recommend to friends and family.  Downfall is the pool but it's enough to cool down.
Manager Response: Dear Jon S,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review. Customer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests. This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide. Thank you for referring your family and friends to us and we will take care of them as we did with you!   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.

Summary: This is so much better and easier than parking and taking a shuttle.  Our room was clean, quiet, and a three minute walk to the entrance of both parks.  We didn't interact much with the lobby but our rooms were always clean and pretty comfy.  We requested a lower level room so we were on the ground floor which was really dark, but it didn't matter since our days were spent in the park. I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Cqualls8,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Customer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests.  We strive to provide clean rooms and quality customer service and we are pleased you enjoyed the cleanliness of your room.     Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and for your future stays!

Summary: I would say this is a great location but other than that nothing special. When I stayed here there was an issue with the WIFI and I called to front desk multiple times asked up front and was told it was my phone and it wasn't. They clearly state that is one of the "amenities" but for that weekend it was not and they offered no discount or real apology for the inconvenience. I'm sure that it will be fixed just kinda put a bad taste in my mouth.
Manager Response: Hello thatchman86,  We want to thank you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.   Thank you choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area and we hope to have you stay with us soon.  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney parks
Summary: Can't beat the location. You can get from your room to the park in five minutes. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Breakfast is adequate, including cereal, pastries, hard boiled eggs, fruit, milk, and juice. Pool is OK, hot tub is not that hot.
Manager Response: Dear Dallas,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us here on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed the location and the cleanliness of our rooms. Our staff takes pride in making sure our guests have a clean room and making them feel right at home.  Looking forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Overall experience was great.  Comfortable beds, pillows could be better, large rooms and house keeping do a great job everyday.  (only small complaint with rooms is that all doors could use a good clean).   Check in experience - we booked an extra night as our flight arrived very early morning from Australia, that way we could check straight in and get a few hours sleep.  However on arrival we were told check in was 3pm, I explained I had booked extra night and they said that was fine except check in was still 3pm each day.  Cutting a long story short, eventually one person finally came out and said it was fine to check in.   Room - no hot water, so we all had quick cold showers and went to bed for a few hours.  Got up check water around pm and still no hot water so let
Manager Response: Dear Onlinename,  All of us at the Anaheim Desert Inn take your comments very seriously and are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations. We understand your disappointment with the check in process and room location and we are glad that our staff was able to take care of the issue during your stay.  We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you during your next visit to the area.  Please contact me personally to arrange your accommodations, I can be reached at teo@anaheimdesertinn.com.  Thank you, Desert Inn Management

Summary: Great value older style hotel, fantastic location to Disneyland main gates and many dining options.  Rooms were basic, but clean and spacious. Free wi-fi was included, and worked well. Beds were OK - a little hard for my liking, but acceptable. Wish shutters would have blocked out more light at night time, but it really wasn't a problem. Rooftop available for viewing fireworks -was great social time to meet other guests.  A little noisy - lots of excited kids passing by at early hours of the morning, but this actually added to the vibe.  Free breakfast was basic (tea/coffee, cereal, toast, oranges, bagels, pastries and boiled eggs) - but did the job.  Pool area was indoors - a welcome relief from the heat!  All in all, a great stay. Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: Dear Bellaandme,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Reviews from our customers play an intricate role in addressing our problem areas and help us to improve on the products and services we provide.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your overall experience and stay.  We appreciate your recommendations and hope to see you in the near future!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if going to Disney.
Summary: Great place for Disney.  Right across the street from Disney with clean and spacious rooms.  Great price and great place for big families.  Also great view of the fireworks from the rooftop and pretty good breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Angi B,  We want to thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for your time.  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience and all our hotel had to offer!  Guests love our location and firework viewing deck and we are glad you did as well.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and future stays!

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a Disneyland trip
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights with simple priorities: be as close to Disneyland as possible, have a comfortable room and not pay too much. If you are looking for a hotel that corresponds to these criteria, Desert Inn is the perfect one: it is literally just across the street from Disneyland, the rooms are spacious and clean and have everything you need (fridge, safe, TV...), and it is cheap. Would stay there again if we ever go back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Kariesona,  I appreciate you taking the time and leaving a review here on TripAdvisor. I am glad you have found our property matching your expectations and meeting your trip agenda. Our staff works very hard to make our guests feel at home.  We hope to see you here again at Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Very close to the entrance of Disneyland
Summary: The room we had was large with an added room for children to sleep in a separate room.  The best part was the distance to the entrance to Disneyland.  There was an extra charge for parking.  The cold continental breakfast was average.  We would stay again because of the location.  We were able to see the Magic Kingdom fireworks from our room.
Manager Response: Dear Judilw,  We want to begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Customer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. We are pleased that you liked the size of the room and the distance from the entrance of Disneyland.  More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary Heading: Great value and close to Disneyland
Summary: The C1 suite was just right for 3 adults and 2 kids. Spacious rooms. Very friendly staff. The only complaint is that there is a box type self under the bathroom sink that is very dusty, probably wouldn't have noticed it but my 2 year old grandson crawled on top of it. Would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Kimbaker3,  Thank you for taking the time to complete this review on TripAdvisor.  We are thrilled that you had a great experience with us!  Our rooms are very spacious and offer room enough for big families as well as just a couple going on vacation.  We are delighted that you will stay with us in the future!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: Room was clean and big enough. Breakfast is the same everyday =( But if you want be in Disneyland in three minutes I recommend you this hotel. You can enjoy the pool after your day in Disneyland. Many options to dinner around.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your stay with us. I am glad our property and location made it easy for you and your family on your Disney trip. The pool is a great way to end a long day at Disneyland.  Hope to have you here with us again!

Summary: Walking across the street to Disneyland could not have been easier.  We didn't worry about parking at the resort.  The parking attendants at the hotel were top notch.  The family suite was just what we needed and a very reasonable price.  Nothing fancy.  We enjoyed the pool and the roof top firework viewing area.  Love a continental breakfast.  Everything was JUST RIGHT for our family.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie S,  First I would like to thank you for taking the time and leaving us a review here on TripAdvisor. It is great to hear how the little things are what makes a great impression. From our staff, to the breakfast, if any of those things had been quite off or not up to the standards of our guests, it can definitely leave a bad start on your Disney Trip.  We hope to see you and your family soon! Thank you,  Desert Inn management

Summary: Always our first choice when visiting Disneyland.  The rooms are always clean and we have plenty of space.  Having the refrigerator and microwave always comes in handy.  The employees are always friendly and helpful.  The motel is close to anything you might need, a variety of restaurants and all that Disneyland has to offer.   The indoor pool and spa is a plus, (I like the spa a little hotter but it is enjoyable).
Manager Response: Dear HappyDills,  First, I would like to thank you for taking the time and leaving a review. We are glad you have decided to stay here every time for your Disneyland trips. Our front desk staff works hard on making our guests feel welcomed and at home. Hope to see you here in the near future!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: The c2 suite is PERFECT if you're traveling with kids! You walk into your living room with a sofa, coffee table, dresser, and TV. There's a door off to the left of the living room that leads into the "parents room". It has two queen beds, table with 2 chairs, dresser, tv, large armoire, counter and sink outside of the bathroom, Full bathroom, A refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. To get to the other bedroom, you walk back into the living room, and there will be another door attached toward the back of the living room. This will be the "kids bedroom". It has two queen beds, A dresser, tv, sink/counter outside of the bathroom, A full bathroom, and coffee maker. Both bedrooms have AC.  I found the beds to be just fine to crash and after a long day of walking.  Everything was
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time out to complete this TripAdvisor review.  Yes, the C2 Suite is perfect for families as well as our other suites we have to offer.  We are in a great location, walking distance from Disneyland's main entrance, plus not to far from the Southern California beaches and other amusement parks.  We are pleased to have you back in January and for your future stays with us!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary Heading: Hard to argue with the value
Summary: Pros: Great price, huge rooms, unbeatable location, great service, clean, nice mattresses, okay pool and hot tub. I absolutely would stay here again, and recommend it to anyone, for all of these reasons. It's hard to imagine a better way to visit Disneyland for a family.  Cons: Sadly with the great value there are caveats. First of all, the wifi is more or less nonexistent. Yes, there is a wifi service you can connect to, but the speed is so laughably slow that it may as well not even exist. We're not talking "too slow to stream video," I have come to accept that as normal for most budget hotels. No, we're talking "too slow to load basic web pages without any media in them." Literally unusable.  Second, the breakfast is very mediocre. We ate it every morning, and it did fill us
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This is a very well maintained hotel
Summary: We do a lot of travel so we notice little things like clogged shower heads, old and dirty fixtures, or stale towels.  This hotel had everything, including an in-room safe and great wifi connectivity, and all in working order.  Also efficiently run.
Manager Response: Dear Moki95,  We are pleased to hear about your positive experience staying with us here at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. Sometimes the little things not working do make a big difference, which is why our staff works very hard to make sure all of our guests enjoy their stay. We look forward to welcoming you here with us for a future stay.  Thank you for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel was low priced, with a clean room, pool and guest laundry. Breakfast was adequate, and included in the price, as was wifi. The hotel is right across the road from Disneyland entrance, and next to Denny's where you get 10% off by showing your room key. This was certainly excellent value for money, and I have no complaints.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your stay here on TripAdvisor.  All of our staff work hard to make sure our guests enjoy their stay starting at check in all the way through check out. We make sure the cleanliness of the rooms will always match or exceed the expectations of a guest. I'm glad you enjoyed the amenities we offer here at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. We hope to see you soon!  Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you here for your future Disneyland Getaway!

Summary: The check inn was fast, the staff was nice and friendly.  Great location in front of the maingate of Dineyland and next to a Dennys restaurant.  The rooms were clean with everithing we needed, the beds were comfortable and the wifi was free.  The kids loved the indoor pool. The continental breakfast was fine.
Manager Response: Dear Anaverjan7,  Thank you for completing the survey here on TripAdvisor, we do appreciate your time.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our staff does our best to get guests checked in and taken care of promptly.  Thank you for your comments and we hope you join us again really soon.  Thank you very much for choosing Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: This is the perfect location for visiting Disneyland or anywhere in the local area.  Rooms are clean, staff is friendly, breakfast is so-so but fresh. Daily parking is included so if you don't have a car, they will remove the fee for you.  You won't be disappointed and you'll be happy you are right across the street from the main entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Kessdarln,  First, we want to start by thanking you for your time and also for completing this TripAdvisor survey.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoy staying here when you visit our area.  Cleanliness of rooms and a friendly staff are important to us so we are glad you liked the services that we provided you.  Thank you very much for your positive feedback and your continual stays at our hotel.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and we hope you stay with us again really soon!

Summary: We have stayed here several times with our children when visiting the US from Australia.  We have always found the staff very pleasant and helpful, the room rates are great and rooms are always clean, spacious and very comfortable.  Location is perfect for Disney, places to eat, tour pickups & for getting around Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Megan R,  We appreciate you taking time out of your day to write us a review. I'm glad you have found a great place to stay traveling from Australia to your Vacation home here at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. We appreciate your feedback and positive responses to our location.  We hope to see you for your next vacation stay!

Summary: Really really happy - literally just across from main gates of Disneyland.  Super friendly and accomodating staff nice quiet clean rooms and simple but very adequate buffet breakfast - would stay here again tomorrow (we're from Australia and stayed 7 days - parlour suite room)
Manager Response: Dear Stewandvadar,  First, let us start by thanking you for taking the time out to fill out this survey for TripAdvisor.  We want to thank you for your comments and feedback.  Our staff strive to treat each customer with excellence and with care.  We want you to feel at home here at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites.  We hope you return to our hotel the next time you visit the states!  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: My mother and I took a quick trip down this weekend to Disneyland. As always the hotel was very accommodating and clean. We arrived very early (9:30am) for check in and they allowed us to pre-register so that we could head to the parks. Valet was very helpful in letting us grab stuff out of the car when we returned. Room was clean and comfy. Love staying here and will continue to do so in future visits.
Manager Response: Dear Mariankirkpatrick,  We are pleased you and your Mom enjoyed your visit with us and that you continue to stay at our hotel.  We here at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites try our best to accommodate our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey for TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your feedback and your positive comments.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return!

Summary Heading: Basic accomodations,Excellent service, Super excellent location!
Summary: Basic well-worn rooms, superb service and ABSOLUTELY perfect location right across from Disneyland's main gate! The continental breakfast is very basic, but can hit the spot before hitting the parks. The staff is friendly and accommodating. So, while it is not the fanciest or most modern place it is clean and met the needs of our group of 5 with 2 queen beds and a pullout couch
Manager Response: Dear Cpaddon,  Thank you for completing this review for TripAdvisor.  We are please that you were satisfied with your stay overall.  We value our customer reviews and the feedback you provide helps our future guests.  Your positive comments are truly appreciated and we will use these comments to improve on the product we provide.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: We checked in and the desk girl must have been new.  She didn't know how to answer our questions.  No problem, another man came to help.  We were told they did not provide bag storage other than a locker for $1.50 in a very smelly room.  But I saw them retrieving other guests bags from the back by the front desk.  So which is it?  We checked in at 1 pm and they would not give us our room.  I understand that during the busy season but this wasn't.  I could tell by the new employee's reaction that there were rooms and she had to look to the helper for the proper response.  We wanted to change clothes and head to the park.  They said change in the bathroom.  It was so nasty that it was scary.  Then on to the locker area to store bags...smelled like urine.  Actually gagged.  I'm not
Manager Response: Dear Bethinwashington,  We want to thank you for completing your TripAdvisor review.  All of us at the Anaheim Desert Inn strive to ensure our guests are completely satisfied with their stay, it is clear however that we missed the mark during your visit.  We completely understand your frustration with the check in process.  We do accept luggage in the back larger than a carry-on size, other than that, our lockers have to be used.  We would personally like to discuss the situation with you and can be reached at teo@anaheimdesertinn.com.  Please send your contact information with the best time to reach you so I can give you a call.  Your comments and feedback are truly appreciated.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and services we provide.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Good hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We enjoy staying at Anaheim Desert Inn because of it's room configurations, close proximity to the parks, and free breakfasts.  We have 2 small kids so we typically stay in a parlor suite or the C2 family suite, depending on how many other family members join us.  The kids are able to sleep in the front section of the hotel room in their own space so they are not bothered by us moving around the room after they've fallen asleep.  The 2 areas they could improve on is:  Internet - while it's free, the connection is really bad and not consistent Hot water - the past few times we've stayed there, it takes FOREVER for hot water to come out of the faucet  Otherwise, we find a ton of value in this hotel located directly across the street from Disneyland & California Adventure.
Manager Response: Dear Erin,  Thank you for taking the time to complete the TripAdvisor review.  Customer reviews are such an integral part of creating an opportunity to address our problem areas and improve on the services we provide.  Thank you for the positive feedback you have provided us and our future guests.  We can only aim to improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites each time you return to the area!

Summary: Value is great and the location is awesome, just a few steps from the main cross walk into the entrance of both parks!  We stayed in the suite with 2 queens beds and a sofa bed which is perfect for my family of 6.  My kids are a wide range of ages from baby to preteen and we had plenty of space for everyone.  I thought the mattresses were a little hard, my only complaint. The room was clean with a fridge and microwave.  The continental breakfast was simple with fruit, hard boiled eggs, bagels/toast, pastries, and cereal. Also If you don't want to eat in the park, Denny's is right next door.  There is a daily parking fee, but all cars were valeted so I was happy to not have to maneuver my van in the little spaces. Kids enjoyed the indoor pool and I was also glad that there was
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to complete this review for TripAdvisor. We are delighted to know that you and your children enjoyed your experience here at our hotel.  We strive to provide quality service and products to our guests.  Cleanliness is key to pleasing our guests and we are glad you were happy with the cleanliness of your room.  The information we obtain from you helps us to work on our products and services we supply.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and for planning to stay with us in the future!

Summary: Super close to the park entrance, of course- location can't be beat! We stayed in one of the suites that has 2 queens in one room and a sofa bed in an additional room, all shared a bathroom. Each room had a tv and there was a shared mini-fridge (which was quite roomy- not one of the super tiny ones.)  The extra room was great for dividing your living area for quiet, privacy, or just to have some space. The room with the sofa bed is in the front by the door to the walkway, but there wasn't much noise up on the 4th floor. There is no air conditioner in the front room (though there is a little fan in the wall that pulls some air from the main room in) so it can get a little warm in there if you have the door between the rooms closed.  The queen mattresses were pretty comfy (I have
Manager Response: Dear Bombzarkee,  First of all, we thank you for taking the time to post this review on TripAdvisor.  Reviews from our customers are important to other travelers and we appreciate the positive criticism you have imparted to us. We are glad you enjoyed the fireworks from our rooftop deck and our wifi services.  The information you have provided us with will help us to achieve quality customer service and products.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites!

Summary: You can't beat the location of this hotel. The rooms are SPOTLESS, odorless, and cleaned thoroughly every day. The hotel staff is friendly, and very quick. Our A/C unit stopped cooling as well one morning, and they had a maintenance man there within minutes and he replaced the whole unit. The price can't be beat for a clean close hotel to the parks! LOVE this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Smnsunshine,  We are delighted that you found our accommodations enjoyable.  We try our best to handle situations such as those as quickly and accurately as possible as we did with you.  Cleanliness of our rooms is important to our hotel and to our guests.  Thank you very much for taking the time out of your day for this TripAdvisor survey.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary: Great hotel because of the people working there.....everyone we encountered at this hotel was kind and extremely courteous. It is an older property that has been well cared for. We didn't have a single complaint!
Manager Response: Dear Cathie S,  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for the time taken to complete it.  We are happy that you loved staying with us and that our staff made you feel welcome.  We like our guests to feel at home here at our hotel and are glad you found everything to your liking.   Thank you for staying with us at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and for all your future stays!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Location - Great Staff and Clean Rooms
Summary: This was our 3rd time staying at Desert Inn and we will be back - they are right across the street from Disneyland, rates are fantastic especially if you book early and the staff has always been professional.  Our room has always been clean and well maintained during our stay.  They have an indoor pool which would be nice on the cooler nights.  My only complaint is the breakfast - it is a very bare bones continental breakfast that is the same exact stuff every day.  We tend to purchase other items we can store in the fridge or use in the microwave in the room which has always worked out fine.
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  Let me begin with thanking you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor Review. Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler's research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing hotel guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests. This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.  -Management

Summary Heading: Great Hotel across the street from Disneyland
Summary: I spent many hours researching hotels around Disneyland. I ended up picking the Anaheim Desert Inn mostly because it is directly across the street from the entrances to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. It has free parking which is hard to find in the area, it is clean, has comfortable beds, good working air conditioner and seems to be newly redecorated. There is also an indoor pool and hot tub and you can watch the fireworks from the hotel's rooftop. It is a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel but I did not book through Disney as the cost was much lower booking from the hotels website directly. It is not a five star hotel but it suited our needs just fine.   My only complaint was the continental breakfast. I shouldn't complain because it was free but it is kind of
Manager Response: Dear Danburyct7,  We want to thank you for your time in completing the TripAdvisor review.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our hotel accommodating to your needs.  We do charge for parking, however it is included in the total we give you or the total when you book online, as to not confuse our guests.  The indoor heated swimming pool and firework viewing deck are great amenities that our guests love so we are glad you enjoyed them.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: Excellent hotel, walking distance to Disneyland. Friendly staff, awesome continental breakfast. 24 hour valet parking. Clean rooms. Even though all guests stay there because we all go to Disneyland its a very quiet location
Manager Response: Dear Naimduran,  Let us begin by thanking you for completing this review on TripAdvisor.  We are thrilled that you found your stay at our hotel "excellent!"  Our 24 hour valet service and friendly staff work hard to keep our guests happy and they met the mark with you!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and for all your future stays!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Across the Street from Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is very clean and is right across the street from Disneyland, so you can just walk over instead of waiting for shuttles.  They also provide luggage lockers to hold onto your luggage if you check out then decide to go to Disneyland before your flight leaves.
Manager Response: Dear Feedthesnake,  Let us begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a TripAdvisor review.  Guest reviews have become such an important part of traveler's research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. More importantly, we like to provide our guests with quality customer service and accommodations.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you can stay with us again soon!  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites.

Summary Heading: Great room for our big family!
Summary: We had a C2 parlour suite that really suited our family of 7 well.  Lots of room for the wheelchair as well. Good breakfast everyday.  Not fancy but enough. So convenient to just walk across the street after a full day at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi Lydia C,  We appreciate your kind words towards the Desert Inn. We are glad to hear that our hotel suited your needs and that our location was convenient for your daily trips to Disneyland and California Adventure. We hope to see you soon again!  Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Well Run Economy Motel! Location Can't Be Beat!
Summary: Having stayed at several of the motels along Harbor Blvd. we decided to give the Anaheim Desert Inn a whirl. We chose the property for the extremely close proximity to the main entrance to Disneyland. This feature did not disappoint! It is about a 5 minute walk and you are right where you want to be.... Disneyland! We shared a C-2 Family Parlor Suite with my sister-in-law and her family of 4. The rooms were quite spacious and offered more than enough space for 4 adults and 4 children. While the parlor rooms was on the small side, it did provide a nice refuge for the adults while the little ones napped. The rooms was very tidy and didn't have a musty smell that I've come to expect at many of motels in the area. The furniture is showing signs of wear however, the room was very
Manager Response: Dear Sarahlynae,  First and foremost let us thank you for your time in completing the TripAdvisor review.  Guest reviews contribute to an important part of traveler's research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing for our future guests.  More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on the product and service we provide our guests.  Thank you for your choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites as your new go-to property!

Summary: This hotel is located directly across the street from Disneyland making it very convenient for walking back and forth.  The hotel is clean and very quiet!  And the price is good due to its location.  The free breakfast (which is included in the hotel price) is sufficient and the breakfast room is a nice place to eat before heading out for the day.  Our room had a microwave and mini fridge in it which is always appreciated!
Manager Response: Dear Mom2gjc,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay here at Desert Inn & Suites. It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay, free continental breakfast, and the fridge and microwave already placed in the rooms. We are happy to hear our location was very convenient for your trips back and forth from the Disney Parks and the Hotel. Our team is looking forward to having you back with us.  Thank you,   Desert Inn Management.

Summary Heading: Can't Beat the Location and the Rate
Summary: This is a fairly basic hotel -- not a lot of frills, but a nice, clean, solid choice for accommodations. Several types of rooms to accommodate any family size. We only had two issues during our stay.  We had a broken door to the connecting room. The knob worked, the wood on the door was a bit broken -- but our son and family were in the next room and one of the connecting doors and knobs worked fine, so no problem for us. The other issue was a non-working door lock to enter our room. That was taken care of quickly by staff. We didn't encounter many staff members, but those we did seemed friendly. Breakfast is really basic -- but nothing to complain about. And the short walk to the Disneyland Parks is terrific -- especially at the end of a long day! The parking is somewhat
Manager Response: Dear slctravelagent,  Let me begin by thanking you for taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review.  Consumer reviews have become such an important part of traveler’s research and we truly appreciate the positive feedback you are providing future hotel guests. More importantly, we can only improve when we learn of our shortcomings from our guests.  This information helps us to address our problem areas and improve on our product and the service we provide.  Thank you choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites each time you return to the area.  Teo

Summary: We were very impressed with The Desert Inn and Suites. It was just across the street from Disneyland. The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. We had plenty of room for the five of us. I was impressed with the staff around the property who were constantly cleaning and fixing up. I even saw someone mopping the parking lot. Our continental breakfast was simple, but filling with a good variety.  The front desk as very quick and congenial to bring us another blanket and more shampoo when we requested.
Manager Response: Dear Shw840,  Thank you for taking the time out to complete the review on TripAdvisor.  We are happy you found our hotel and staff so accommodating to your wants and needs.  Our staff works hard to please our guests and we are glad they pleased you.    Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites for your stay and for your stays in the future!

Summary: I've stayed here twice, and both times I was impressed. Rooms are clean, staff is helpful, and prices can't be beat.   If you book fairly early, you can get some amazing rates that beat the other hotels in the same vicinity on Harbor by a long shot.  This hotel is right across the street from the crosswalk that leads into Disneyland, so the walk is short and easy. Free breakfast is also nice, since that's one less meal you have to pay for in the park. It consists of eggs, pastries, toast, bagels, cereal, etc. Lots of options for either sitting and eating, or just grabbing and eating while walking in.   Rooms are clean and spacious. Air conditioning works well, and rooms come with microwave and fridge.   Would recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The best thing about the Anaheim Desert inn is its proximity to Disneyland. It's right across the street to the entrance - a 5 minute walk, which is huge after a long day. The front desk staff was very kind and allowed us an early check in. Valet service was helpful in getting our bags to our room and we had easy access to our car when needed. The room was spacious and the beds & pillows more comfortable than we would have imagined. The complimentary breakfast was decent, though nothing special. The shower pressure wasn't great but it's definitely a hotel I'd stay at again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel - excellent location to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms were spacious and clean.  A refrigerator and microwave were in the room.  The hotel is conveniently located directly across the street from the Disneyland walk-in entrance!  There are many restaurants next door and on the same block.  The complimentary continental breakfast was ok.  A few items to choose from.  We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.  The only poor review I would give is the friendliness of the staff.  They never smiled and weren't very friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient location to Disneyland  and California Adventure Entrances!
Summary: We have stayed at the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites many times.  It is located directly across the street from the pathway to the Disney Parks entrances and just beyond that is Downtown Disney.  The property itself is dated but we have always found it clean and the staff pleasant and very helpful.  The breakfast is minimal but it has definitely improved over the years.  There are several eateries located very close by including IHOP, Denny's, Mimi's Cafe, McDonalds, and our favorite treat spot, Cold Stone Creamery, which is right next door.  During our most recent stay, we experienced a 40 minute power outage that left the entire block and much of Disneyland in the dark.  The staff quickly passed out glow sticks to guests and laid them in strategic places including stairwells.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disneyland definitely within walking distance.  Nice rooms and clean. Friendly staff! Parking was crowded but allowed was allowed to keep car there a few hours after check out. Pool was clean but cool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family had a great stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn. You can't beat the location and our room was clean. My only suggestion would be to maybe add yogurt to the breakfast options.
