(It was my first race at Disney, so I wasn't sure.)   This hotel does not serve breakfast early on race days. I had called ahead and prepared, they were kind
Manager Response: Hello rheashelden,  Thank you for your review, we are delighted to know that your stay was great and we hope to see you soon or when you come back for the Disney Marathon next year.    Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Great stay and across from Disneyland.
Summary: We had a two room 1.5 bathroom suite. The beds were really comfy and although we were close to the street we did not have lots of extra street noise. Continental breakfast was basic, but filling if we didn't want to pay for breakfast elsewhere. Rooftop deck was nice to sit and relax at night. The hands down best feature was being right across the street for the Disneyland. Didn't even need our car for four days.
Manager Response: Hello Ktae2640,  Thank you for taking your time to write an excellent review about your stay. It was a pleasure to be of service and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed our comfy beds. Thank you for your patronage and we hope to see you soon.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Excellent location, everything else what you expect for the money. Good value
Summary: Location is Great! Cannot really beat it if you want to avoid getting buses to and from the Disney Land Park. An easy walk, across the road and up to the main gates. There are other hotels in the same strip, that may be just as good, or better, but for the money and for the location, this one was OK. Directly oppositve the Disney Gates. Close to restaurants. The service was acceptable, but not great. The rooms were average, kind of what you would expect, but if you're going to Disney all day, you don't spend long in them. The breaksfast was average, but again, for the money what you may expect. Not much seating area and very very very basic. We would definitely stay in this immediate area again, with a few properties either side, as the location is so good, but we are neutral
Manager Response: Hello candkMelbourne,  We appreciate you taking the time to complete a survey regarding your recent stay with us. On behalf of our entire staff here at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites we would like to thank you for giving us an opportunity in accommodating you and we hope to see you in the near future.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: We go to Disneyland almost every year. We have never stayed here. We decided to pick this place because of being so close to the entrance of Disneyland. The crosswalk is right there a few steps down from the hotel. We had flown in and arrived at the hotel about 1:30. We were informed our room was not ready but to come back at 2:30. We had just been through a 6.o earthquake in Napa and were very tired. We dealt with Peter at the front desk and he was very polite and helpful. He told us there were lockers where we could store our luggage. We did and then went down to Tony Roma's for a cocktail. We came back at 2:30 and our room was ready as promised. Our room was a beautiful parlour suite. It was sparkling clean and it looked like it had been recently remodeled. The air
Manager Response: Hello Cindy M,  Thank you for your review and for giving us high marks in sleep quality, value and service. We are ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and exceeded your expectations! Nothing is more important to us than our relationship with our guests. Again, we thank you for your review and we cannot wait for your next stay!  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: More than just a great location
Summary: The staff and surroundings are terrific, a great bargain for the cost. This was our second stay in two years, and we have no complaints. My daughter left her purse in the room after we checked out, and they mailed it to us right away.  Noise was not a problem for us, although the breakfast is a little skimpy. We bought victuals from the 7/11 down the street, and kept them in the room's refrigerator.  We'll be staying at this hotel again next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Kris D,  Thank you for taking your time to write a comment about your stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. It is a pleasure to know that we did a good job on making your stay a memorable one. Our Team Members would like to thank you for your patronage and hopes to see you in the near future.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: Booking the Desert Inn we got exactly what we expected and were very pleased with the result, the room was very clean, and it would be tough to beat the location (especially walking back to the hotel after a long day at the parks); It was comparable price-wise to other hotels in the area we've stayed at in the past, which was tough to come by given this was a holiday/marathon weekend! We did not take in any of the amenities (pool, breakfast, etc) but the staff/valet was very polite and helpful. Only complaint if we had any was the NOISE first thing in the morning, you can hear EVERYTHING going on outside your door (kids, families, housekeeping carts, etc)
Manager Response: Hello Matt G,  We do appreciate your feedback, and are delighted to know that your stay was great. We hope to be of service again in the near future. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Paper thin walls, NO early check in!!!
Summary: I've stayed here twice and both times had issues with loud neighbors above us. The ceiling must be paper thin because when other guest allow their children to run around at 1am it sounds like a herd of elephants running across the ceiling. I phoned the front desk twice to complain about the noise and I got "the guest says they are sleeping"!!!  When your exhausted from being at the park all day you want piece and quiet and a good night sleep. Well I did not get that here. As far as their rooms. The standard room is ok, pretty standard in size. Very clean, bedding clean never any issues there. The 2 room suite was spacious, great for a large family or two families traveling together. It's basically two rooms connected with a door.   Unless I can stay on the top floor I won't be
Manager Response: Hello FF_Wifey314,  Thank you for writing a review regarding your recent experience at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. At Desert Inn & Suites, guest satisfaction is our top priority and it is experiences like this that helps us improve our overall service quality. Again, I want to thank you for staying at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and we apologize for the inconvenience you and your family encountered.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: Great location for Disneyland they were remodeling the sun deck so we didn't get to see that but the stay there was fine even the contractors that we're working on the building were nice and friendly I talked to them while riding up the elevator when they were carrying parts upstairs the continental breakfast was as good as most continental breakfasts get so all in all it was a good vacation
Manager Response: Hello Keith L,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review about your stay at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. It is a pleasure to know that we did a good job in making your stay a memorable one. The Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites would like to thank you for your patronage and hopes to see you in the near future.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Very close to Disneyland, nice sized rooms
Summary: Our stay was nice! The room was large and had a nice sitting area that was detached from the room. I really enjoyed that they leave LOTS of extra towels and pillows in your room already so that you don't have to ask for them in the middle of the night. The only thing I disliked was that the air conditioning was loud (but effective). Unfortunately they are under a bit of construction and their disney fireworks viewing deck was closed. Kind of a bummer. All in all I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a nice place to stay within walking distance of the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Hello KateToLA,  On behalf of our entire staff, we would like to apologize for the concerns you had at our hotel. We appreciate the feedback, this will help us provide a better experience for our future guests. Should you decide to stay with us again, we would take that opportunity to be of better service to you and your family.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: I love this hotel. We always stay here. Great price. Perfect location. Friendly and helpful staff. Convenient lockers. Indoor pool. It is the perfect place to stay if you're going to Disneyland. They have a gift shop and free continental breakfast, whib I love, especially because they let you take your food up to your room. Great selection of breakfast items.
Manager Response: Hello Monica D,  We are happy to hear that you love our hotel and always stay with us. Nothing is more important to us than our relationship with our guests. Thank you for your review and we cannot wait for your next stay.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights and everything was great! It obviously isn't a luxury hotel but it is very clean and I felt very comfortable staying there. I love the large rooms and of course the location. It is literally across the street from the parks. Never tried the breakfast so can't review that. My only complaint is that the beds are very firm and my rate was $10 higher a night than what I locked in online but I would happily stay again.
Manager Response: Hello sweetstuff3519,  Thank you so much for your kind words. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable large cleaned room. We work hard to provide a home away from home to all of our guests. We hope to see you when you come back to the Disneyland Resort.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: Great deal for the rate.  Staff was helpful on the phone and when we checked in. Conveniently across the street and right next door to Denny's for a quick bite.  Room was very clean and kept clean during our stay.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello chickenlrice,  Thank you for your review. I am happy to hear that the rooms were very clean and was kept cleaned during your stay. It was a pleasure to be of service and we look forward to future visits.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights and had a good stay. The room was large with a sitting room separate with its own TV, fridge and microwave.  The room was clean with plenty of towels. The staff there was friendly and efficient.  The breakfast was sufficient with toast, bagels, muffins, danishes and cereals. The disappointments were that the viewing roof deck was closed, the pool was closed the  first night, and the the games in the arcade mostly did not work.  We liked the view of California Adventure we had from the balcony and would consider staying here again on our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Hello hearic,  Thank you for writing a review regarding your recent experience at Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. At Desert Inn, guest satisfaction is our top priority and it's experiences like this that helps us improve our overall service quality. Again, I want to thank you for staying at the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites and we apologize for the inconvenience you encountered.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: When looking for a place to stay at Disney, we were a bit overwhelmed with all the choice and all the reviews!  We decided on the Desert Inn and were not disappointed, it is one of the closest hotels to Disney.  The staff were so helpful whenever we had questions and we even received an upgrade to our room!  The only thing that could have been a bit better was the breakfast, it was a bit basic and mostly the same things each day.  Apart from that, we would highly recommend a stay here.
Manager Response: Hello TracyDGill,  We are happy to hear that after searching for many hotels and going over reviews you chose our hotel. We thank you for your feedback, it was a pleasure to be of service and we look forward to future visits.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: Our family has stayed at this location many times over the years.  The only reason I did not rate as "Excellent" is because when I asked questioned, I received answers that were not complete.  I had to ask a different employee to obtain the detailed information requested.
Manager Response: Hello Heather S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We do listen to our guests and value their feedback. On behalf of our Team Members we would like to apologize for not giving you complete answers and we will work on customer service enhancements.   Kind regards!	  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Best 2 Bedroom Suite Choice For Disneyland Trip
Summary: There are lots of reasons that you might want a two bedroom suite. Maybe there is a serious snorer in your group. Maybe you want a "kids" room and a room for the grown ups. Maybe you just have got to have two bathrooms. Maybe grandparents traveling with their children and grandchildren want to retire earlier than the rest of the group.  In proximity to Disneyland, there are two choices for a two bedroom suite. Crazy expensive, and the Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites.  The rooms were clean, secure, and as quiet as you could hope for when there are children in almost every room. WiFi was free and fast enough. Free parking for one car per room.   The breakfast would be adequate to fuel up before heading to Disney, but we chose to bypass the pastries and hard boiled eggs in favor of

Summary: We usually stay at the Park Vue next door.  This time around we decided to stay here because of their viewing dec.  We usually stay at Disneyland until 8 pm.   So, we were so excited that we can see the fireworks from the hotel.     The day we checked in we found out that viewing dec was closed due to construction.      The furniture is pretty beat up.  The pool is small.  I did try to speak to a supervisor but his response was basically I don't know I just work here.   I was debating on checking out and just driving home since we are only an hour away.

Summary: We stayed in a C2 suite on the third floor. Our family consisted of four adults and three kids (7, 4, and 2). We really loved having the extra sitting room in front. When we first arrived, we were greeted in front by a parking attendant who showed us where to pull over and register. He also helped us park in the underground lot because we were afraid of the narrow spaces, but it turned out to be fine and he was really helpful and nice. At first, we had also thought the narrow parking area in front was it  and were relieved there were many more spaces underground. They loaned us a cart to transport our luggage upstairs. We noticed scratches on the walls and within ten minutes, our kids' feet were a dark black underneath. We bought flip flops from the store down the street to wear

Summary: The hotel is clean, the workers are really nice, beds were more firm than we are used to but nonetheless we got a good nights sleep! We will be staying here again in the future. It was very kid friendly which was a perk for traveling with 3 toddlers!
Manager Response: Hello JoanieRamsey,  Thank you for your great feedback, it was our pleasure to be of service and we look forward to your future visits.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: We have stayed with Desert Inn in the past and have enjoyed our stay.. You really can't beat the price/location. But this time we had to deal with the constant sound of construction right outside our door beginning as early as 7am!! Good morning :-( There was no warning upon reserving our room or upon check in. I hope for future Desert Inn patrons that this has passed because it really affected our stay this time.
Manager Response: Hello awilliams17410,  Thank you for your continuous business and taking the time to share your experience. The sheets wreaked of bleach and the mattress was very soggy. My back hurt for days. Breakfast was very limited. Parking was a nightmare. But you spend most the time in the parks so if they have a decent rate then book this hotel early, it often sells out.
Manager Response: Hello MrsDre,  We are extremely sorry and we would like to apologize for the unsatisfactory experience your encountered. Summary Heading: Adequate for a Disney family vacation

When we arrived, the front desk couldn't find the key to the scooter we rented for Gramma, so we headed to breakfast. When we came back, still no key. We had to call and ask Apple Scooter to bring an extra key. We came back late that afternoon for check in and were issued room keys. We went to the door and saw a Do Not Disturb sign on the door handle. We knocked. No answer. We used our key and probably frightened the current residents of the room. I had to go back down and was assigned a different room. Housekeeping was phenomenal. Plenty of towels and the room was always clean and ready to go by mid-afternoon. Since the breakfast was under construction,
Manager Response: Hello SandyWB,  We appreciate you taking the time to complete a survey regarding your recent stay with us. On behalf of our entire staff here at the Desert Inn & Suites we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced at our hotel.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Either Monday night or Tuesday morning two vans parked in the spots next to my car, and never moved. When we left Thursday morning (around 845), I noticed that the driver side mirror had been pushed shut, but did not think much of it. Due to a shadow on the front of my car, I did not see the damage to it until I stopped for gas. From the passenger side front bumper corner, along the front bumper, corner of the passenger

Summary: By far, best value. The crosswalk to disney is literally right next to the hotel. Yes, not the swankiest hotel but good for those quick disney trips where you need a place to stay thats walking distance to the park

Summary: Stayed here for 6 nights early August.Cant beat the location - opposite Disney and surrounded by eating places.Rooms were comfortable and clean.However breakfast area could be improved on as this was not big enough to cope with the amount of guests all taking breakfast at the same time.Coffee was probably the worst I've ever tasted but the pastries were nice!!The hotel comprises of exterior doors on all accommodations spread over over several floors all connected by soulless concrete staircases.Lobby and staff were pleasant.Stay was enjoyable and was good for the nightly rate but would probably try a different hotel if I ever returned.
Manager Response: Hello Claire251906,  Thank you for your feedback, it was our pleasure and I am happy to hear that the rooms were comfortable and clean and that our Team Members were pleasant. We look forward to future visits.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary: This was our second visit and we will be back. Clean and comfortable: Close enough to walk to Disney... less a 1/4 mile to the gate. Observation deck on roof gives you a birds eye view of both parks and surrounding areas to visit. Parking is included so no need to move your vehicle. just about everything is within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Steven S,  On behalf of our entire staff we would like to thank you for your great comments regarding your stay and we hope to see you again when you come back to Anaheim.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Opposite the gates of Disneyland, a great base to see California from
Summary: Perfect for any family wanting to spend time in Disneyland, directly opposite the gates.  See the fireworks I from the roof if you are too tired to venture back into the park. Use the Cleaver Brothers ticket booth that is tucked away on the road just to the left of the hotel to book tours to Hollywood, SeaWorld, Universal (citypass is the way to go, get them here, and then get a discount on transportation bookings with your receipt)  Soacious clean comfy basic rooms with microwave and fridge)  loads of restaurants nearby too.  Perfect!
Manager Response: Hello rachaelsmummy,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review on your most recent stay with us. We are delighted to know that your stay was great, and the room was clean and comfy. We hope to see you when you come again to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

Summary Heading: Best Harbor Blvd hotel for Disneyland visit
Summary: Large clean well appointed rooms.  Nice indoor pool.  Free continental breakfast plus Denny's and Ihop steps away.  Great staff.  Reasonable rates.  5 minute walk to theme park entrance.  Can't say enough accolades.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Hello Bob L,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the indoor pool and the complimentary continental breakfast.   On behalf of our entire staff we would like to thank you for your kind words and hope to see you again.   Thank you,  Carlos Padilla

The only thing lacking was creativity with the free continental breakfast, but when something is free, I guess you can't complain too much.
Manager Response: Hello Mrazin,  Thank you for taking the time in sharing your experience at our hotel. We are delighted to know that our Team Members were nice and pleasant and that you and your family enjoyed the swimming pool. We hope to see you in the near future.    Thank you, Carlos Padilla

This proved awkward for unloading the car. It was not clear exactly where our room was so we relied on following others to the lifts (sited halfway down the motel car park). The room was dated but clean. There was a free breakfast provided, which is always a bonus. But, when we went downstairs for it, we saw a rather sad room offering a small choice of baked goods. Manager Response: Hello The_Whybird,  Thank you for staying with us, we do appreciate your feedback and will look into these areas to try to better our quality and service. Let us know when you are ready to come back and thank you again for choosing us.  Carlos Padilla Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: We have been staying here for many years.  This trip was just an overnight to to catch an Angels- Boston baseball game.  But this my favorite budget friendly Disney stay location being directly across the street from the main entry.
Manager Response: Hello tallen25427,  Thank you for staying with us again, it was a pleasure to have you at the Desert Inn & Suites once again. Thank you for being a loyal customer and see you again soon.  Carlos Padilla Anaheim Desert Inn

I am a clean freak - and this place is kept up so well! The complementary breakfast is so well done. The proximity to restaurants - and of course, Disneyland is second to none. The parking is excellent. Because you are in the middle of everything - once you park, there is no need to drive anywhere. They have all the varieties of room sizes. You can watch the fireworks from the roof. The indoor pool and spa are well maintained. The hotel is always full of nice families. You will not regret making this your go-to Disney hotel!

Manager Response: Hello Sumerle D,  Thank you for staying with us  and I apologize if your stay was less than great. Summary: Stayed 3 nights during our family vacation to Disneyland, the location is perfect. Enjoyed the indoor pool, breakfast was basic but satisfying.  Observation. Level for fireworks was a perk. Overall a comfortable stay and right across the street from Disney!

We decided to leave the bags in our car.  We then pulled our car into the underground lot.  It was then about a 5 minute walk to the DL ticket booth.    Got back to the hotel around 10:30 that night, went to the front desk to get the keys to our Parlor A room.  Went to retrieve the bags from the car and found another car pulled up right behind me. We ran into a group in the park that happened to also be staying here and they said that this is their FIFTH trip and they won't stay anywhere else. I'm sold.

AC temp control was broken - it was either on or off, which meant waking up sweating or freezing every 2 hours.  Staff was civil, but not friendly or helpful - except the desk clerk who tried to steer me to a private no-license "cab" to the airport, and did not volunteer to call a licensed cab for me when I declined to participate in her kickback scheme. Also the shower drain in our room was clogged the entire time. I could have called but I

When the remodels were done it created inconveniences in King

We are committed in providing you with the best possible service and I'm glad that we fulfilled our goal. Once again, thank you for your kind review and we'll see you in the near future.  Carlos Padilla Operations Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: I would recommend this hotel. It is a nice place. They have friendly staff. The best was the great location! Right across from the Disney entrance. Breakfast needs to be better. Parking was limited but they do have valet. There was an indoor pool but we did not try it out. It looked nice.
Manager Response: Hello Pharmles,  We appreciate you choosing the Desert Inn & Suites while visiting the Disneyland Resort. We are thrilled that you marked us high on cleanliness and invite you to come back to us so that we can match the ratings all across the board. We thank you for recommending us and we'll see you soon.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Rates wee 50.00 less then most hotels, maid services was excellent, location was 3 doors away from main entrance! Continental breakfast, covered parking, parking fees were 5 dollars less a night then most who could ask for more!!!
Manager Response: Hello EFetzer,  Thank you for staying with us, I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you loved our prices. We hope to have you stay with us when you come back to the Disneyland Resort in the near future.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: We were WDW veterans looking for a convenient place to stay near DL, and this property was outstanding. Literally across the street from DL, the service and helpfulness of the staff was noteworthy. We can't imagine a better option in this price range. We will be back.
Manager Response: Hi TexasWildhorse,  Thank you for staying with us and for giving us your feedback. Disneyland is definitely at our doorstep and we do emphasize on providing excellent customer service and great quality overall. We hope that you found your home away from home at the Desert Inn and we'll see you in the near future.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Everything about this hotel was great !  Nice and big, clean rooms.  Right across the st. from Disneyland main gate !  Next door to Ihop, Dennys, Coldstone creamery, and much more.  Nice indoor swimming pool, and spa.  Breakfast consist of Fruits, Breads, and Pastries. The only problems at all, was the breakfast room was not big enough, All the tables were filled and we had to take our breakfast back to our room. .    But that was really not a problem at all.  Everything else at this Hotel was excellent !  We loved this Hotel !!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Jamie G,  Thank you for staying at the  Desert Inn and for giving us such great ratings. Our breakfast room is indeed small now and that is why we are working on expanding and adding sitting space to our breakfast area. Thank you again and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: This was our first time staying here, our experience was great. The hotel was very clean, it looks nice, price was reasonable and the hotel staff was awesome. The hotel offers free breakfast and valet parking.  This will be our hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Hi Alicia A,  Thank you for staying with us and for giving us a chance to be your home away from home. I am happy to hear that our location, price and service were up to your satisfaction. Let us know when you are ready to come back to the Disneyland Resort.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: across the street where dreams come true
Summary: It is conveniently located.  Except for three things this is a good hotel: 1) the parking is tooooo small and cars kept parking behind us, 2) the hot water in the shower ran out every morning and 3) the maids talk too much on that 3rd floor room.  I had to get my own towels all 4 days that we were there.  We didn't leave the room until 9 - 9:30 and still I could never find a maid working near by; but, I'd go get ice on the 3rd floor and sure enough there they were talking about personal stuff and when I asked for someone to assist me they looked at me like I was bothering them.  The parking attendants are super nice and always seem to be hustling I give them an A+.
Manager Response: Hello Celia3Naranjos.  Thank you for staying at the Desert Inn. On behalf of our entire staff, we apologize for the concerns you have about your experience at this hotel. We appreciate the feedback and will use it to fine tune our operations in the hope that upon your next visit, we can meet or exceed your expectations.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: A terrific location for visiting Disneyland. We were able to pop back throughout the day to change shoes, have a rest or grab a jacket.  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. Price was great considering the location.  However, on our first morning maintenance works were being carried out on the roof right above our room. They started around 8 am, and while we were heading to the park soon, the work caused light fittings to fall out of the ceiling and plaster to rain down on us. We rang the front desk to ask them to delay the work as we thought it was dangerous for us to be in the room, but they were still happening when we left. The work continued the next morning, but at a later time as we were about to check out.
Manager Response: Hello Angie709,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I apologize about the noise while we were renovating our rooftop. I understand that noise levels during renovation could be a bit loud but it is something that has to be done. Should you decide to stay with us again, we would take that opportunity to be of better service to you and your family and contribute to make your stay memorable.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Close to the park, but that's about it.
Summary: If you are looking for a place to stay that's close to the entrance of Disneyland, but not much more, this is it. Expect to pay extra for your parking and to have not too much in the way of customer service. The times we have stayed here, the pool has been extremely murky. The last time we stayed I wouldn't let the kids swim at all because it was so bad AND there was a diaper floating in the hot tub. The kids like to come back and swim at the end of the day, so this was extremely disappointing. The rooms you see on the website are not the standard rooms here. We will stay somewhere else the next time unless management or customer service change.
Manager Response: Hello 7Rutherfords,  Thank you for your valuable feedback. I would like to personally apologize about your stay, as you can see from previous guest comments, we do practice good customer service as well as good housekeeping. I would appreciate if you were to get in touch with me so that I can pinpoint where we went wrong and correct that issue.  Teo  Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: To be honest, I was a little hesitant when I booked this hotel.  Turns out, I couldn't have made a better choice.  Desert Inn & Suites was perfect for our party of 9!  The location is great (directly across the street from Disneyland's main gate -- and right next to Denny's, IHop and Cold Stone Creamery), the price is affordable, the rooms are clean, and the staff are friendly.  Breakfast is very basic (toast, muffins, cereal), but enough to get you started.  If you're looking for something more, Denny's and IHop are right next door.  We didn't park a car, but the parking did seem to be very crowded.  We would certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Rachael J,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to know that your stay was great and that our amenities were to your standards. Thank you again for your feedback and  hope to see you when you again come back to the Disneyland Resort.  Teo Huerta Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for the last 10 years when we go to Disneyland for our family vacations. It is very convenient, just right across the street from both theme parks and downtown Disney. It's not your five star hotel but its clean, friendly and quiet. Prices are very reasonable. The breakfast could be upgraded to a bit more to include hot breakfast like waffles, scrambled eggs, bacon, etc. At my current stay I was overcharged by the parking fee and resort fee. I booked my reservation in February and their rates went up in May. I called the office after my return home and they were willing to adjust my charges given the fact I had booked before their rates had gone up and failed to notice me upon my arrival. The parking is crowded, but they always take good car of
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is one of the bangs for your buck when visiting the Disneyland parks in Southern California.  This hotel offers 4 different types of suites (aside from their standard deluxe rooms): 1. Parlor Suite A: Simple two queen with separate living room with fold out couch (accommodates 6) 2. Executive Family Suite B: Four queen beds, Two pull out sofas and two full baths (accommodates 10) 3. Parlor Family Suite C1: Four queen beds, separate living room with fold out couch, **1-1/2 bathrooms (accommodates 8) 4. Parlor Family Suite C2: Four queen beds, separate living room with fold out couch, 2 full bathrooms.  We stayed there twice in the past 4 months.  The first time was with some friends so we stayed in a B suite since it has separate entrances.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: As always, a good basic hotel
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel over 4 times before. Always happy with it. It is basic. The rooms are kept clean and there is not a bunch of noise at night. The staff are always helpful. Yes, being across the street from Disneyland doesn't hurt it's appeal. The only issue we had this past trip was the previous person snuck their dog in and let it pee on the floors. It stunck. One phone call and we in a new room in 5 minutes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was fortunate enough to not only get a low rate but an upgrade. I didn't have to worry about the kids fighting over who would sleep on the couch because they all got there own beds. The breakfast was decent. The parking was crammed. Very good service. It was nice to be able to walk over to Disneyland. I will definitely go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Better than the rest! Don't waste your time elsewhere.
Summary: We have stayed at the Desert Inn & Suites many times before and have always been happy. However, during a visit last October we thought to try elsewhere and it was a complete disaster. Naturally upon on our return to Disneyland we chose to stay with the best. The location can't be beat, the rooms are clean (can't say the same for the other hotels) and the service is excellent (again, can't say the same for other establishments). Another big plus is that the walls aren't "paper thin" so that you're being disturbed by other guests. This hotel has solved that problem so that you can have a great nights rest for you're full day at Disneyland.   The only down side is their breakfast. They only offer pastries (mini muffins), toast and bland cereals. Many of the other establishments
Manager Response: none

Summary: I like staying at this hotel everytime we go to Disneyland because it's pretty much right across the street.  I love that they have an indoor pool and Jacuzzi for those days that may be chilly in the winter.  My stay is always good, and the people who work there are always extremely friendly.  They let me use their computer and printer to print out ticket vouchers for Universal Studios, and were helpful in helping print them out.  The only complaint would be that during the summer, you might get a room far away from the street, but nonetheless very quiet room.  I did not like that this room did not have soap dishes near the sink or a soap holder in the shower, but other than that, the room was great!  I have no real complaints.  The rooms are always clean and they are very
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were clean & the trip to and from Disneyland were super easy.  There was quite a bit of noise from rooms above and from the outer hallways, but that is to be expected.  We tried to take advantage of the breakfast once or twice, but it was pretty crowded in there.  Thank you for the free wifi though, loved that (and it was very reliable) and the fireworks from the roof were fantastic.  Overall, a very good experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in the parlor suite A. We are a family of 6 and we all slept comfortably.  The room appearance and cleanliness was great.  We all slept comfortably. No outside noise or disruptions.  occurred during our stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoyed visit at the anaheim desert inn and suites.  We were in room529 parlor a suite.  The room was perfect for 4 adults.  It was at the end, on the top floor. Very quiet.  Perfect!  We could see the fireworks from our room each night.  I think seeing fireworks from your room each nite and close proximity to disneyland easily makes up for the breakfast.  The breakfast they offered was not a breakfast.  The only thing that I could eat were the bagels.  I would rather see fireworks from my room. The room was clean, comfortable beds, and clean bathroom.  Look forward to going there again and will definitely request room529
Manager Response: Dear warmweatherperson,   I am happy to hear you and your family enjoyed viewing the Disneyland fireworks from our A Parlor Suite! Thank you for the feedback on our breakfast, it will help us make improvements to our breakfast.    We hope have you stay with us again in the near future.   Warm regards!

Summary: After reading mixed reviews we weren't sure what to expect. Overall I'd give an A+ rating. The location is so convenient for walking to Disneyland. Our rooms (2-room family suite) were clean, bright and spacious with all the amenities we wanted: refrigerator, microwave, free Wi-Fi. The continental breakfast was nothing fancy: toast/bagels, pastries, fresh fruit and such. Enough to start the day, and it's free. The staff was friendly. We would return again and/or recommend this hotel. It was a good value for the price paid.
Manager Response: Dear K S,   Thank you for giving the Desert Inn & Suites a full review of our location, room & suites, amenities, staff, and service, we truly appreciate it!   We hope to continue to have you as our guest when visiting the Disneyland Park.   Best regards!

Summary: All was good. Short walking distance from the parks.  Room was clean and big. The only down fall was our room was above the breakfast room so mornings were a little noisy, but overall great place. I will definitely stay again in the future.  Continental breakfast was decent.
Manager Response: Dear Denisem75,   Thank you for writing us a review of your recent stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites! Yes, our hotel is a short walk to the Disneyland Park entrance! Our rooms are big and spacious and we also have suites to accommodate up to 10 guest! We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future on your next Disney Family Vacation!  All the best!

Summary: We have stayed here many times over the years. They have different room types for different family sizes and the rates are very affordable. The continental breakfast is a definite plus. The front gates of the parks are less than a 10 minute walk away. The staff are very professional and helpful. We had to use the valet parking for the first time on this trip when the ground floor lot filled up while we were out in the car. It was very easy to do and the car was easily retrieved when we checked out.
Manager Response: Dear David S,   We truly value your patronage and we are happy to hear that you have been staying with us for the past couple of years, and that we have continued to meet your needs and expectations! We look forward to continuing to have you and your family stay with us when you visit Southern California!   Thank you for giving us  a full review of the Desert Inn & Suites!   Best regards!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a Disney trip
Summary: The front desk was awesome. Every time I called they answered all my questions and were very professional and courteous. The valet was amazing and quick. The suite was great for what little time we did spend in the room... And Disneyland/California Adventure parks are a five minute walk away. Right across the street!
Manager Response: Dear Lilhawaiinchild,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience of your stay at the Desert Inn & Suites with other guests. We are so glad you were impressed with our staff, and our location as we feel that is truly what makes our hotel stand out.   We do hope to see you again on your next Disney/California Adventure  family vacation, it  is  a wonderful place to visit all year long.  Once again thank you!

Summary: My family and I have made many trips to Disneyland over the years and have stayed at quite a few different hotels in the area. If you want to stay as close as possible to the park, have good service, clean rooms and the most affordable place as well, then I highly recommend Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites. They also have refrigerators and microwaves in the room, plus a free continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Steve A,   Thank you for staying at the Desert Inn & Suites and  for sharing your experience with others. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the our clean comfortable rooms,  service, and our amenities.   We hope to see you again soon on your  next Disneyland Family Vacation!  Best regards!

Summary Heading: Don't hesitate to stay here...great experience!
Summary: 5 minutes away from Disneyland entrance...what more needs to be said?  Actually, a few more words are needed.  The hotel is clean and comfortable.  It is not a luxury hotel, but when you are not in the room for most of the day, who really cares?  The linens were clean, the beds were comfortable, the air conditioner worked great, the refrigerator kept our food cold, the water was the perfect temperature, and the TV kept us entertained while nodding off for the night.  We stayed two separate times during our two week vacation, and both times were great and noise free!  The complimentary breakfast leaves a lot to be desired, but hey, it's free!  Thank goodness there is a Denny's and IHOP next door.  The elevators are a tad bit slow, but you can always take the stairs.  The laundry
Manager Response: Dear VanessaKneupper,   Thank you very much for your review! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed the clean and comfortable room, and our amenities. Our guest laundry room opens daily at 7:00 am and it is closed at 11:00 PM, but if any of our guest do leave their laundry behind after hours, our front desk staff is able to open the guest laundry room for our guest.  Once again thank you for the review, and we look forward to you having you and your family stay with us on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Warm regards!

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient location and better rate then hotels within same vicinity
Summary: We have stayed at many of the good neighbor hotels near Disneyland. We had not stayed at Desert Inn before.  They offered the best rate and didn't take advantage of their location being right across the street from Disney's main entrance like the hotels do that are right next door. We have always put value first and then location and we got both with Desert Inn. The room was clean and comfortable and the continental breakfast was sufficient and free to us.  I do wish they wouldn't charge their guest to park their vehicles - or at least offer a discount based on length of stay.  Only saw an indoor pool, prefer outdoor pool when its nice outside.  I would stay here again.  Front desk employees weren't rude but could have smiled a bit more when you come into the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Trixsy1965,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites! Yes, our mission statement here at the Desert Inn & Suites is to provide our guest with the utmost customer service, clean and comfortable rooms at a fair price! I am happy to hear from you that we were able to meet your expectations in regards to our Value and location!  We do hope to have you stay with us again in the near future!  Kindest Regards!

Summary Heading: Right across the street from Disneyland!
Summary: Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites is my go to hotel when traveling to Disneyland/Disney's California Adventure.  The hotel is located right across the street from the main entrance. This allows guests to travel back and forth between the parks and hotel for a quick nap or lunch. The hotel offers a complimentary breakfast of pastries, toast, cereal, coffee etc.  The rooms are spacious with a refrigerator, microwave ironing board and coffee maker.  You can even watch the fireworks from most rooms or the rooftop viewing area!  The hotel has never disappointed my family and I am looking forward to our next stay!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca C,  First and foremost thank you for making the  Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites as your  "Go to Hotel" on your Disneyland/Disney's California Adventure family vacation. Secondly thank you for giving us a full review on our location, guest room's, and services! I am very happy to learn that you and your family have enjoyed staying with us! Furthermore, yes the Anaheim Desert Inn & Suites location is awesome, since it does allow you to travel back and forth between the hotel and park to take a power nap!   Once again thank you, and we look forward to having you stay again with us in the near future on you next Disneyland/Disney's California Adventure family vacation!  Warm regards!

Summary: Unless you experience it first hand, you will not appreciate this amazing family friendly hotel. I checked in late only to be rewarded with an upgraded room. This room was more than enough for me and my family. Great location to Disneyland and right next to D3nnis and IHOP. Room is clean and noise free. The staff were professional and very helpful. I will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Sulayman B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at  the Desert Inn & Suites! Your words are too kind!  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed staying in one of our suites. Our hotel is known for its spacious family suites that can accommodate up to 10 guest.   Thank you for your patronage!  Kindest regards!

Summary: We stayed six nights at the Desert Inn. Five min. walk to Disneyland...love the location.  Rooms were clean and comfortable not a five start place to stay but did the trick for our family.  The room was actually larger than some other rooms we  have had in the area which was nice.  There is a sink and large counter outside of the bathroom and a sink and small counter in the bathroom which helped when getting us all ready to go in the morning.  Pool area is inside, on the smaller side, we did not use it.  Breakfast room is crowded, offered basic cereal, milk, muffins and coffee and juice but we grabbed a cup of coffee and a muffin and were on our way.  I wish the rooms had a better coffee pot, they only have the kind that you have to use the little yucky coffee packets....Laundry
Manager Response: Dear Tinkerbell3233,   I would like to thank you for taking your time and writing us a review. We're glad we were able to provide you the service you needed to make your stay with us comfortable. We are in the process of  remodeling and expanding our breakfast room to eliminate the overcrowding in the breakfast room. We hope to see you again on your next trip Disneyland. .   Cheers!

Summary Heading: Best location for Disneyland  and it is clean!
Summary: Great location... Literally at the crosswalk to the entrance of Disneyland. Room was very clean and was well kept. Breakfast was basic, but hit the spot before heading to the park. Only downfall was being above the pool, which is open to 11 PM, making it noisy. Definitely ask for a room away from the pool.  Other than that our stay was great!
Manager Response: Dear Neil N,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites!  We are happy to know we were able to meet your needs and expectations. We pride ourselves for providing our guest with the utmost customer service and a clean room at an affordable price.   We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the near future.   Best regards!!!

Summary Heading: Can't Get Much Closer to Disneyland!
Summary: Just like the title says, you can't get any closer to Disneyland!  The rooms were very clean and comfortable.  We were on the bottom floor toward the back so it was a bit noisy, but nothing horrible.  The grounds in the back part of the hotel are very beautiful.  The breakfast was very sparse but enough to get us going for the day.  My main concern is you are charged for everything, I really, really, really, hate resort fees!  Plus there is a parking fee and of course all of the wonderful California fees and taxes.  When you see the price online you think it is a great deal and then when you add in all the fees and taxes it is quite a bit higher.  The parking can be a nightmare.  Once you park, don't plan on leaving again or you run the risk of not getting another spot,
Manager Response: Dear SunDancer1,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites! Unfortunately, yes the taxes and fees are quite a bit high for the Disneyland Anaheim, Area, we wish they wouldn't be so high for our guest. Parking can be a bit of challenge but we do offer our guest valet parking in order to eliminate the issue of finding parking. Our parking attendants are more than happy to assist our guest with parking!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us as it helps us improve in our overall service to our guest.  Kind regards!

Summary: We all ways stay her every year Great location and the good price and comfy  for the whole family pool is great for the kids to cool off , kids arcades to keep them busy too . We recommend to all are friends and family 😋
Manager Response: Dear Malatorre,   Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write us a review! We are happy to know that you and your family have enjoyed staying with us for the past few years, thank you for your loyalty and for recommending us to your friends and family!  We look forward to having you stay with again in the near future!  Warm Regard!!!

Summary Heading: This is my Families Hotel of choice!
Summary: We have stayed here three times in a row now. This is our favorite place because it is right across the street from the park. It is always very clean. They are really friendly at the front desk and they try to do everything they can to make your stay very nice.   Breakfast is very basic but it will get you to lunch. There is a McDonald's right up the street, and a Denny's right next door which is also really nice. They have an arcade room which is a little dated which reminds me of when I was young. And they have an indoor pool which is great in the winter months, I wish the glass windows opened up in the summer, that would be great.
Manager Response: Dear centervilleGreg,   Thank you for making us your families Hotel of choice! We truly value your patronage and your loyalty! We are happy to know that we were able to meet your expectations and needs.   We strive to provide our guest with the utmost customer service!  Kind regards!

Summary: The rooms were clean and well maintained.  Bath room fixtures looked new.  We were returning guests because our visit 3 years ago was very positive.   However, due to repair work scheduled on the roof above us we were moved to another suite.  The management compensated us generously for our inconvenience.  We would definitely stay again if we are in Anaheim again.  Before we arrived a representative told us about a handicap scooter rental company that would give us a discount because we were staying at Desert Inn and Suites.  We saved $110.00 on 6 days rental!  I would recommend this hotel even if you weren't going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear John P,   Thank you for your kind comments. It was a pleasure to have you and your family here! Yes, there was some minor roof work during the time of your stay, and we want to go ahead and apologize one more time for the inconvenience . Also, I want to thank you for recommending the Desert Inn & Suites Hotel to all other travellers.   Please continue to let us know if there is anything we can do for you during your next visit. Wishing you a fantastic Summer!  Cheers!

Summary: This hotel was a great price for the location. It is literally right across the street from Disneyland. We stayed in the  C-2 family suite and the rooms and bathrooms were very clean.  The staff was helpful and kind. Overall, we couldn't be happier about our stay!
Manager Response: Dear lisa171013,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites! I am so happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations during your stay. Yes, we are literally right across the street from the Main entrance of Disneyland, it is such a short 5 minute walk!    We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future  Warm regards!!!

Summary: We visit DL every summer and for the past 7 years we always stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and have never been disappointed.  This year we had the Family Suite B and appeared they had been freshened up.  Love watching the fireworks on the roof.  Breakfast is just juice and danishes, toast and fruit, not bad to get the morning going.  Denny's is next door and you do get 10% when you show them your room key.  Parking has never been an issue.  Nice and quick walk to the parks sure helps by the end of the day.  This is always our first choice and will definitely stay again next summer.
Manager Response: Dear jagz96,   Thank you for being a loyal patron of the Desert Inn & Suites! Our staff and I are happy to hear that you have enjoyed staying with us the past 7 years! Also, thank you for noticing that we have freshen up our rooms & suites!  And, yes the walk to Disney is a quick  and we also have a variety of restaurants that are also a quick walK from our hotel!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future! Thank you!  Warm regards!

Summary: We used to stay at the Disneylabd Hotel a lot. But we found the Desert Inn to be a shorter walk. If you are just going to enjoy the parks, then this is a perfect location. Rooms are more than satisfactory.
Manager Response: Dear Chriscedro,   Thank you for your review of the Desert Inn & Suites ! I am so glad to hear that you found our rooms to be more than satisfactory!. You are right, from our location it is a very short walk to Disneyland!  We hope to welcome you back to the Desert Inn & Suites in the future!  Best Regards!

Summary: This place is directly across the street from Disneyland Resort.  Perfect location.  Very good service. The rooms were clean and well kept.  Needed to do laundry, this was 10 days into our trip.. The laundry facilities were spotless for an area just outside a busy resort.  The breakfast was not that good compared to other hotels that offer it , but it did the trick,  but was very conjested. I would surely recommend this place for a stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Ken F,   Thank you for your review! I am glad you found the Desert Inn & Suites  to meet all of your needs and expectations. I will pass your comments to the management there so they may be able to improve the the breakfast for the future. Furthermore, we are in the process of expanding our breakfast room to eliminate the overcrowding.   Thank you for your feedback! I hope to welcome you back to the Desert Inn & Suites in the future!  Warm Regards!

Summary: We just returned from our second time staying at this hotel. We plan on staying here every time we go to Disneyland. The staff is amazing, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the price is very reasonable. We watched the Disneyland fireworks from our 4th floor window .We also love that the suites have two completely separate rooms. We have been traveling with babies and the second room makes a great place for them to sleep. We love that it is across the street from the main entrance. With little kids it makes it so easy to take them to the hotel for a nap and then go back to the parks. This hotel does not have a great pool. It's indoor, but we think that's a plus because it gives us a break from the sun. The continental breakfast is really basic and crowded. We just skip it
Manager Response: Dear jennmickmom1,  Thank you for your review! Our staff are all so glad that you love staying at the  Desert Inn & Suites when visiting Disneyland . Thank you for the room tips as well! We are in the process of expanding our breakfast room in order to eliminate the crowds and make it more spacious.    We can't wait to welcome you back to the Desert Inn & Suites on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Great place for a big group
Summary: I stayed here with a group of 9 girls for a bachelorette party and it was the perfect place to stay. It's right across the street from Disneyland, so we all walked there together instead of dealing with a shuttle. We're all in our 20s, so staying at this place was perfect for us since we're trying to save money. I couldn't find any better deals around. The room was clean and everything was in working order. The mini fridge was a decent size as well. The room slept 9 of us comfortably. The continental breakfast was okay, but can't really argue with free. IHOP and Denny's are right next door, so we ate there also. I would definitely come back to this place and recommend it to anyone trying to save money while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Feedthesnake,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Desert Inn & Suites! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and we were able to meet your expectations.   We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!.   Warm Regards!

Summary Heading: It was a amazing place at a great price!
Summary: I love this hotel! I will forever use this hotel from now on. The staff is very nice and the rooms are very clean. It a great location because it's literally across the street. Would recommend this for everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Kassie V,  Wow!!! Thank you for your kind words, it means alot to our staff to know guest appreciate our effort in providing the utmost customer service! Yes we are in such a great location, directly across the street from the Disneyland main entrance!.   We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!  Cheers!

Summary: We love staying here because it is so close to Disneyland. It does have its challenges - tight parking and slow elevators, but it's always clean and has an in-room safe, fridge and micro. Breakfast starts a little late - 7:30 so make other plans on the day you use your magic morning at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear starshine514,  Thank you for taking the time share your feedback with us! We are very happy to know that we are one of your favorites!!! We will utilize your feedback in order to help us improve the quality of our services to our guest!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!  Warm regards!

Summary: Overall very satisfied. Several things though, we upgraded to a suite to be close to another family and was advised it would only be $20 per night more. I booked it months ago and my rate was $89 room was $119. That is a $30 difference. The TV was out for more than a day and even though it wasn't the doing of the hotel an apology or message to advise would have been appreciated. Lastly when I went to check out It was a cold process. There was no "how was your stay? No did you enjoy yourself?" It was "room number?" " Bill same credit card?" That's it.. Could work on that..otherwise it was a good experience!
Manager Response: Dear Bigmommaduran,   Thank you for your stay at the Desert Inn & Suites. I want to take this time to apologize for the inconvenience we may have caused you due to the miscommunication on the pricing for the upgrade. Please feel free to contact me directly and I will be able to resolve the issue.   Your feedback, is greatly appreciated as it will help us improve our customer service. Furthermore, This was not a good reflection of how our hotel operates. We would like an opportunity to earn your business back.  Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your feedback!  Kindest regards!

Summary Heading: Awesome location, helpful staff, and comfortable rooms.
Summary: You can't beat the location! The rooms are comfortable, spacious, and clean. The breakfast sufficient with fruits, oatmeal, bagels, toast, juice, milk and coffee. What I enjoyed most was the friendly and helpful staff. It's our home hotel when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear CSOishi,   Thank you so much for staying with us. We take it as a great compliment that you clearly enjoyed our comfortable, spacious and clean room! I will be sharing your review with my staff they will delighted to know that our guest appreciate our effort to provide the utmost customer service!  Best regards!

Summary: I have stayed in many other hotels but by far I really enjoyed my stay here in this one. The rooms were very clean and had no complains at all. The whole staff was great and polite. Most definitely looking forward to stay here in the future. I recommend this hotel to family and  friends.
Manager Response: Dear AliciaThomas_750,   Thank you so much for the wonderful compliments! We are so happy you stayed with us, and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!   We strive to provide our guest with the utmost customer service!  Warm regards,

Summary: Reserved 4 rooms for my family during our Disneyland family reunion.  The Hotel staff were very hospitable and the rooms were in very good repair. Hotel was literally right across from the Disney which made if extremely convenient. This hotel is not a "4-star" hotel, but we give it 4 stars!  I would definitely stay again and recommend it to anyone looking for a wallet friendly  solution to a Disneyland vacation hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Joanne K,  Thank you very much for your kind words. We know there are other options to choose when it comes to your hotel accommodations, and we want to thank you for choosing us.   We hope to be serving you and your family again in the near future.  Cheers,   Ana Roa

Summary: Stayed in a C1 room 214 great room no complaints.  Had trouble when granddaughter changed safe combination, but they fixed that straight away,  kids loved the spa and pool and the late hours it was open.  Close to everything!!! Will stay here again, very happy
Manager Response: Dear katian64,   Thank you so much for your review, and for staying with us at the Desert Inn & Suites . We are glad that you found the C1 Parlor Family Suite, the pool, spa, and the service to your liking! We look forward to seeing you again! Thanks again!

Summary: My husband, 11 yr old and I stayed there May 22-23. From check-in to check-out we couldn't be happier. We arrived before check-in but the front desk was very accommodating in storing our bags. They gave us suggestions on where to eat and discount coupons to the Denny's next door. The room was clean and equipped with microwave and mini fridge. My daughter had a great time in the pool and the Jacuzzi felt great on my tired body after walking at Disney all day! The location was superb..right across the street from the entrance to Disney. So if we needed a break during the day it was very convenient to come back to the room or take a dip in the pool. I was a travel agent for 22 years and am very picky about where I stay (I got spoiled!) and I have no problem recommending this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Colleen L,   Thank you for your Kind words, and for taking the time to give us a review!I'm glad that everything was comfortable for your stay. It is always nice to be able to relax in the pool or spa after a long day at Disneyland!   Kind regards,   Ana R

Summary: The perfect place for a trip to Disneyland. Comfortable room, friendly staff, great location. I would highly recommend for a family holiday. If I was to return to Anaheim I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Strasik,  Thank you for your kind input and for being a guest a the Desert Inn. We definitely look forward to any future visits and let us know when you are ready to book again  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: good location and hotel staff helpful
Summary: The location was great- right across street from disneyland. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful with directions, places to eat, car rental and parking. It was a great trip. Kids enjoyed the pool every night.
Manager Response: Hello ThomasFour,  Thank you for staying at the Desert Inn and for your feedback. Our location is definitely price and i'm happy to hear that our services and amenities were up to your standards. We hope to see you again when you come back to the Disneyland Resort.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: The location is excellent! It is a short, 5 minute walk to the entrances to the parks. They do charge a $9 parking fee, but everything is within walking distance so it's worth it. The park charges $17!  The hotel was very clean. The sheets, towels, and bathroom were spotless.  The biggest issue I had was the lack of hospitality. No one greeted you or acknowledged your presence. The breakfast was very poor quality and again the attendant wouldn't even speak to the guests. I know they see hundreds of people, but a smile wouldn't hurt.  The refrigerator made loud noises all night long. I asked the person checking me in to not give me a room near the stairs since I had read about the noise level being a little too much as people are going back to their rooms. So he gave me a room
Manager Response: Hello Maria V,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Desert Inn, we apologize if your stay was anything less than great. We will use your review to help us provide a better experience for our future guests. Thank you and I sure hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Location! Price! Family friendly! Couldn't have asked for anything better!!
Summary: I have already shared with family and friends just how blessed we were by our stay there! We felt welcomed the moment we arrived. We got in at 12:15am and immediately the parking attendant asked if we were the Wilson's and showed us the one parking place remaining for us. Once we got to our room we discovered it was not the one we had reserved and only had room for 4 people, not 5. The gentleman at the front desk tried to find us the right room but they were all gone so he offered us a rollaway for the night until they could move us the next day. When the rollaway arrived, there was not enough room for it so to compensate for our troubles, we were put in a larger room for the week at no additional charge. We would have gladly changed rooms if we needed to, but this hotel was
Manager Response: Hello Shkelly,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to know that your stay was great and hope to see you when you again come back to the Disneyland Resort.   Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Great location to Disneyland, right across the street. Parking is not great, in fact it is probably inadequate for the size of the motel. There is an underground garage but it is a bit cramped. Rooms were decent and clean. I asked for the third floor and got it. I was also able to check in early and park my car while I went over to the parks. Only downside, continental breakfast was pretty sad. Pool was indoors and looked pretty small but I did not use it. I would stay here again for the clean and comfortable rooms and the proximity to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello ElkGroveChris,  Thank you for staying with us and for giving us such high marks in sleep quality, rooms, and cleanliness.  We hope that you have found your new home away from home when you visit the Disneyland parks.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: Right across  street from Disneyland, clean rooms helpful staff, great value. Ya its not fancy but free breakfast. Love this place for Disneyland. Rooms are decent size fridge, and microwave and comfortable beds. Bathrooms are small but clean. Comparable to holiday  inn. In my opinion. Thanks guys keep up the good work
Manager Response: Hello fordman169,  Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to know that your stay was great and hope to see you when you again come back to the Disneyland Resort.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for Disneyland on a Budget & Best Location!!
Summary: This is my second stay at this Hotel with my husband and son. The staff has always been super friendly, clean rooms, big refrigerator, microwave, coffee pot & coffee, hairdryer; has free continental breakfast (gets you by before lunch), has a pool & jacuzzi (all in doors) and best part of all is it's location if going to Disneyland! You step out and walk directly to the light and walk across the street! Love it! It really is close enough that you can go back to your room for a break from the parks which we did each of the 3 days there- it was perfect! The prices are great too, especially if you book ahead, I always use the direct website. We are on a budget and I always get rooms well under $100 for 4 people and consider parking, wifi, breakfast, pool, location... Desert Inn has
Manager Response: Hello pinkkid,  We definitely appreciate your kind words and awesome input. Nothing is more important to us than our relationship with our guests. Again, we thank you for your review and we cannot wait for your next stay!  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: It was great and really close to Disneyland. I only wished the breakfast was served since earlier but everything was great. Rooms are in a really great condition and always clean. On my next trip to Disneyland I will definitely try to stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Stephanie D,  Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your kind comments. We do listen to our guests, and their valuable feedback assists us in making operational modifications and service enhancements. Again, we thank you for your review and we cannot wait for your next stay!  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: The rooms were very clean. We stayed for 6 days and we had maid service over half of the time and they did a great job in cleaning the room but leaving it the way we had left it. Felt safe in having someone we don't know come into our room.
Manager Response: Hi Virginia D,  Thank you for staying at the Desert Inn, it was a pleasure to have you stay with us. I'll pass your kind words to our housekeeping department as I know they'll be happy to hear your input. We hope to come to be your to go place when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Would give them higher numbers if possible
Summary: This is our first choice when it comes to Disneyland hotels. We have been staying here for several years and lost count how many times we have stayed. Right ourside the maingate. Staff is very friendly. Hotel super clean. And the value far exceeds the worth. Only things that I took notice about this time was the amount of cars that did not have spaces blocking guests who were in spaces and our room was skipped for housecleaning so we did not have coffee or towels the next morning. Still feel over all 5!!! Love this hotel and will be back for our next trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Right Across the Street from Disney...
Summary: Stayed for 3 days while visiting Disneyland and California Adventures and loved the location! It is right across the street from the park entrance, so you don't need a car at all. It is also near restaurants (Denny's and IHOP are next door) and there are also more restaurants down the street (10 min walk). So, we did not need our car at all during our stay.   Rooms are very clean and comfortable. Also, breakfast is a huge plus (bagels, toast, cereal, boiled eggs, pastries, etc...) but, I do have to say their coffee is awful, that is the only thing I disliked about the hotel. Thank god there are other coffee places in the area.  There is also a parking fee of $9 per day which is my opinion is worth it because of the location. Overall I would definitely recommend this hotel for
Manager Response: Hello NayaSantaFe,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. I will definitely bring your coffee comments to our next management meeting and possibly look at different options. Thank you again and we hope to see you in the near future.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: We booked 4 rooms for our family of 13. Our stay with you made our trip to Disneyland a wonderful experience. From front desk staff to maid service, all your staff were helpful and courteous. We loved the suites with the fridge and mic as we were able purchase snacks and water to take with us to the park. The beds were comfortable and everything was clean. The bathrooms looked like they had been recently upgraded. We took advantage of the continental breakfast each morning and thought it was basic but we enjoyed what was available. We enjoyed cooling off in the pool after a day at Disneyland. The best part was the location and our feet thank you for being so close.
Manager Response: Hi kenpennym,  Thank you for your kind words and for staying with us. Our team is very happy to hear that everything we were able to be a part of your Wonderful Experience. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: The overall experience was nice, especially being right across from the park and having the upstairs deck for viewing the fireworks.  We do have a few complaints though, the continental breakfast was not very good and the coffee was horrible. It's disappointing that there isn't an outside pool or sunbathing area. Also, having the Denny's and IHOP right next door and having the delivery trucks show up at 3am and make a lot of noise and have the back up horn going for 10 minutes was not very pleasant.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel several months in advance for a trip to Disneyland and got a great rate.  Iw as expecting a pretty basic hotel for that rate but was surprised when my room had a large refrigerator and a small microwave in it.  The beds were comfortable, the room was clean, and (as my sister's review states so clearly :)) it was right across the street from the Disneyland entrance.  I was in room 331 which was at the back of the hotel in their courtyard area.  While I didn't hear any noise from the walls or from below sound was readily transmitted from the front since the rooms open right into the courtyard.  However there really wasn't too much noise just the usual people getting ready to leave in the morning and coming back at night.  Oh, and the loud booms from the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: DISNEYLAND!  My feet thank this hotel.
Summary: This is basically just a great little hotel DIRECTLY ACROSS THE STREET FROM DISNEYLAND.  We got an unbelievable rate ($69/$79) booking about four months in advance. Wasn't really expecting anything fancy at that rate, but the rooms were nice basic clean rooms with fairly comfy beds, great shutter blinds, good water pressure and a microwave & fridge.  Our room was right at the front of the hotel by an elevator and we got some noise occasionally, but nothing crazy.  Others in our party had inside rooms that they said were very quiet.  Walking back from the park was SO nice, since we just had to stumble across the street and into our beds.  Breakfast was standard hotel breakfast - nothing fancy. Only complaint was that maybe they could get some half & half for the coffee instead of
Manager Response: Hello LMStaton,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that your stay was great. We are not perfect but we work very hard at providing great customer service and a clean and comfortable place to stay. We hope to see you soon.   Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary: This was our fourth time staying at this hotel. For the price, you can't beat the location or the size of the suites.  It's not the nicest property but you aren't going to spend much time here anyway.  They accidently cancelled our room key after a long day at Dland so I had to get a new one, but they were apologetic and replaced it quickly. Tons of towels but only one lousy shampoo.  Breakfast has improved over the years, they now have boiled eggs and occasionally bagels, but it is still limited. Free coffee goes a long way however.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 6 nights.  The Good Big clean rooms-great housekeeping Friendly staff and valets Good value Great location Comfortable beds Great air conditioning (even during a heat wave)  The Not So Good Safe (didn't work, 2 visits to the front desks  & still didn't receive help to fix it) Noise from outside (early morning garbage trucks & delivery trucks)  The good at this hotel outweighed the bad, we would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: So the week we choose to sojourn to Disneyland, Anaheim experienced record breaking temps of  106.  If it had not been for the Desert Inn and Suites, we would have had a horrible vacation and possibly three cases of heat exhaustion.  It was literally, an oasis in the punishing desert.  Thank you is not enough.  Come here.  Come here.  Come here.  Luxury beckons.
Manager Response: Hello Monika M,  Thank you for staying with us and for your kind review. I'm glad that we were able to be your oasis during these past few days, our indoor pool and spa can definitely be a big help after a long day at the parks. Thank you and we'll see you again in the near future.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at Anaheim Desert Inn and Suites
Summary: We had a wonderful time staying at Anaheim Inn and Suites! The rooms are clean.  The staff was very helpful.  The convenience of being able to walk to Disneyland was priceless! Thank you!  We will be staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Anna K,  Thank you for giving the Desert Inn & Suites a chance to host your Disney Vacation, we are glad that our hotel met your expectations and let us known when you're ready to book again.  Teo Huerta Front Office Manager Anaheim Desert Inn
